title: Currency converter calculator!
description:
All world currencies.
App works without the internet.
Search currencies by countries.
Mid-market exchange rates.
Ability to set own exchange rates.
Update every hour.
App size only 12 MB.
Cryptocurrencies.
Embedded calculator.
iOS and macOS versions.
Exchange rates widget.

To disable ads, you can buy Premium for $3 per year.
The price is in US dollars and may vary by country.

Payment will be charged to your Apple ID account at the confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless it is canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage and cancel your subscriptions by going to your account settings on the App Store after purchase.

Terms of Use: https://getconverter.org/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://getconverter.org/privacy.html
releaseNotes: Bug fixes
reviews:
Aplikace funguje v podstatě jen na základě prodeje dat uživatelů. Pokud odmítnete souhlas,v podstatě se nedá použit. Vzhledem k tomu jak málo tato aplikace umí,odinstalovávám,a použiji jinou. | Docela se mi zamlouvá, dokáže se aktualizovat, pro orientaci určitě dobrý pomocník. 🙂 | Top, rychlé a aktuální, používám denně. Skvělá aplikace!!! | Výborná aplikace, převody a kalkulačka zároveň. | Nejlepší appka pro převod měn, měrných jednotek a dalších věcí. Má i šikovný widget s aktuálními kurzy měn. 

Nejdřív mě strašně vytáčely reklamy, jelikož jsem nikde nemohl najít placenou verzi bez reklam. V české verzi se nákup předplatného schoval pod “: -> Nastavení -> Pojistné”, což by mě nenapadlo hledat zrovna tam. 🙈 | Why do you need commercials in a simple calculator?! Capitalism really popped off today | Po aktualizace pouze na predplatne. Tak to si to nechte. Sbohem. | Tak tohle nemá chybu,jednoduchý a přehledný 👍 | Otravné reklamy. Použitelný jen na měny. Logo vypadá jak kalkulačka, takže se to plete | Dobry den, dotaz k app je zpoplatněna, kdybych ji chtela treba na mesic jen vyzkouset? Dekuji | Hi. There is no paid version. Application good. I really dislike the ads, they are frequent and long. It is not possible to seriously use it at work. There is no paid version. You want money - I'll pay, and no ads. Otherwise, I delete the application. | První rok s předplatným Premium bez problémů, další rok po zaplacení předplatného mi stále vyskakují reklamy. Jinak aplikace skvělá, ale tohle je otravné | Bomba aplikace často využívám, jediné co mi občas vadí že ikona aplikace je podobná klasické kalkulačce, tak se mi to občas plete | Hodne spatne. Kurzy funguji jak maji, ale pouze 1 den. 

Dale je potreba potvrdit svou polohu a povolit reklamy. Nestahovat | I cannot use the app without giving permission to track me. I dont thing it should be like that. Show me as many ads you want but i dont want to allow tracking. | Fenomenální 👍👍👍💪 | Reklamy jsou na .... | Reklamy 🤮🤮🤮

title: Ryanair
description:
With this App at your fingertips, Europe is at your feet.

We’re Ryanair, so of course you’ll find the lowest fares in Europe on our app. But you’ll also get handy extras like being able to check in while you’re on the move, a mobile boarding pass delivered straight to your phone and a choice of in-flight extras in one quick click.

So why are you still reading? Download it now and get flying!
releaseNotes: In our most recent update, we've enhanced our Travel Assistant, making gate numbers readily accessible. Additionally, we've upgraded our inflight magazine. These improvements are set to significantly elevate the user experience.
reviews:
In case you are family, it is not possible to view all boarding passes. You can always see first member of family, but other boarding passes cant be seen in app. App doesnt rect to scroll to left/right to see other boarding passes. You have to go to web, log in and print. Not possible to download boarding passes in the app. | I am extremely disappointed and frustrated with my recent experience with Ryanair. My partner and I thought we found a great deal on flight tickets, but our excitement quickly turned into dismay upon arrival at the airport.

Unbeknownst to us, Ryanair has a policy requiring passengers to check in online. Failure to do so results in a hefty fee, which, in our case, was €110 for the two of us. This was not clearly communicated at any point during our booking process. There was no mention or warning of such a significant penalty for something as minor as not checking in online.

This lack of transparency feels like a deliberate trap for unsuspecting customers to extract more money. The fee we had to pay was more than 100% of our entire trip’s budget, completely throwing off our travel plans and finances.

The whole situation cast a dark shadow over our trip, turning what should have been a joyful getaway into a stressful financial burden. It’s disheartening to encounter such hidden traps and customer-unfriendly policies.

I urge Ryanair to reconsider their approach to communication and fees. Transparency and customer care should be paramount, not profit-making schemes that ruin trips and tarnish your company’s reputation.

Sincerely disappointed,
Andrey Kulchitskiy | Bad, the app app is not available in my country, so how do I check in by app? Ryanair should not save money on this and complicates our life | Its very cheap but they try to scam you in any possible way. They made the app and the website very hard to use so people make more  mistakes. | the company is the least customer centric service of all times. Either you print out (who want to do that hassle) or download an app. Otherwise, there is a fee for presenting the boarding pass on a phone. absolute rubbish | Musite si rezervovat sedacku a zaplatit, vlastne nemusite a na letisti zaplatite 55€, banda kretenu, nikdy vic.
Appka zahnojena reklamama. | Super app | It is problem od all low cost airlines but Ryanair is the ‘best’. 🙁 If anything is no in exact plan or application ot webportal there practicaly neexist posibilty for things changed or get to right. (There are not life people in Ryan…). It is very humiliating for customer.
Thanks for your question    Tom B. | i can’t choose the return tickets, after choosing tickets to destination and choosing bags, screen turns white and nothing is responding, sometimes app turns off on its own. please fix it | Нет Украинского и Русского языков | Příliš hodně “vnucování” věci a nabídek, které vůbec nechci. Poměr cena a výkon je v pořádku! | I just cant understand why the app is not optimized for iphone 13. It is not on the whole screen, black lines in the top and bottom of screen like this app is from ios 8 and just not fit my screen (I have latest version) | Offer, offer and another offer on every step.

Are you sure you want a stressful, not smooth flight? No? Then buy all these extras and we will change your experience of the flight you bought with us from a misserable one to a fantastic one! 

Guys, upsell with reason. 

It would have been a good, functional, quality app it not turned into a spam maschine. | Totally useless applications. When I try to login it always says that user doesnt exist or wrong password. Even when I am logged on website under same account. Also tried to reset password and still same error msg. Please fix it | Everything used to work fine, but with the latest update I am unable to log in, it shows loading but it never actually loads and log me in. Not even via Apple id. Please fix the bug. iPhone 14 pro max | Logging in via email and password does not work. It is not possible to actually use the application. | app reguralry crashes when i try to book a return flight and is unfortunately unusable | Šupáci | There's no way to add the flights to my calendar. | …. constantly keeps logging me off, and login with facebook does not work at all now. | App now works terribly, constantly need to enter write login and password, the face-up does not work, app itself freezes and closes all the time. | They keep trying to scare you and on the top of it, they offer you options that are not applicable or do not work. Get some UX professional next time, please. | I had to pay for a seat (although wanted to be seated randomly) to be able to do the check-in! | Eveytime I want to see my trips I need to retrieve it via form with Reservation number and email. Why is that, this is ridiculous. iOS 16 | I definitely recommend to the ryanair team to improve the app! From my experience it’s vey frustrating full of errors. The older version gave an error do I installed the new one and unfortunately after all steps done, flight choosen, luggage, seats, all data entered including the bank card data and… nothing, the payment didn’t go through, no progress was saved. So i had to do all the same again. And again the app just dropped at the last step! I hope the bugs get fixed and progress gets saved if the app suddenly stops working! | All prices were in EUR, then I used my EUR account card. You made two currency exchange and stolen 12%. | Idiotska aplikace pro idiotskou aerolinku | A bit difficult pathway to checkout due to many times repeating xsell of insurance and bags and so on. Not necessary. | Super | Zkuste mít pobočku na vyřizování v ČR.Ta plechová huba někde v Irsku nám nevyhovuje.Asi je to úmysl.Ceny letenek šly samozřejmě nahoru,bohužel kvalita produktu dolů. | The worst service from you which I have never seem from the  competitors. This will be my last flight with your company. | ... | Asking for app update and blocking the app right at the airport? That does not help at all! Please think before you do such things. | Whenever I just switch apps and then back again all my progress is lost! I lost a good taxi price because of this, and had to redo it 10x because I had to switch there and back between apps and Ryanair kept resetting itself. | I’ve tried to book a flight but unfortunately it shows me some sort of mistake while other person can easily book it at the same time | Při zakoupení více letenek na 1 e-mail adresu není možné v aplikaci přidat všechny letenky a udělat řádný on-line chceckin. 

Údajně je to chybou operátora (Pelikan), který zadává automaticky nefunkční e-mail adresy na další letenky. To se mi jeví jako lež, protože u jiných leteckých společnosti vše přes Pelikan funguje správně. 

Dělá to vše Ryanair proto, aby mohl schválně poplatkovat své klienty za neuskutečneny on-line check-in? Který ale není klientovou chybou, ale tím, že se není možné do systému přihlásit!!!

Velké zklamání směrem k Vaši společnosti. | This company is a rip off. Unfortunately… I was about to buy flight ticket and there was something wrong with the website and could not purchase it it was saying there is a mistake and the price is not avalaible it couldnt be sold out yet at the time - there were always same amount of seats so this website didnt not allow me to buy ticket and tricked me (by saying that the price is not avalaible) i was trying to buy ticket a whole day. After unsuccesful monday for 100€ (2tickets) i bought it on tuesday the price was 93x2 (186€ - 2tickets). Day after purchasiing i was looking for the price online now  it’s only 100€ for 2 tickets )back to the same first price which i was trying to get tickets on monday.. This is ridiculous…. I want my 86€ euros back | After downloading the application. Only Ryanair's page appears and I can't open it. I tried to install and uninstall. Restart the phone and the application still cannot be opened. :-( | Utterly useless as Ryanair is incredibly incompetent to inform its passengers (customers). | A tragicomic attempt at application. Trying to check-in I fill in the details, I want to verify them from the message. I return and the app cancels the check-in and returns to the home screen. Try maybe Easy Jet there the app is functional even on the latest iP13 pro. | Cheep flying, but aplication and prices for seats, drinks,…Never again | Impossibility to access through Facebook | Vydíráte a stresujete své zákazníky. Styďte se!!! | Jist | Jsem velmi spokojena jak s aplikaci tak se společnosti a jejími službami | Are tou trying to get your boarding pass? Well good luck.. App is full of ads, trying to sell tou anything during the check in process, but it fails to deliver one thing that is important - boarding pass. It happened to me multiple tines that I went through painfull process of check in, battling all annoying ads, just to learn in last step that it didn't went through and I need to start again from scratch. Painfull and frustrating | Ryanair provides a really bad service. Sales representatives in Madrid airport was very rude and unhelpful, will never flight again with Ryanair. | Dobrý den, bylo by super kdyby aplikace měla český jazyk | DanaPech | Becouse I am forced to download it, instead of just giving me mobile board pass via apple wallet. Horrible experience

title: EasyPark - Parking made easy
description:
EasyPark has been making cities more livable since 2001. With millions of drivers, businesses, and operators using our services in more than 20 countries, we continue to develop convenient, easy-to-use solutions to save you time, and money and remove the unnecessary stress of car parking.

EasyPark is the nr. 1 parking app in Europe when it comes to coverage. With our mobile parking solution, you can pay for parking in a garage or find a parking spot in the street, in the city center or in the airport, at home or abroad - wherever life takes you! You can also charge your EV, and go even further.

Price: In most locations, we charge a service fee on top of the parking cost the operator charges. The total price and fee breakdown are shown in the EasyPark app when you set your end time and before you start to park, as well as in your parking receipt when the session has ended, so you are confident about how much you’re paying. Please see your local easypark.com site for more details.

With the EasyPark app, you can:
- Start your session from your mobile phone.
- Stop your session at any time, paying for the active time.
- Remotely extend your session if you need more time.
- Find parking near your location or destination before traveling.
- Charge your electric car with the same app.
- Pay for parking, whether privately or for work.
- Split your private and work-related parking or charging costs.
- Pay with secure methods such as Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay, or monthly invoices for business accounts.
- Get notified when your parking is close to expiration.

You can pay for parking and EV charging with the EasyPark app in: Rome, Madrid, Melbourne, Berlin, Copenhagen, Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Helsinki and so many more!

Please note that the EasyPark app is unavailable in the United Kingdom. To park in the UK, please use the RingGo app instead.
releaseNotes: We update the app often to give you a fast, reliable service so you can park with confidence. Activate automatic updates to have the best experience. Let us know of ways to make your parking or charging sessions better.
reviews:
Keyboard doesn't work. Only numbers appear | Po účtování servisního poplatku přecházím k jiné aplikaci | Považuji za zázrak, když je tato aplikace funkční. Problémy s prihlasovanim a placením. | tahle aplikace nenabízí SPZ, vždy zaplatím omylem na jiné auto než je potřeba. Přednastavené mám osobní auto, a když přijedu firemním, Tak není na hlavní stránce možnost změnit rychle SPZ. Pak mi chodí pokuty. Zatím nejhorší aplikace. | Hrozná aplikace 🙂parkování stojí 10kč, ale díky téhle skvělé aplikaci, kde je minimální částka 30kč/platba. Tak vás to stojí hned o 20kč zbytečně víc. Zlaté MPLA. | Nice scam, new app instead of MPLA which was easy and functional. This scam has only service fee and doesńt work.
Nice job! | Aplikace super, funguje po cele Evropě. 
Jediné velké minus, tak kolečko na nastavování času. Kdy omylem přejedu prstem při nastavování do středu a aktivují parkování se špatným časem. A k tomu ještě zjistím ze mám nataveno jiné auto. 
Takže musím zaplatit znovu. A vlastně parkování vyjde mnohem dráž než u automatu a nebo se starou aplikaci MPLa která fungovala perfektně. | Za každé parkování berou servisní poplatek. Jsou aplikace kde to jde bez poplatků, takže radši budu používat jiné. | Aplikace už funguje bez problému. | Is this a joke? how come you lot taking a 7kr commission for a 20kr parking? incredible | Now they added a service fee that's up to 20% of the parking price. Insane. And no other good options. Classic business model. Offer great service. Screw customers once addicted. | Moc nerozumim existenci těhle dalších aplikací | Za mě není této aplikaci to vytknout splňuje všechny moje požadavky na jednoduché zaplacení za parkování ve městě. | Udělali ze staré funkční aplikace novou a v Brně nefunkční. Bravo, tleskám! | Od března 2024 si aplikace účtuje navíc 15% za parkovací poplatek! A to není málo. Jsou aplikace, kde nic neplatite. Pro mě zklamání jinak výborné aplikace, ale platit 15% !!! navíc mi přijde mimo. | The blue zones are bigger in the app than in reality... They charge on free area. Checked in  Valencia. Scammers... | Zlatá předchozí MPLA aplikace. Neuctovala servisní poplatek. Ale co je o dost horší, ze když potřebujete zaplatit na zóně nebo zónách více vozidel najednou, tak to nelze! Předchozí app bez problému. | A service fee of 15% for being able to pay to the public service(city)? 100 czk/month to get an invoice? This is ransom. | I used this app twice and I wont use it ever again. They charge you money and you wont even know that yoo actually gave the agreement to it. I accodentaly bought a praking time just by touching the wheel in app. The worst parking app I’ve ever seen tbh. | Aplikace dobrá, ale drahé poplatky. V dnešní době nesmyslně vysoké! Jsou podobné aplikace bez poplatků. | They just charge you 15% for their services on top what you’re paying for parking. 15% for facilitating a parking booking is insane. Use mpla.io instead and save yourselves a lot of money. | Dnes mi aplikace oznámila že začnou účtovat servisní poplatek 15%. To vnímám jako naprostou nehoráznost. Nic není zadarmo, ale z mého pohledu 3% maximálně je adekvátní, jako u různých jiných služeb kde si zprostředkovatele služeb účtují například jedno až 3%. 15% naprosto žádném případě. 
Argument že díky tomuto poplatku mohou vůbec fungovat a přinášet nám úsporu času, vnímám jako alibismus. To by mohli říct i U 90 procentní ho poplatku. Měli by mít nastaven poplatek takový že se určitě nejedná o 15% ceny. To je prostě mimo mísu. Aplikaci tady mažu a snad někdy dojde ke změně. | During acquisition of MPLA app I was been forced to start using this app, and I’m not satisfied at all.

1. Paying 15% fee of each parking especially in places where the price is 80 CZK/ hour I consider as too much.
2. Spinning wheel for setup ending time is not comfortable. Have a calendar picker with roller like alarm in iOS will be much better.

Please consider changing pricing model, because receiving fees from city for using your service and also from customers is very unfair. | Pokud budete nastavovat parkovací dobu a omylem se u kliknete do středu růžového kolečka aplikace vám okamžitě strhne peníze bez ohledu na to zda s tím souhlasíte nebo nesouhlasíte. A i když na místě vůbec ne parkujete. Žádná možnost zrušení či odvolání. | Šílenost , draha , platba za předčasně ukončení parkování je lež , zlata MPLA | EasyPark je super, ale v praze si uctuji prilis vysokou provizi a pritom stejnou sluzbu plni PID Litacka, ktera si neuctuje zadny poplatek. | Je to spolehlivá aplikace | Zlatá jednoduchá aplikace MPLA. Škoda, tímto končím s online parkováním 😞 | I does not find nearby parking zones | The spinning wheel is a terrible interface for choosing the time.

And even if I selected e.g. 30min parking for 20CZK and confirmed that, the app charged me 50CZK for 1h parking. How is that possible??? | Aplikace je skvělá. Zaplatím jen tolik, kolik reálně využiju. | Musel jsem přejít z MPLA, kterou jsem léta používal a byl s ní nad míru spokojen. Tohle je ale skutečná katastrofa, která si nezaslouží ani tu jednu hvězdičku.

Co se mi nelíbí:
- design je příšerný
- EasyPark se chlubí větším pokrytím, proč tedy nemohu najít parkovací zóny v Kosmonosech a Mladé Boleslavi, když s MPLA tu platit šlo?
- servisní poplatek 15 %!?
- lze nainstalovat pouze na iOS 16, takže pro mě použitelné pouze na iPadu (který ne vždy vozím). Na mém iPhonu s 15.8 už nepoužitelné.

Co se mi líbí:
- na nic jsem nepřišel.

Nastal čas přejít ke konkurenční aplikaci, kterou už mám delší dobu staženou, ale díky MPLA jsem neměl potřebu ji důkladněji vyzkoušet. Teď ten čas nadešel. Sbohem! | Jako účtovat si servisní poplatky za to, že někomu platíte mi přijde už opravdu přes čáru.
Prostředí aplikace je hrozné, kombinace růžůvé a fialové je k blinkání. Nastavování hodin je náročné a celkově nechápu, že to apple pustil. | The app has several big flaws:

1) It does not show parking lot available in the location in map, based on your location. It's possible to find it using street search though. 

2) the parking zone mentioned in the app does not match the one shown on parking sign 

3) server not responding, unable to pay for parking 

4) when it works, the reservation is made for 1 minute only (ignoring the period requested) | Aplikaci jsem pouzival, ale koncim s ni po zavedeni 15% poplatku za parkovaci sluzby v Praze. Tady se nekdo uplne zblaznil...! Good luck... | Update: Aplikace byla naprosto čerstvá. Musel jsem ji nainstalovat hned poté, co mi MPLA oznámilo, že už si nezaparkuju. Asi jste holt předběhli sami sebe. Teď už je to stejně fuk. Nakonec jsem radši zaplatil v automatu kartou 😏

Jak zadat požadované 4 cifry, když v SMS přijde 6místný kód? A ne, nechtějte, abych kontaktoval podporu - předejte si to sami. Už jen to, že zapnu MPLA, chci zadat parkování a bez jakéhokoli upozornění s rozumným předstihem se objeví jen strohá hláška, že už nemůžu. WTF? | For my perspective, you are providing a service more benefiting the city than the parking person. I will find an app that I don’t pay a service fee for. The parking fees are high enough | Jsem zklamán. Předchozí app byla bez správních poplatků. Což o to to by mi nevadilo kdyby se poplatek nezvyšoval na základě délky parkování.. čím déle parkuji tim je poplatek vyšší což nechápu a je to pro mě signál že něco není ok a že na mě chce nekdo vydělat, asi se jdu podívat se po jiné app. | Při spuštění aplikace to chce telefonní cislo na které prijde sms s 6 čísly ale aplikace chce jen 4 to nechápu . | I got transferred from MPLA and so far I really liked the app and the option to pay precisely for the time being parked, so much that I even ignored the personal data leak incident. 
However, I just received an email from EasyPark that they will start charging an additional fee on top of the parking price. This means that I should pay... to pay. Well, it's not happening. Worst business decision. Bye. | Aplikace není schopná odečíst si peníze za parkovné předem! Zaparkuji, nastavím v aplikaci čas, zaplatím a odejdu z auta. Druhý den ráno mi píšou, že nemám zaplaceno, že mám zablokovaný účet. Oni si ty peníze z účtu snažili vzít až po skoro 24 hodinách od parkování. V tu chvíli jsem si říkala, zda jsem opravdu měla pokryté parkovné v době, co jsem parkovala. Podpora absolutně nereagovala, původně jsem totiž vůbec nechápala, za co dlužím. Nakonec mi přijde email, že mi začnou účtovat poplatek k parkovnému? Účet i aplikaci jsem smazala, raději dojdu k automatu nebo použiji něco jiného. | The last time I had paid parking in the app was a year ago. Last night the EasyPark app stole money from my account even though I didn't park anywhere and didn't use the app. What he is trying is beyond human behavior. They are thieves! | Aplikace je tak intuitivní, ze jsem za hodinu parkovani zaplatila trojnásobek 👌🏻 zlata MPLA se mi nikdy nestalo, abych měla jakýkoliv problém s aplikaci a placením parkovani… | Tedy aspon v Liberci | nemuzu z jendoho mobilu zaroven obslouzit dve ruzna auta | Nejen, že se platí poplatek za platbu, ale i ceny jsou úplně jiné, než v automatu na ulici!!! Přijde mi to jako podvod. Hledám jinou aplikaci. | aplikace mi neposlala kód k ověření, takže ji nemohu použít | MPLA byla lepší z pohledu férovosti poplatků. | SMS code for registration dis not arrived on any phone mumber. Unable to register and use app. | Původní aplikace MPLA byla o 1000% použitelnější než je toto. Nekonečné kroucení kolečkem pro to aby člověk zjistil kolik stojí jaká doba parkování mě přivádí ke vzteku. Nakonec když se rozhodnu zaplatit, tak se platba strhne z karty až druhý den, takže si vlastně ani nejsem jistý jestli mám zaplaceno. Opravdu skvělá práce. Zrušit aplikaci co fungovala a nahradit ji tímhle diletantským pokusem jak co nejvíc naštvat lidi.

title: AllTrails: Hike, Run & Walk
description:
Find your way outside with the 2023 iPhone App of the Year

Whether you hike, bike, run, or walk, AllTrails is your companion and guide to the outdoors. Find detailed reviews and inspiration from a community of trail-goers like you. We’ll help you discover new places, keep records of old favourites and share all of your outdoor adventures.

AllTrails offers more than a running app or fitness activity tracker. It’s built on the idea that the outside isn’t a place to seek, but rather a part of us all. Custom route planning helps you search for dog-friendly, child-friendly, pram-friendly, or wheelchair-friendly trails, and more.

◆ Discover trails: Search over 400,000 trails around the world by location, interest, skill level, and more.
◆ Plan your next adventure: Get in-depth trail info, from reviews to conditions to GPS driving directions — and save your favourite trails for later.
◆ Stay on course: Stick to your planned route or chart your own course with confidence when you navigate on the trail.
◆ Grow your community: Celebrate outdoor adventures and find inspiration by connecting with trail-goers who share your passion. 
◆ Share your outdoor adventures: Easily post trails and activities on Facebook, Instagram, or WhatsApp.

Discover trails that fit your nature. Trails for workout planners, hikers, walkers, mountain bikers, trail runners, and casual cyclists. Whether you’re pushing your limits or pushing a pram, there’s something out there for everyone. Let AllTrails help you find it.

► Do more outdoors with AllTrails+ ►
Spend less time figuring out where you want to be, and more time enjoying where you are. With offline maps, wrong-turn alerts, and extra safety and planning features, your annual subscription gives you more tools for more adventures.

◆ Search by distance from you to find your nearest woodland walk or a new hill to scale, a little further afield. 
◆ Stay informed with live route planner details like air quality, pollen, and light pollution.
◆ Unplug completely or plan ahead and take a printed map. 
◆ Download offline maps ahead of time and track your GPS location, even without mobile signal.
◆ Keep your trusted safety contacts or loved ones in the loop with Live Share.
◆ Prepare for the hills ahead: Follow topo maps and trail maps in 3D.
◆ Focus on the view, not the map, with wrong-turn alerts.
◆ Get satellite weather with real-time map details.
◆ Record your activity with stats and photos of your favourite weekend walking paths, your longest bike route or even your most successful spot to bird watch.
◆ Stay on track: Automatically export your records to the Apple Health app.
◆ Give back: AllTrails donates a portion of every subscription to 1% for the Planet.
◆ Explore ad-free: Remove occasional ads by subscribing.

Whether you’re geocaching in a national park, browsing bucket-list mountain bike routes, or planning a walk in the countryside to clear your head, AllTrails+ makes the great outdoors even greater.
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using AllTrails! This update includes:
• Minor bug fixes

title: Wizz Air - Book Flights
description:
SIMPLY SEARCH AND BOOK 
What could be better than low-cost flight deals? Select from 200+ destinations, choose your ideal travel date and get set for cheap flights the easy way with the WIZZ Air flight deal and travel app.

ORGANISE YOUR ENTIRE HOLIDAY  
- Get flight deals via push notifications 
- Scan your documents for a faster booking and check-in process 
- Check in with your confirmation details and say goodbye to printing*  
- Check out your flight schedule and track your plane in real-time 
- Share flight searches with friends and family or send travel companions their boarding pass  
- Save your ticket to your Apple Wallet plus all your important travel documents to the app 
- Use the in-app boarding card – either online or offline! 
Fly to the most popular destinations across Europe, from Bucharest, Budapest, Krakow, Tirana and Vienna, to Lisbon, Rome, Naples, Milan, Malaga, Madrid and Athens.  Check out our low cost flights to the Middle East and places like Abu Dhabi, Alexandria, Amman, Muscat and Tel Aviv. 

FARE FINDER: 
Search for the lowest available fare for your journey and book your ticket at the best price.

HOTELS 
Reserve your hotel with Booking.com and get 5% of your booking value back as a WIZZ credit. 

WIZZ DISCOUNT CLUB 
Sign up to a WIZZ Discount Club membership and get discounted flight fares. 

AIRPORT TRANSFER:
Book a ride to and from the airport with our airport transfer service.

USE THE APP TO BUY AIRPORT EXTRAS LIKE… 
- Fast Track boarding and Lounge access  
- Car rental with Rentalcars.com where you can receive a 5% of your booking back as WIZZ credit value 
- Bus transfers at cheap prices from the airport to the centre of your destination city  

WIZZ MAGAZINE 
Stay entertained on board by downloading the WIZZ in-flight magazine before you board.

ADD SERVICES 
Want to add more luggage or change your reserved seat? No worries, you can add many travel-related services through the app. 

Follow WIZZ on social media for all of the latest news, offers and competitions  

Facebook @wizzair 
Instagram @wizzair 
Twitter @wizzair 

Available in almost 20 languages 
Arabic, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Dutch, English, French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Norwegian, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Spanish, Swedish, Ukrainian 

*Only at airports with permitted access.
releaseNotes:
Need something new in your life? Search for the lowest available fare for your journey and book your ticket at the best price with the new FARE FINDER function. 

Great news for those who always forget where their boarding pass is. Now you can store it digitally, in your secure and private Apple Wallet. There is no more “I have no idea where I last saw it”, because it’s always at hand. Amazing, isn’t it?
And we are always busy bees when it comes to developments and fixing some bugs.

title: Cheap flights - WayAway
description:
Search for cheap airline tickets

- We analyze air tickets - we compare prices and layover options, finding the cheapest air tickets and the most convenient flight options (direct or with a comfortable layover).
- Searching for air tickets doesn't take much time - we filter and sort all the options for you. And you can buy cheap air tickets. How do you like the idea?
- You can subscribe to notifications about the cheapest air ticket, the most convenient one or the most direct flight (yes, this is possible as well). This way you can keep track of changes in the cost of plane tickets. As soon as the price changes, we will send you a notification.
- But these are not all of the subscriptions! You can also subscribe to the search for air tickets from your city and catch cheap tickets for a plane that flies in the most unexpected direction. What a surprise!
- We also have a "Price Schedule" - it helps you buy a cheap ticket if you are not tied to the departure date.
- And the "Price Map" - in case you have not yet decided on your destination. The map shows both domestic and international flights.
- We save the passengers' passport information so that next time booking a flight won't take much time.
- It's so comfortable to plan weekend trips with us, to fly on Saturday morning and to go back on Sunday evening.
- And maybe you want to see around during the stopover - we will tell you which option is the most convenient if you want to see another city during the trip (also this type of air tickets is cheaper).
- Our developers made app filters for any occasion, including for tickets with luggage and filtering for aircraft models.
- If you don't want to search for flights on exact dates, you can choose one or several months and we will find plane tickets in a given range.

By the way, it's not only plane tickets search. We can also search for:

- Accommodation with recommendations according to your interests: business trip, family, romantic, good for instagram and so on.
- Guided and self-guided tours.
- Cars and transfers to get from the airport to the hotel. And wherever else you want to go

Download the WayAway app now to start traveling and buy tickets.

*** The application from WayAway.com allows you to find the lowest possible cost of an air ticket. We do not sell anything, we help you find flights online with the best conditions.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements to make your flight search even better and faster.
reviews: Superb

title: Liftago: Travel safely
description:
TAXI AND COURIER IN ONE APP
– Lightning-fast ordering: Order a driver in a few clicks and within minutes you or your shipment will be on the way.
– Perfect overview: You can see your driver’s location at all times and know exactly when they will arrive. Our drivers don't cancel rides and always arrive on time.
– Professional drivers and quality cars: You will only ride with verified drivers, who you select based on offered price, arrival time, car or ratings.
– Favorite service: Our customers have made Liftago the top-rated iOS transport app in the world.
– Payment options: Pay the driver in cash or by card via the app.

100% SAFE TAXI
– All drivers speak Czech (some speak English as well), and are licensed and insured up to 35 million CZK per passenger.
– We have strict standards (40% of drivers fail the selection process).
– We conduct hundreds of mystery rides per month.
– We respond to every customer suggestion and complaint
– You can share your route with your loved ones during the ride.
– Your contact details are anonymised.
– If you rate your experience with 3 or fewer stars, we will no longer connect you with that driver.

FAST COURIER ON DEMAND
– Send shipments or get something delivered to you in just a few clicks.
– You can order an express courier or book one for a specific time slot.
– It's handy for picking up orders from a store or a parcel box or delivering flowers..

LIFTAGO FOR BUSINESS
Liftago is a solution with high service standards that businesses can rely on. Pay for rides with one monthly invoice and have a detailed overview of your entire team's expenses. Simply order a ride via mobile or web app. Try Liftago for Business and gain even more benefits. Interested? Email us at sales@liftago.com.

Did you forget something in the taxi? You can contact the driver directly via the app for 24 hours after the trip. Alternatively, email us at service@liftago.com and we'll be happy to help.
releaseNotes: Improvements on the horizon! Update your app and look forward to the new taxi and courier features we're excited about. And so will you.

title: Citymapper: Your Transport App
description:
Instantly compare your travel options in real-time across all transport modes globally, with live departures and bus locations!

Easily navigate your area with turn-by-turn directions for all your public transport, walking, cycling and scooter trips. 

THOUSANDS OF 5 STAR REVIEWS

* "Life changing. This app really changes the way you travel."
* "The only true five star app."
* "BEST TRANSPORT APP EVER."
* "It's become a weird and possibly sad fact of my life that waiting and receiving Citymapper updates have overtaken Christmases and birthdays on the anticipation and excitometer."

FIND THE BEST ROUTE ► Simple trip planning combining all transport modes: bus, tube, train, tram, ferry, cabs, rideshare, carshare, bike hire, e-scooters and walking. Discover routes you never knew existed

HIT THE GO BUTTON FOR STEP-BY-STEP DIRECTIONS ► Turn-by-turn navigation for all your transport, walking, personal cycling, bike shares and scooter trips. Choose between 3 different map views, see the charge levels of e-bikes around you, we even help you avoid no-parking zones. We take care of the logistical thinking so you are free to enjoy the ride

BEAT THE RUSH HOUR CROWD ► Live wait times and ETA so you'll never miss a bus, train or tram again. Follow your bus / train as it's approaching on a real-time map, see the best carriage to board, get alerted when it's time to get off, and get in and out from the best exit at any underground / train station 

PERSONALISE YOUR APP ► Save Home, Work and your go-to stops or stations for lightning fast trip planning. Subscribe to your favourite tube, train, bus or tram line for automatic disruption, delay, and status alerts

GET SOCIAL ► Share your live trip: let friends follow your live trip to know when you'll arrive. Share any location or address: one tap for others to get directions

TRAVEL OFFLINE ► Access offline the official TfL underground map and many other local network maps

EXPERIENCE ONE-STOP-SHOP MOBILITY ► Compare cab fares, hail a ride, grab the closest carshare, hop on a shared bike all from within the app. Our partners include: Uber, Gett, Zipcar, Ola, Getaround, FREENOW, LIME, Santander Cycles, Forest, Beryl, Anywheel

COVERAGE ► London and the South East | Birmingham and the Midlands | Manchester | Liverpool | Yorkshire | Edinburgh | Dublin | Paris | New York | Singapore | Taiwan | Hong Kong | Los Angeles | Barcelona | Berlin | Rome | Madrid | Hamburg | Milan | Stockholm | Chicago | Toronto | Sydney + many more in the UK worldwide!

PUBLIC TRANSPORT AGENCIES ► We use open data from public transport agencies including:

UK WIDE | National Rail, Arriva, Stagecoach, First bus
LONDON | TfL (Transport for London), Underground, Overground, Docklands Light Railway (DLR), Tramlink 
MANCHESTER | TfGM (Transport for Greater Manchester), Manchester Metrolink 
LIVERPOOL | Merseytravel, Merseyrail
YORKSHIRE | WYCA (West Yorkshire Combined Authority), SYPTE (South Yorkshire Public Transport Executive), Sheffield Supertram
WEST MIDLANDS | TfWM (Transport for West Midlands), West Midlands Railway, Midland Metro, National Express West Midlands, National Express Coventry, Travel Telford, Worcestershire County Council, Diamond Bus
NOTTINGHAM | NCT, NET
EDINBURGH | TfE, Lothian Bus, Edinburgh Tram
GLASGOW | SPT
BRISTOL | Travelwest, MetroBus, Bristol Ferries
CARDIFF | Transport for Wales, Cardiff Bus
NEWCASTLE | NEXUS, Tyne and Wear Metro
BRIGHTON | Brighton & Hove Buses
DUBLIN | TFI, NTA, Bus Éireann, Dublin Bus, Iarnród Éireann (Irish Rail)
HONG KONG | MTR, HK Tramways, Light Rail, Kowloon Motor Bus, Citybus, First Bus, First Ferry, Star Ferry, Discovery Bay Ferry & Bus, Park Island Ferry & Bus, Green Mini Bus
SINGAPORE | LTA, SMRT, SBS

KEEP IN TOUCH ► Questions, feedback or something we have missed in your city? Email us at support@citymapper.com

Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Citymapper
Visit our website: http://citymapper.com

title: Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker
description:
The world's best flight tracker app - #1 Travel app in over 150 countries.

Turn your iPhone or iPad into a live flight tracker and see planes around the world move in real-time on a detailed map. Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

• Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
• Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
• See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
• Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
• See historical data & watch playback of past flights
• Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
• Search and bookmark individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
• Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
• Get a detailed list of all flights in your area.
• NEW - view aircraft in 3D with hundreds of new aircraft and airline liveries added.

Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
SILVER

• 90 days of flight history
• More aircraft details
• More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
• Filters and alerts to find and track flights
• Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
GOLD

• All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
• 365 days of flight history
• Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
• Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
• Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
• Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions during flight, when available
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS

Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 35,000 ground stations around the world to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration (MLAT), we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. 

CONNECT WITH FLIGHTRADAR24

We love getting feedback on FR24. Since we’re unable to respond directly to reviews, you can contact us directly and we’ll be happy to assist.
• Email (support@fr24.com)
• X (@Flightradar24)
• Facebook (@Flightradar24)
• YouTube (@Flightradar24DotCom)

DISCLAIMER

The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement.

Terms of Service: https://www.flightradar24.com/terms-and-conditions
releaseNotes:

 • Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Enjoy using Flightradar24? Rate the app and leave a review!

title: Sygic Travel Maps Trip Planner
description:
Discover things to do anywhere you go. Plan detailed trip itineraries. Get around with useful travel guides. An ultimate all-in-one app for every traveler.

ADVANCED TRIP PLANNER
Build a complete day-to-day itinerary for your trip with an easy-to-use trip planner. See estimated travel times and walking distances and keep realistic plans. Invite your friends to collaborate on your trips.

WORLDWIDE OFFLINE MAPS
Buy Sygic Travel Premium to use the app without any internet connection, including unlimited offline maps download and walking navigation.

50 MILLION PLACES
Sights, museums, parks, cafés, restaurants, hotels, beaches, waterfalls, caves or even bird observatories. Whether you're a tourist up to sightseeing, out on a shopping trip or a romantic weekend getaway, we've got you covered.

PHOTOS, DESCRIPTIONS, WIKIPEDIA
Popular places come with descriptions, photos, opening hours, admission fees, links and additional data written by professional travel editors or sourced from Wikipedia and other databases.

CITY GUIDES
Get all sorts of useful information about a destination on this new screen. Collections make it easy to discover interesting and popular places, such as "Best Beaches" or "Modern Architecture". Read up on local history, get useful tips on getting around, understand local culture and learn about the dos and don'ts. Insightful guides are available for thousands of cities including London, Paris, New York City, Rome, Barcelona, San Francisco, Las Vegas and other popular destinations.

360° VIDEOS
Take a look around top sights in exclusive 360° videos. Over 500 professional videos from Prague, Barcelona, Valencia, Madrid, Granada, Seville, Marrakech, Gran Canaria, Porto, Lisbon, Athens, Istanbul, Cairo, Tel Aviv, Jerusalem, Bethlehem and Vienna. 360° videos also support Cardboard.

POWERFUL SEARCH AND FILTERS
Find any place by name or address. Use filters to show attractions, museums, shopping malls, restaurants, bars down to art galleries featuring Van Gogh paintings.

TOURS AND ACTIVITIES
Find the best sightseeing tours, cruises, or even local cuisine cooking classes. Buy skip-the-line tickets to top attractions straight from the app.

ACCOMMODATION
Find a hotel, hostel, apartment or b&b. Add it to your trip and see it in your daily itinerary including travel times. Book your accommodation with booking.com straight from the app.

USE ON ALL DEVICES
Your trips will sync automatically between all your devices and our web planner available at https://maps.sygic.com

Using Google Trips? Beware that the trip planning app will be retired on August 5, 2019. Sygic Travel is a great alternative to consider.

SYGIC TRAVEL PREMIUM
Unlock all the features of Sygic Travel on all devices signed in with the same account. You can choose from the following subscription options:

Sygic Travel Premium Monthly Subscription for £3.49*
Sygic Travel Premium Yearly Subscription for £13.49*

You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Payment will be charged to iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the 'Manage Subscription' page in settings.

*The price might differ in your local currency due to different taxes and exchange rates.

GET IN TOUCH WITH US
Check out our online travel maps at https://maps.sygic.com
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SygicTravel
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SygicTravel/
Contact our support team: team@travel.sygic.com
Privacy policy: https://www.sygic.com/company/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://travel.sygic.com/lp/terms/
releaseNotes:

- Support for new devices and capabilities (iPhone 14 Pro, Apple Watch Ultra, Stage Manager)
- Map reworked with new rendering library
- Map markers load faster

Good job. | Naplanujete body a potom v sygicu navigujete | Great | Super apka 👍 | Výborná appka, informace užitečné, ale v angličtině | I really enjoy this application and has my all points. Blbý, když jedete na motorce a chcete se podle mapy orienovat :) Navíc obsahem premium nejsou často ani fotky u POI ani wiki články. title: FlixBus - Bus travel
description:
Welcome to the FlixBus app!


We are thrilled to announce that FlixBus, the world's largest bus network, is now available in India! 


With FlixBus, you can effortlessly book bus tickets from all our brands including FlixBus, Greyhound, Kamil Koç and FlixTrain, across Europe, North America, India, and South America. 


Easy and Sustainable Travel 

FlixBus simplifies travel by offering convenient and eco-friendly options. With the FlixBus app you can book bus tickets across Europe, North America, South America and India. 


Looking for travel inspiration?

Explore our route map and live timetables to find your next destination, whether you are looking for an exciting adventure in a bustling city or a tranquil getaway, FlixBus has you covered.


Why Choose the FlixBus App?
•	Keep all your bus tickets in one place.
•	Receive exclusive discounts only available on the app.
•	Quickly discover the cheapest bus tickets to your chosen destination.
•	Use the app to locate your stop effortlessly and navigate your way to it.
•	Travel without luggage hassles: enjoy one free checked bag and one carry-on with each ticket.
•	Reserve seats, book additional baggage, and manage your bookings effortlessly within the app.
•	Book bus tickets well in advance or opt for same-day travel for spontaneous trips.
•	Receive important trip updates directly to your phone. Stay up to date on delays or stop changes.
•	Whether you’ve lost something or have questions, our app has you covered with FAQs and convenient contact options.
•	Benefit from the extensive reach of the world's largest bus network.

How to book a bus ticket with FlixBus?

It's easy to buy a bus ticket with the FlixBus app: simply select your departure and arrival cities, pick your date to travel and then checkout with your preferred payment method! After booking you will receive a booking confirmation by email containing all your trip details


Why Travel with FlixBus?

Travel with FlixBus for a journey that combines comfort, safety, and convenience. Our buses are equipped with adjustable seats, air conditioning, personal power outlets, free Wi-Fi and onboard toilets. Safety is a priority for us, so rest assured that your journey will be in capable hands.
No need to worry about packing light - FlixBus offers a generous luggage policy: carry one 7kg bag (30cm x 18cm x 42cm), and one 20kg checked bag (50cm x 30cm x 80cm). Need more? Add an extra bag of carry-on dimensions directly through our app. Travel comfortably, knowing your belongings you don’t have to pack light.


Live Tracking and Timetables

Stay informed in real time with our live coach times and bus tracking features. Easily access e-tickets, keep an eye on live bus times while waiting for your bus, and track the progress of your journey. Use our live timetables to conveniently plan trips that fit your schedule and receive updates directly in the app.


Green Travel Initiative

FlixBus is dedicated to eco-friendly travel. We continuously strive to reduce our ecological footprint by using the latest environmentally friendly buses, optimizing routes, and utilizing efficient driving techniques. Our commitment to sustainability means every journey you take with us contributes to a greener future.


Join us on a journey that's not just about reaching your destination, but also about traveling responsibly and comfortably. With FlixBus, every trip is an experience.
releaseNotes:
Just saying Hi with some performance improvements.
Have a great day and happy traveling!

title: Couchsurfing Travel App
description:
You have friends around the world, you just haven’t met them yet. 

Couchsurfing is the best way to stay with amazing locals, make lifelong travel friends, or host travelers coming to your hometown. Over 12 million travel enthusiasts use Couchsurfing in more than 230,000 cities around the world.

Use the Couchsurfing app to plan and manage your trip itinerary.

Find hosts in your next destination
• Browse the millions of local hosts offering a place to stay in thousands of cities and towns
• Stay with and meet locals and have an authentic travel experience
• Explore accommodations options near where you are right now, or near your future destination

Make New Friends
• Discover thousands of fun events planned by other Couchsurfers in your hometown or in your next travel destination
• Use Couchsurfing Hangouts to show you who’s nearby your current location and available to meet up right now 

Meet Travellers Without Traveling
• Host or meet up with incoming travellers coming to your city
• Can’t travel right now? Let new cultures and friends come to you 

And More
• Easily create and manage a Couchsurfing profile 
• Manage your incoming or outgoing requests, messages, and more
• Add pictures to document your travel adventures
• See which of your Facebook friends also have a Couchsurfing account
releaseNotes: Hey Couchsurfers! In this release, you'll find a few bug fixes and usability improvements.
reviews:
It added so much to my life. Highly recommend. Lots of interesting like minded people. Sometimes the app is buggy but nothing major. | Nowhere on the website talks about a 60 bucks fee! Yet they charge it without a refund. Straight fraud! The app crashes, there aren’t many hosts in popular areas. You have to be very lucky to find someone. Inbox gets spammed by unrelated people. Not worth all the hassle. | The app is fine, I've even made friends on my trips thanks to it.
Unfortunately, I was careless and accidentally clicked the button to pay for lifetime subs when I registered. It cost me 60€, when I asked for a refund saying it was a mistake, they wrote that they can't give me a refund, be careful. | It conected me to Belgrade guys when i was at košice lol fix. I went to center to meet them after that we realized that we are like 500km from each other. Apart from that always happy | Pandemic unfortunately changed a lot and also CS. It was great, now there is not many people, lot of inactive and it would need restart. But the worst is that guys use this excellent platform as dating app. Be aware, they put preferred gender “female” and have only female recommendations. Also dangerous for solo female travellers. Maybe CS could do something about it? I hope the good days are still ahead… | Couchsurfing was good app. Its still good way to meet new people but you have to be very careful of your money. There is something what they call VERIFICATION by you card. But in real they steal money from your account. I say steal, because there is no imformation about paymant, just “verification”. So its regular theft. Im so disapointed of evolution of this app. If you want money back, contact you bank. I was successful! ;) Dont waste time with contact CF support. They made bussines on this “verification”. | You destroyed the couchsurfing community with your greediness. I used to be a verified user, paid 50 euros and you still forced me to pay subscription. Now the app is so broken, I can’t even pay a subscription to check my old messages and friends. It’s a shame, you intentionally destroyed the community and are refusing to change your policy, trying to squeeze every last penny out of it. You don’t even need that much money to maintain this kind of app.. just trying to stuff your pockets with money. Now you lost most of the activity on the platform, it’s dead. | I am a member since 2015. 
I used it a lot and I use to love it! 
The original-real-CS-spirit, which excludes money 100%. It was build by volunteers and now it is just another company which is focusing mainly on profit, rather than on humanity, good, positive, helpful atmosphere. 

The sadest part of it is: the volunteers who build it up back then, are now mostly blocked and gone - since they weren’t allowed to say their opinions. 
Also lots of my CS-friends, with many reviews and experience have left.

Use to be an amazing place… | After downloading the app, I paid the monthly subscription as per their COVID 19 regulations. The subscription is confirmed by my bank as well as Apple Pay but I still cannot use the app norme access the website. Rather disappointed! | Begging for money for the membership is the worst thing you can do. Count me out. 
Member since 2012 | Even with the circumstances putting everything behind a paywall so that you
1. have to pay when you just want to host... but most importantly
2. can’t even contact your old friends,
is just pure impudence and chutzpah. | Would a 100% recommend using this platform while travelling | The poorest decisions from the company to block, persecute and damage the users that made it possible. I know ambassadors with hundreds of references and friend who got blocked because they dared to speak up against recent changes. I’l leaving....and feel so sorry it had to come to this :( | A must for travelling. Easy to use. 
I’ve been using Couchsurfing for a few years now and it’s great, I have no complaints. | Why app with automatic progress need a lot off money? 😀 | I’m only getting started with couchsurfing But i Love it already. Meeting locals is a lot of fun and saving up some money while traveling helps a lot :) | This application changed my life - met many friends, they treat me like a family. Only a few unpleasant situations - this is way of living, connecting with people and hanging out. Thanks for making this. | I think it would crash the internet of I will try to describe how I am thankfull for this app! I always travel like a local, safe some money, have so much fun and amazing experience! | After the new update notifications ( message alerts, requests) almost coming after 2 days later | After I login into the app and re-laughit app, app is frozen. I see the only splash screen.

Iphone 7 | -Slow feedback
- Messiging responce with big delay
- I can imagin better UI for service big as this.. sometime problem to find right searching method.. | One of the oldest social connection of people from all over the world. Connecting people who are hosting, sharing and travelling :-) love it | Great app for open-minded travelers. | The best app for travellers! | One of the best idea of the world | The best travel app! 🔝 | Works very well! | Idiks funkce disk | The best chance meet new people and their culture. When you are couchsurfer You can save up some money and also you can enjoy a lot of fun, more than in the hotel. 
Be the host is also very interesting, you can share your city and with some amazing people. | Works well, no problem.. | A great service and an amazing app, thank you for that :) | Works perfectly;) | Really socializing :-)) | This app is just awesome! Best app for lowcost traveling. | Nice app | Amazing app for traveling, never had any problem. Thank you to the people who made this. | The app makes couchsurfing much easier | Love this app! Really helpful for all the travelers, even if you only want to know some information. Exciting people there. | Clear and useful app while traveling! | Let's try it. | Awesome app thanks for that ! | This app is very helpful for every kind of traveler. I can recommend to you, if you want to experience your travels from different view. | No neni to zas taková paráda, ale je to bajećno. Absinth | Much better than the website. | The best app for new friends and valuable relationships! ❤️❤️ | With this app travling is bigger fun! | Great app for all couchsurfers. You receive notification whenever you got new message, you can easily reply. Very user friendly. | Good app | Everything works as it should. No doubt the creators really care about the mobile version of their service.. more than satisfactory, I love to use it | The application is fine, without bugs and the update it regulary :)

title: momondo: Flights, Hotels, Cars
description:
Find, compare & book flights, hotels, and car hire with momondo’s beautiful all-in-one travel and reservation app

We believe that everybody should be able to travel - and there's no better place to start dreaming and planning than the momondo app. A beautiful, user-friendly design makes it easy to search and compare from hundreds of travel sites at once. Find just the right flight, hotel or car hire for your next holiday or business trip, at great prices. Save on travel deals with exclusive Mobile Rates available only on the app.

FIND THE BEST FLIGHT DEALS AVAILABLE FROM 900+ TRAVEL SITES
• We search major airlines, low cost carriers and travel agencies to give you an easy overview of all the airfare options
• We highlight airline ticket options with no change fees, to make it easy to book with flexibility
• With this reservation app, you can make a flight booking directly from your device, wherever you are
• Filter plane tickets by the factors that matter to you, including number of stops, departure and arrival time, duration, airlines and ticket type
• Cheapest, quickest or best flight deal? With one click you can see which ticket is the best deal according to your needs
• Not ready to book? Save your results for later, or share them via email or text
• Search without worry - the prices you see are never affected by your searches
• Beautiful and easy to use – finding the perfect plane ticket doesn’t have to be tricky and dull

SEARCH THOUSANDS OF CAR RENTAL OFFERS AT ONCE
• See rental car deals in 70,000+ locations
• Filter your search to see eco-friendly options like hybrids and electric vehicles
• Easily filter to only see car hire with free cancellation and enhanced cleaning
• Total transparency, no surprises -  see the total cost of your car rental up-front

SEE DEALS FROM 3M+ HOTELS AND HOLIDAY HOMES IN ONE PLACE
• Search from all the major booking, accommodation, and rental comparison sites as well as individual hotel websites to find the best place to stay
• Use our filter to find stays with free cancellation, so you can cancel and re-book a hotel or holiday rental for free if you find a better deal
• See ratings based on millions of real guest reviews, so you know what everyone else is saying about a property before you book
• Looking for something close to home? Get inspired with amazing hotel deals right here in the UK.
• Find last minute hotel deals with the Around Me Tonight feature
• Sort accommodation results by cheapest, closest, best review, or most popular
• Search by the amenities that matter most to you
• Beautiful and user-friendly – finding a place to stay has never looked this good or been this easy

A PERSONALISED SEARCH EXPERIENCE
• Create your own momondo profile to keep everything the way you like it
• Not just a reservation app. Save and sync your preferences, your search history and all your favourite flights and hotels
• Search from one device – and book from another.

LOOKING FOR INSPIRATION?
Not sure where to go? Our Explore feature makes it easy to find destinations within your budget. Your next best holiday destination may be somewhere you’ve never even heard of!

Download the momondo travel app now and open your world.

title: Jízdní řády IDOS
description:
Oblíbený bezplatný nástroj pro vyhledávání spojení v novém! Nový design a uživatelské prostředí, vyšší stabilita a rychlost, aktuální data všech dostupných jízdních řádů pro vlaky, autobusy a MHD. 

Aplikace je podporována na iOS 8 a vyšším. Dotazy a problémy prosím pište na appdev@idnes.cz. Děkujeme.

Hlavní funkce:
	• Vyhledání vlakových, autobusových a MHD spojů včetně zadání zastávky z mapy
	• Online vyhledávání = vždy aktuální a oficiální informace včetně zpoždění a výluk
	• Offline možnost si prohlížet historii vyhledaných spojení
	• Inteligentní našeptávač zastávek a adres s návrhem oblíbených spojů
	• Automatická detekce MHD jízdního řádu a nejbližší zastávky dle GPS
	• Výběr dopravních prostředků v Rozšířeném nastavení a nastavení zobrazených možností v Nastavení
	• SMS jízdenky
	• Široké možnosti sdílení spojení
	• Zobrazení odjezdů/příjezdů z vybrané zastávky s možností filtrovat na konkrétní spoj
	• Uložení 6 spojení do oblíbených, 6 posledních hledání v historii s offline přístupem k výsledkům hledání
	• Vyhledávání bezbariérových spojení, spojení pro cyklisty nebo pro cestující s dětmi
	• Podrobné informace o spoji včetně nástupiště, koleje, čísle zastávky, zpoždění, aktuální pozice spoje na mapě, výlukách, orientační ceně jízdného a řazení vlakových vozů s popisem
	• Zobrazení trasy a polohy spoje na mapě
	• Kontextové propojení do prodejních systémů třetích stran pro rezervaci/zakoupení jízdného
	• Zobrazení legendy k použitým piktogramům
	• Nápověda - průvodce aplikací
	• Možnost odstranění reklam na vždy za poplatek (naleznete v nastavení pod ikonou Více)
	
Možnosti vyhledávání
	• Postupné zadávání názvu a zužování výběru z našeptávače
	• Zadání začátku názvu
	• Zadání začátků slov - např. "P H" = Praha Hradčanská
	• Zadání textu obsaženého v názvu - např.  "UAN" = Ostrava UAN, Brno UAN, Praha UAN
	• Možnost zadat jako cíl adresu nebo název objektu - např. "Praha, Divadlo v Dlouhé" nebo "Praha, Ve Smečkách" = najde nejbližší zastávku k tomuto bodu a spojení z výchozí polohy hledání
	• Možnost zadat "!" Před název zastávky nebo cíle a omezí se našeptávač na první nalezenou položku např. "!Ben" = Benešov
releaseNotes:
Updates in the 2.13.2 version

added less important features and utilities,
improved stability and bug fixes.

title: Polarsteps - Travel Tracker
description:
Plan, track, and relive your travels. Record your route automatically, keeping your phone in your pocket and eyes on the world.

Over 5 million explorers have chosen Polarsteps to create and capture their adventures. This all-in-one travel app shows you the world’s most enticing travel destinations, gives you insider tips and plots your route, locations and photos when the journey is underway. The result? A beautiful digital world map that is unique to you! As well as the chance to turn it all into a hardback Travel Book when you’re done. And it doesn’t stop there...

Doesn’t drain your battery, works offline and you have full privacy control.

PLAN

■ Polarsteps Guides, created by our travel-loving editors and other explorers like you, show you the best of the world (as well as giving you top tips for once you get there).
■ Itinerary Planner to build your dream (editable) itinerary.
■ Transport Planner helping you get from A to B with clear transport options between destinations.

TRACK

■ Automatically track and plot your path on a digital world map (that grows fuller as your passport does).
■ Add photos, video, and thoughts to your steps along the way making your memories all the more vivid.
■ Save spots that you love so that you can always find your way back.

SHARE

■ Leave tips for the travelling community on where to go and what to see.
■ Share your journey with friends and family if you want to. Or keep it to yourself. You have full privacy controls.
■ Follow others and share in their adventures.

RELIVE

■ Retrace your steps – scrolling through places, photos, and your travel stats.
■ Create a unique Travel Book filled with your pictures and stories with the touch of a button.

WHAT THE PRESS ARE SAYING ABOUT POLARSTEPS

"The Polarsteps app replaces your travel journal, making it easier and more beautiful." - National Geographic

"Polarsteps helps you track and share your journeys in an easy and visually appealing way." - The Next Web

"Polarsteps' resulting travel log is impressive, and is the source of a severe case of itchy feet in your correspondent." - TechCrunch

FEEDBACK

Questions, thoughts, or feedback? We'd love to hear what you think about Polarsteps. Get in touch via support@polarsteps.com.
releaseNotes: Hey travelers, we updated the app and squashed some bugs you were reporting. Thanks for the feedback! We're always listening on support@polarsteps.com

Love the app have already 11 books but, would appreciate more freedom with picture sizing and resizing. | I really like this app! | I have had problem with photo quality. It's maybe problem of photo export but it is impossible to find out problem. I have tried to write my problem on your facebook site (my initials are N.P.) but support this doesn't work :( | Polarsteps makes it super enjoyable and convenient to track your trip and to share it with your family & friends. Also the map was pretty useful and accurate especially when we were in the in the midst of the Sichuan countryside and neither Google maps or Baidu maps were able to tell us wether there was a passage through the forrest or not. Thank you Polarsteps team! Keep up the good work! Eva & Lars | Rychle dodani, kvalitni papir, ferova cena v porovnani s podobnymi nastroji. Mohu jen doporucit. title: BlaBlaCar: Carpooling and Bus
description:
Carpooling
Driving somewhere?
Share your ride and start saving on travel costs!
• Publish your next ride in just minutes: it’s easy and fast
• Decide who goes with you: review passengers’ profiles and ratings to know who you’re travelling with.
• Enjoy the ride: that’s how easy it is to start saving on travel costs!

Want to go somewhere?
Book, meet and travel at low prices no matter where you’re going.
• Search for a ride among thousands of destinations.
• Find the ride closest to you: there’s maybe one leaving from just around the corner.
• Book a seat instantly or request a seat: it’s simple!
• Get closer to where you want to go, thanks to thousands of carpool options.

BlaBlaCar buses
Book your next bus ride and travel at low prices.
• Choose among a wide choice of destinations.
• Bag a bargain with bus tickets from just €3.99 for trips in France or in Germany.
• Book your bus ticket easily and enjoy the ride.

-------------------------
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
TELL US WHAT YOU THINK: https://www.blablacar.co.uk/contact
releaseNotes: In this version of BlaBlaCar, we've made a few tweaks and done a bit of fine-tuning to make the app even easier to use!
