Aplikace vam nahlasi chybu pri aktivaci jizdenky, tak ji aktivujete znovu a pak zjistite, ze platite jizdenky 2. Odmitnou vam vratit penize. 
Nebo musite na aktivaci cekat 2 minuty, tedy nemuzete treba na posledni chvili naskocit do tramvaje. Takze si koupite jizdenku a jeste dostanete pokutu. 
Myslim, ze vyvojari jsou sprizneni s prazskou dopravou a okradaji spolu lidi. Doporucuji aplikaci odinstalovat. | Aplikace naprosto nahovno. Nemuzu si ani zmenit heslo, po zmene furt tvrdi ze mam nespravne.
Takze zpet fyzicky do fronty a koupit papirovou kravinu. Nebo resit mesic s supportem a dokazovat ze mi to fakt nefunguje. | Aplikace, která Vás obere o peníze. Pak se ani nestaví nějak kladně k tomu, aby Vám pomohli vyřešit problém. Při placení měsíční jízdenky se aplikace zasekla a spadla. Ihned jsem kontrolovala zda se lístek podařilo zakoupit, nic jsem ale neměla strženého z účtu a v aplikaci taky nebyl žádný náznak že se nákup zdařil. Chvíli jsem počkala a zkusila nákup znova. Tentokrat se podarilo. V aplikaci jsem mela jen ten jeden lístek. Jelikoz jsem za cely měsíc nepotřebovala lístek ukázat, všimla jsem si az při koupi na další měsíc, ze mam lístky dva. Psala jsem na podporu a zaslala jim veškeré podklady, ale bez sebemenší starosti o zákazníka mi napsali at si vytisknu formulář a zajdu někam do Prahy na pobočku jak přes 100 lety a na to opravdu nemam prostor. Neumí udělat funkční aplikaci a mají nulovou zákaznickou péči. Samozřejmě v jejich odpovědi byl i text o tom v jakých všech xxx případech nemam nárok. Jediné co mě zaskočilo, je ta dvouminutová prodleva při aktivaci jízdenky. Mám roční kupón a teprve nedávno jsem potřeboval jízdenku na zóny, které nemám zaplacené. Aktivoval jsem ji před nástupem do autobusu a najednou zjistil, že je tam ta prodleva. Naštěstí byl řidič shovívavý (meziměstský spoj s nástupem pouze předními dveřmi). | Nedávno zmizely z aplikace vyjezdove a zatahujici tramvajové spoje, Respektive se ukazují pouze v trase kde jedou po trase linky. | Užitečná aplikace pro jednorázové i opakované nákupy jízdenek. V kombinaci s ApplePay je to super. | Další příklad zpackaného pokusu o digitalizaci. Na zastávce, kde autobusy jezdí plus mínus 10 a víc minut mimo jízdní řád, jsem si aktivoval jízdenku v momentě, kdy jsem autobus viděl přijíždět. Následně jsem musel nastoupit ještě před plarností a hned u dveří mě legitimoval revizor, kupón někde uprostřed 2min karenční doby. Přestože věděl, že byl kupón aktivován už venku, uložil pokutu a reklamační odd. dpp ji potvrdilo. I když nejspíš mají info, kdy autpbus zastavil a že byl kupón již aktivní. Tohle prosím hoďte do kanálu. A mně nezbývá, než přesednout do auta, protože tohle jako zákazník odmítám akceptovat. | I had a problém after buying 24h ticket for 13 zones. That there is very small text, that it is not applicable in Prague. Although it was in chart Prague+other zones. I know  it is my mistake, that I missed it. But the warning should be bigger or there should be written all zones, where it is aplicable. | Funguje celkem dobře, ale při psaní stanice/zastávky se aplikace celkem seká. A klepnutí na šipky (prohození stanic) reaguje jak se tomu zachce. | This app allows you to buy tickets and then activate them in the app. However, after pressing activate button it takes 2 minutes before the ticket becomes valid and the app does not inform about it. People are getting fined for this. It’s better to buy paper tickets. | Missing an option to remove unused identifiers. Why would you need to keep information of my old expired debit card or an old phone. 

The blinding feature on tickets tab could be optional… | When there is a few days left user is notified. If you decide to buy another pass, its overlapping for a few days instead of starting after the previous one ends. This is very fraud-like user experience. Well done PID. | Nejde stáhnout do Apple Watch nebo do Apple Wallet. | Pro vyhledání všeho ohledně spojů MHD v Praze výborné. Pro nákup jízdenek funguje sice bez problémů, ale po nákupu nesmíte zapomenout aktivovat 2 min před nástupem do tramvaje, anebo koupit jízdenku na konkrétní spoj, opět 2 min předem, ale už bez nutné aktivace 2 min předem.
Pro parkování radši využijte CityMove, vývojářům PID doporučuji na tuto apku kouknout. PID má totiž problém s kartama, placením, nedostatečně informuje o tom kolik času vám zbývá a ani neupozorní na konec parkování...někdy si myslíte, že vše proběhlo, ale chyba lávky.... | This App is the best (and official!) for travelling around Prague. You can use Apple Pay and they are not charging any hidden fees like some other apps (yes EasyPark I'm talking about you!). This app is the best for parking in Prague as well. Please don't use any other unofficial apps because they steal money with their nonsense extra fees (for example easypark). Also it looks like EasyPark is paying bots to make fake bad reviews for PID, so be aware! | I primarily use this app for my annual ticket, aiming to demonstrate its validity. Unfortunately, I faced challenges as the app unexpectedly logged me out.
The login experience was suboptimal, especially considering the prevalence of password managers. It was inconvenient not being able to paste the password, particularly when needing to quickly access my ticket. 
I wonder if there's a necessity to log users out of the app. If so, perhaps notifying users via email could help, as some may not check the app frequently. | Po posledním updatu nejde ani otevřít. | V aplikaci mi to při každém pokusu přidání fotky sníží kvalitu a tím pádem mi ji to neschváli. Další věc je, že při pokusu o změnu identifikátoru se to sice tváří že došlo ke změně, ale ve finále nedošlo a kvůli tomu jsem dostala pokutu od revizora. Prý nejsem první u koho toto chování viděl. | How do I buy ticket for kid?
How/where do I apply discount for kid with isic?
Why so complicated? | Nelze zakoupit jízdenku, platba neproběhne. | Kdykoli cestuji do Prahy, tak aplikace vždy slouží jak má. Naprostá spokojenost. | Appka na iOS neukládá state restoration. Když jsem na detailu spojení a nechám na pozatí, vrátím se do appky a dám aktualizovat zpoždění appka spadne nebo se vrátí domů když nespadne.

Další co bych očekával se swipe na další/přechozí spoj v detailu spoje ne jen na listingu spojů.

Ještě bych rád viděl na mapě trasu spoje celou, nejen co jedu já.

Díky jinak supr appka! | Nepřišla notifikace o konci platnosti kupónu. Dlužíte mi 1000. | Just came into the tram, activated the ticket right next to the ticket machine upon entering the tram. Then the person that checks the tickets came by and asked me for my ticket, and he could see that the ticket was activated beforehand but had 1 minute left on the activation clock. Nevertheless, I got fined 1000 CZK for having an invalid ticket. Absolute nonsense!!! What’s the point of the app if you cannot use it??? Absolute nonsense. | Na iPhone SE 2020 se nedá koupit (prodloužit roční kupon). Na iPhone 13 to jde, takže předpokládám, ze to aplikace nezvládá na tomto starším kousku. (Telefon má aktuální iOS i aplikaci a byl zrestartován). | I have there my all year coupon. The purchase of other tickets is also easy. Perfect that apple pay works nicely.
But what I really miss is a no app for apple watch. | When i tried to buy 30day praha subsc, the app didn’t let me to do this and gave me error. And for the second time it won’t buyed too and then i realized that app took my money from my bank account 2times and after 3-4 min it started showing i have 2 absolutely identical subscriptions. 

I lost my money because of this, u just need to fix it or it’d be considered as scam. | Na příměstských linkách pravidelně nejde načíst QR kód jízdenky zobrazený aplikací na iPhonu. Nakupování jízdenek v aplikaci pak nemá cenu, jejich kontrola při nástupu pak zdržuje ostatní cestující. Zajímavé je že s ostatními aplikacemi podobného typu (ČD můj vlak, Arriva, atd.) toto funguje mnohem spolehlivěji.

title: Tiqets - Museums & Attractions
description:
The Tiqets app opens the doors of culture to those who don’t want to wait in culture’s long lines! Whether you’re at home or already traveling, you can browse cultural attractions, read venue reviews, and purchase paperless tickets without leaving the app. With tickets delivered instantly to your smartphone, and many skip-the-line options, never again must you spend needless time waiting in line.

Skip-the-line tickets - no waiting at hundreds of venues
Mobile tickets - tickets right on your smartphone, be it online or offline. No printing required
Secure payments - pay for your tickets quickly and safely with a wide range of payment methods 
Inspiration - insider tips and trusted reviews to help you plan your trip
Quality information - all required directions and opening hours in one place

Top Cities
Amsterdam, New York, Paris, Rome, Barcelona, London, Berlin, Budapest, Las Vegas, Florence and many, many others.

Top Venues
Sagrada Familia, Vatican Museums & Sistine Chapel, Louvre, Park Güell, Rijksmuseum, Burj Khalifa, Prado Museum, Musée d’Orsay, Heineken Experience, Van Gogh Museum, 9/11 Memorial and Museum and more, so much more.

This app may contain translations powered by Google to help make content accessible in your own language.
releaseNotes: Embark on a captivating journey with the latest Tiqets App update. Our refreshed onboarding flow now delivers a sleeker and more intuitive introduction to our platform. Dive headfirst into seamless exploration from the very moment you start using the app.
reviews: Really, helped us a lot 🤧 | Beware of this app for Italy. We were in Rome and Pompei. Tickets via this app are ~30% than real prices in offices. | vyborné, rychlé a přehledné | Prices in app are about 30% higher than normal prices. Sometimes it can save you time in the line. But you can always find another way how to buy tickets without waiting in line.

title: RegioJet
description:
Easy booking and search of train and bus tickets - Tickets to more than 90 European cities - Free cancellation 15 minutes prior the departure
Travel across Czechia, Slovakia, and Europe with yellow trains or buses

Save your time
- easy search of train and bus tickets across Czechia and Europe
- fast booking including a seat reservation
- free ticket cancellation 15 minutes prior the departure

Save your money
- affordable prices for signed up customers (Credit ticket)
- exclusive ticket deals
- safe online payments

All information in one app
- quick, simple, clear
- booking history
- timetables and a map of the stops
- search history
releaseNotes:
Adjustments and clarification of tariffs for passengers
Better error handling
Other minor fixes
reviews:
Nevidím, kterou kartou jsem zaplatil danou jízdenku. Aplikace občas strhne kredit, i když vysloveně zvolím, že chci platit pouze kartou. Pokud je placeno částečně kreditem, tak Firma není schopna vystavit daňový doklad na platbu strženou z karty, ale pouze na celou jízdenku. Kdo tohle vymyslel 🤷‍♂️🤯 | Unfortunately you now have to order the food via the application… while you can’t add your ticket there. Really disappointed that I’m on the train right now with no breakfast, while I was hoping for the great food that I’m used too on this train. | Bohužel si bez teto apky ve vlaku nic neobjednáte, takže chtě nechtě ji musíte mít. Nejvíce ale vypovídá, že i na regiojet wifi ve vlaku tahle apka ztrácí připojení a proklikat se objednávkou je boj na 20 minut. Hvězdičku dávám za snadné zobrazení místa a odpočet dojezdu do cíle. | Muzete mi vysvetlit proc POKAZDE menite ty typy vozu?? Proste nasbirate penize na lidech co si dopredu vyberou jak chteji cestovat a pak jen "na*rat"! Proc si asi clovek vybira jak idiot sedadlo abyste pak zmenili cely vuz a rozhazeli to uplne nesmyslne?? Asi kdyz si clovek rezervuje pro skupinu kupe chce byt pohromade, stejne jako kdyz si zaplati samostatne sedadlo tak asi nechce sedet nekde namackany na ostatni! | Po aktualizaci jiz apka nefunguje a to jsem ji pouzivala roky 😢 Ted nekze zakoupit jizdenky. | Pomalá, seká se | Wanted to order food But RegioJet offered just a crushing disappointment of a dream (and stomach) left unfulfilled. | Zcela bežně se mi stává, že jízdenka nejde vůbec koupit. Několikrát se mi stalo, že jízdenka sice šla koupit, přičemž mi byla z karty stržena platba, ale aplikace tvrdí, že žádné aktuální jízdenky nemám. Pak už jen čekáte, jestli se vám někdy objeví nebo ne… 😡
Ještě nikdy jsem snad nezažila, aby aplikace fungovala tak, jak má… | Great things:
- app works as intended 
- live activities implemented, great way to inform passenger about the trip 

Ugly:
- live activities rely on just a timer, not a gps info from the bus. There’s no way to check current position of a bus/train
- no actual gps data means that automatic delay refunds also don’t work - my bus was delayed 70 min, but system declares only 20
- UX in paying is complicated for a senior buyer - you have to choose Apple Pay twice, in a second step through a web page (unnecessarily) with a tiny unreadable font | Přetíženost
A párování kreditních jízdenek s mobilním číslem nebo e-mailem .
Uz mám 5 kreditních jízdenek a 966 normálních jízdenek | Dost problematická appka, která je velmi často přetížená a pokud si bude chtít aktualizovat stav, kdy je možné si objednat, tak vám může úplně zmizet vaše jízdenka (která byla zakoupena přes app), poté jsem musela jízdenku vyhledat přes email a přihlásit se pomocí čísla. Velmi nepříjemná chvíle nejistoty. 
Bohužel mám takovou nepozitivní zkušenost i z používání v minulosti (nemožnost objednat ani zaplatit jídlo). Také se vám asi bohužel stane, že bude appka přetížená a budete muset počkat. Ono je to vždycky šokující, když vaše on-line služby chce najednou využívat více lidí. Kdo by to čekal...("sarkasmus"). 
Pro objednání jídla, je ale nutná, takže musíme jen doufat, že si její vývojáři budou chtít toto renomé napravit. | Často nefunguje, padá,.. člověk tak nemůže objednat nebo zrušit jízdenku | Ani přes opakované pokusy nejde v nové verzi (od 29.2.24) na iPadu zaplatit kartou. V předchozí verzi to fungovalo normálně. | Aplikace neustále padá, automaticky se sama odhlašuje, není schopná vyhledat jízdenky (píše, že momentálně probíhá velké množství vyhledávání).
Člověk by čekal, že aplikace, která má umožnit vyhledání a koupi jízdenek, bude schopna svoji hlavní a jedinou důležitou funkci umožnit. Bohužel velmi často nefunguje, jak by měla. | Nejde objednat a zaplatit jídlo ve voze Astra i české dráhy mají lepší možnosti zakoupení jídla | Love RegioJet, but this app sometimes does not work. | Конченное приложение, каждые 15 минут лагает. Невозможно нормально купить билет. Если бы можно было поставь 0 звёзд я бы поставил | Ten system je jeden velkej joke, neustále tam neco nefunguje. Pokud se vam změní plany a potrebujete stornovat listek (nejpozdeji 15m pred odjezdem vlaku) muze to klidne dopadnout tak, ze budete 30m klikat na storno a porad to bude hazet nejaky error. To same s nákupem listku. Misto přechodu v košíku na zaplacení (klik na tlačítko zaplatit) mi to naházelo do košíku dalsich 6 listku. Pro jejich odstraňování se neco 5m nacita a nic to nedela. Nepomáhá restart aplikace nic. Nevim jestli jejich server nezvládá nápor uživatelů nebo kde je problem, ale na vlakovou aplikaci, kde je nekdy potreba reagovat rychle z duvodu měnících se planu, je tohle totalni katastrofa. I Ceske drahy tu digitalizaci zvladaji lepe. Je to smutne, protoze Regiojet vstoupil na trh jako alternativa k tehdy jedinému dopravci s tim, ze ukáže, jak by mely vypadat dopravní vlakové sluzby 21. stoleti a stačilo par let a jsou na tom snad jeste hůř nez CD. 
Pokud mate moznost sednout do auta a jet si listek koupit osobne na nadrazi cca do 20min, bude to rychlejší varianta, nez pres aplikaci. | Několikrát jsem se při snaze koupit a používat aplikaci tolik naštvala, že jsem radši jela s jinou společností. 
Často se objevuje error, údajně kvůli zvýšenému momentálnímu vytížení, i uprostřed noci. Neustále nefunguje rezervování sedadla a poté zničehonic mám deset rezervací. Opakovaně problém s platbou, měla jsem mít koupenou jízdenku, platba se odečetla, ale pouze přičetla do peněženky. Takže jsem vinou aplikace musela kupovat jízdenku znovu přímo ve vlaku a s přirážkou. 
To, že se mi v průběhu hledání jen tak odhlásí účet a musím se přihlásit znovu, nebo že si aplikace nepamatuje jaký tarif volím a neustále mě zdržuje zaškrtáváním toho správného už beru jako detail. | Absolutně odporná a věčně přetížená aplukace. 3 hodiny mi hlásí, že je přetížená a nedá se používat a pak se všechny lístky vyprodají. 3x jsem musel na pobočku řešit lístek, který mi aplikace zrušila, ale nevrátila peníze. Úplně dementní systém účtů. Kdyby šlo dát nula hvězd tak dávám. | Co s tou appkou je? Nemůžu si koupit jizdenku, proces se zastavi v košíku a dal mě to nepustí. O tom, ze mě to už aspoň 10x odhlásila ani nemluvim. No dnes fakt tragické. Nejhorší je, ze na webu to není o nic lepší. | Being unable to order food because it's possible only for 60+ min. rides and yours is 58 min. just doesn't feel good. | Kdykoli má člověk potřebu aplikaci použít, aplikace zaznamenává větší počet vyhledávání, tedy nefunguje. | Aplikace neustále padá, po objednání z palubního servisu se aplikace sekne/spadne, bez upozornění, co se stalo s vašimi penězi a jestli vám někdo přinese vámi objednané a zaplacené jídlo. A jako třešnička na dortu neochotná drzá obsluha, která se s vámi problém nesnaží vyřešit, ale dělá z vás debila. | The app is just terrible, the loading time is crazy and ticket system is confusing. | Ztratil jsem zabazadlo. A druhý den jsem ho měl zpátky. Skvělá služba! Moc doporučuji. | Pravidelně se nezobrazují informace o zpoždění vlaků, člověk pak nestihne zrušit jízdenku, nebo koupit jinou a je nucen čekat ! | Tohle je strasny. Proc delat veci lehce. Kdyz se muzou delat tezce 😏 | Give me some basic filters, like “direct bus” please!!!!! potřebujeme filtr jako “přímé spojení” . Bugs in displaying free seats (only shows the lower decker) 2024 January | Zlaté ČD a Leoexpress. Mohli byste se inspirovat, jak na aplikaci a platby. Vlastně téměř už ve všem. Jízda jak v dobytčáku. | Vysoké riziko, že nedokážete stihnout vrátit lístek v případě potřeby protože se aplikace rozhodne zrovna samovolně odhlasit při spuštění. | Tato aplikace upadá na kvalitě každým měsícem, trochu jako vlakové spoje  regiojetu. Rok, dva a budeme na úrovni českých drah. | When there is an exceptional event that stop the traffic on the rail and I need to take a replacement bus at my train station, I expect to receive notification from the app. This is not the case. The details of the impacted train are even updated 👎 Useless | Meli by se vratit ke staremu, dobremu, klasickemu obchazeni cestujicich co s tyce objednavek obcerstveni a ne, ze budeme vsechno delat pres internet, ktery v pripade regiojet vlaku funguje jak se mu zachce….. | nefunguje, a kdyz uz funguje tak vse sold out | Aplikace nelze spustit. Po spuštění hned spadne a takhle pořád dokola | Občerstvení nebylo možné objednat, protože celá cesta do Prahy byla údajně přes les, kde není připojení k Wi-Fi, což je sice “omluva”, která je však zcela nepřijatelná. ČR není jeden velký prales. Závěrem bych do této recenze chtěl poznamenat, že i ČD mají mnohem lepší servis. Děkuji Vám za pochopení a případné zkvalitnění Vašich služeb. | Žlutými vlaky pravidelně jezdím už nějaký ten rok. Po aktualizaci žádné chyby nezmizely. Zdá se mi, že se kvalita aplikace čím dál více zhoršuje. Mrzí mě to, protože kvůli tomu někdy nezvládnu koupit jízdenku a musím se spolehnout na jiného dopravce. | I once went on a journey to Pardubice hl.n. from Prague main station. The train went on time even ahead of the schedule and the service was amazing. In 3 minutes a stevard was checking our tickets, then 15 minutes before stopping in our destination we asked for a dessert. It came really quickly! It was delicious. I would recommend for yall to travel with RegioJet. The seat cost 82kč and was really comfy and silent. Chargers worked enough room. Amazing! 5 stars easy to use. | I’m always using app to book tickets, very convenient | Nejhorší aplikace + služba kterou jsem nucen používat na mobilu... Server vám asi běží na bramboře, protože kdykoliv když se snaží aplikaci použít víc než 5 lidí tak je zasekana, zachybovana různými způsoby... Nedají se po zrušení jízdenky koupit jízdenky znovu, i když k dispozici zřejmě jsou někomu jinému v prohlížeči.. Je takový problém přikoupit pár serverů nebo si je třeba dynamicky půjčovat z cloudu v době zátěže ať je aplikace použitelná když ji lidi potřebujou? Nechte se inspirovat českými drahami které mají krásnou funkční appku už roky... Lidi co stojí za funkcionalitou této aplikace + toho "serveru" (teda spíš nějakého starého běžícího noťasu z roku 2005 někde ve sklepě) pošlete do někam a najměte jiné lidi či firmu.. (vizuální design aplikace je přijatelný) | Application is useless. Food order is repeatedly impossible. Also the service is last years very bad. repeated delays and problems due to operational reasons. No food on international ways, only snacks. | Vždy když na iPhonu stornuji jízdenku, napíše mě to, že se nepovedlo jízdenku stornovat i přesto, že se jízdenka opravdu stornuje a kredit mě to připíše. Na Androidu vše funguje v pořádku. | jakej kreten mel napad zakazat cestujicim si objednat obcerstveni od stewardek ktery chodej po vlaku??? prinuti vas stahnout si tuhle prisernou nefukncni aplikaci i presto ze na vetsine drahy neni dostatecny signal. kdyz se po 40 minutach konecne tenhle odpad stahne, a vy se pokusite poprosit o vodu, aplikace vas posle doprdele stejne jako stewardi. dekuju regiojete za dalsi obohacujici zkusenost, s vama uz nikdy nikam. sem mohl jet konskym povozem a bylo by to komfortnejsi tyvole. ostuda. | Aplikace je naprosto nepoužitelná. Pravidelně hlásí, že je přetížená. Jízdenky nejdou stornovat jedním kliknutím, musíte pořad klikat dokud nemáte štěstí a jizdenka se najednou stornuje. Naprosto šílené. Opravte to prosím | Aplikace se neustále seká a nelze vyhledávat či kupovat jízdenky. Přes web mi to pro jistotu píše že vybrané spojení neexistuje, a to s ním jezdím denně. | Padá, píše než připojení k síti nebo že právě vyhledává moc lidí… Jízdenku nejde téměř koupit. Taky se stále odhlašuje. | Nejlepší app ever | Pokud tato záležitost má nějakého Product ownera, tak potěš. Poslední novinka při cestě vlakem do Tater je "automatický logoff každých 5 minut".. | Uz asi mesic mam problem, kdyz chci stornovat mistenku. Hazi to hlasku, ze ji nejde stornovat a po chvili je preso stornovana.

S regiojetem jezdim roky, mam je rada, ale aplikace je skutecne horsi a horsi a mj je casto pretizena.

title: App in the Air: Flights Hotels
description:
App in the Air: Your Personal Travel Assistant.

Editors Choice ◆◆ Best of 2018 (Watch app) ◆◆ Featured in Forbes, Wired, CBS News, Lonely Planet, Travel+Leisure and more.

App in the Air is the single place to track all your itineraries, boarding passes and manage your miles across airlines. Avoid hours of managing flight details through multiple apps by using App in the Air, your personal travel assistant that understands your flying needs and loyalties. Our app is the single place to track all your itineraries, boarding passes and manage your miles across airlines. Even more: app works offline (gate changes and flight status updates are delivered via SMS which requires no data roaming). What’s not to love? Book with app in the know, on the go. 
 
EXCLUSIVE FEATURES:
Real time updates: We’ll remind you about any flight status changes and when to check-in, even without the Internet.
Apple Watch support: track your current flight, stay healthy by taking in-flight courses, get time to gate and security wait times, explore the landmarks you're flying over. Apple Watch revolutionary Glances and Force Touch make the app experience even better!
Track your loyalty points through our partnerships with all major airlines and hotels.
Manage your time at the airport. Find places to eat, WiFi passwords and much more
Network with fellow frequent flyers through our ‘nearby’ feature, connecting you with travelers in the airport at the same time as you.
Stay informed about your flight history: hours, miles, cities and even aircrafts you’ve flown.

GLOBAL FLIGHT COVERAGE:
North American Airlines: American, Delta, United, Southwest, Air Canada, JetBlue, Alaska, WestJet, Aeromexico, Spirit & more.
Over 1,000 airlines worldwide: KLM, Ryanair, China Eastern, Lufthansa, LATAM, China Southern, easyJet, Singapore, British Airways and others.
All major US airports: Hartsfield-Jackson, Los Angeles (LAX), O'Hare, Dallas/Fort Worth (DFW), Denver International, JFK, SFO, Charlotte and much more.
Busiest world airports - over 5000: Heathrow, Beijing, Haneda, Dubai, Paris-Charles de Gaulle, Hong Kong, Frankfurt, Istanbul, Soekarno-Hatta and others.
All airline alliances: Skyteam, Star Alliance and Oneworld.

TRACK YOUR LOYALTY POINTS:
Airlines: AirMiles Canada, British Airways Executive Club, JetBlue TrueBlue, Lufthansa Miles & More, Spirit Airlines FREE SPIRIT and more
Hotels: IHG Rewards Club, Starwood Preferred Guest, Le Club Accorhotels and others
Cars: Avis Preferred, Hertz Gold Plus Rewards, Enterprise Plus, Dollar EXPRESS and more

INTEGRATIONS: 
Import all your previous and upcoming flights via connecting your email account 
Import all your previous and upcoming flights via TripIt
Email forward your e-ticket information to myflight@appintheair.com

PREMIUM SUBSCRIPTION:
An annual subscription gives you real-time flight status updates, automated check-in and option to subscribe your family via SMS. Your first year subscription will be charged to your iTunes account once you confirm your purchase. 
Price varies by region and is currently $29.99.
Your subscription will automatically renew each year at the current subscription rate, and this amount will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription year/month. 
To manage your subscription or stop it from automatically renewing, simply go to Account Settings and turn off automatic renewal at least 24 hours before your renewal date. No refunds will be issued after the annual subscription fee has been charged. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited once a subscription is purchased. 
 
Try the premium version now with a trial period. Have questions? Feel free to email us anytime: support@appintheair.com
releaseNotes:
Attention all passengers:

The latest version of App in the Air, version 8.8.0 is now available. This update includes bug fixes and quality life improvements for Spring.

If you appreciate this update, we would greatly appreciate it if you could take a moment to leave a review on the App Store!

If you have any questions or suggestions, our support team is available 24/7. Please feel free to reach out to us at support@appintheair.com.

Keep flying!

Sincerely, 

The App in the Air Crew

title: CheckMyTrip – Travel Itinerary
description:
CheckMyTrip is your digital travel assistant, bringing you flight information and alerts, travel services and extras to get you smoothly from door to door. And it’s free.  

Ideal for both business and leisure travelers, CheckMyTrip will help you travel smooth, reduce stress and stay on top of your travel plans.

SMART TRIP ITINERARIES
- Real-time updates of your flight bookings for FREE, including delays, cancellations and terminal changes plus layover times  
- View your trip in a master itinerary with all your bookings, including flight and accommodation, both online and off  

ADDING TRIPS IS EASY  
3 simple ways to add and organize your itinerary details.  
- Forward booking confirmation e-mails to trips@checkmytrip.com  
- Ask your assistant to import the trip automatically by using your booking reference number  
- Send the trip details to your assistant to create the trip for you  

DIGITAL ASSISTANT  
Your personal travel assistant to help you at every step of your trip.  
- Flight delay, cancellation, boarding gate notifications  
- Check-in reminders 
- 5-day weather forecast  
- Search and reserve airport transfer and lounge  
- Recommendations for local activities  

**IMPORTANT REMINDER**  
CHECKMYTRIP IS NOT A TRAVEL BOOKING AGENCY  
We only display information related to the trip details you add to your CheckMyTrip account. To modify, cancel or source additional information about your air, hotel, car, rail, taxi, parking, tour and activity booking, contact the provider directly for assistance.

We respect your privacy. Check our privacy policy. https://checkmytrip.com/privacy-policy  

By downloading the app, you accept the Terms & Conditions of use. https://checkmytrip.com/terms-and-conditions/  

If you have any questions, please contact us by e-mail at feedback@checkmytrip.com
releaseNotes:
In this release, we've added two exciting features to enhance your travel experience:
- Easily sync your travel plans with any calendar app, keeping essential details at your fingertips for a smooth journey.
- Your feedback matters! Share your thoughts by rating CheckMyTrip directly through the app, guiding us to continually improve and tailor the experience to your needs.

title: park4night.com
description:
Share places where it is good to rest. With motorhomes, campervans and converted vans. 

With Park4night find and share the places where you enjoyed to relax, spend the night, have a picnic or clear your head. 

Uncover the hidden places, close to nature that gave you a feeling of freedom. Forests, beautiful views, parks, creeks, beaches, ... 

Inform the community of possible activities around (Windsurf / Kitesurf, Biking, Hiking) ... 

NEW (PREPARE YOUR TRIP) :

- Download all information into your device

If you have suggestions, ideas, please let us know: 
- Post a comment. 
- Contact us by email (contact@park4night.com) ------------------------------------------------ 
Ideas for future versions: 

- All good ideas from users.

title: Na kole i pěšky
description:
Tato jednoduchá aplikace Vám v České republice pomůže zjistit jaké cyklostezky, stezky pro horská kola, pro pěší, pro inline, hipostezky, vodácké, běžkařské a naučné stezky se nacházejí ve zvolené oblasti. Ať už si dovolenou plánujete nebo se nacházíte přímo na místě, nabídne Vám v dané lokalitě několik tras. Na nich pak mapuje různé body zájmu, kterých je již zde více než 30000 - místa která stojí za to navštívit, různé atrakce, muzea, galerie, památky - ale také kde se můžete najíst, vykoupat, přenocovat nebo "okoštovat" dobré vínečko. To vše včetně kontaktů a popisu daných míst.
S naší aplikací již nezabloudíte - ukáže Vám, kde se nacházíte a provede Vás stezkou nebo navede na Vámi vybraný bod zájmu. V aplikaci je již zmapováno více než 4400 stezek a každým dnem přibývají nové.

Veškeré Vaše náměty na vylepšení či připomínky pište na email info@nakoleipesky.cz
releaseNotes:
Děkujeme, že používáte aplikaci Na kole i pěšky!
Novinky v této verzi:
- vylepšení stability

title: Bolt: Request a Ride
description:
Use your smartphone to order a ride, get picked up by a nearby driver, and enjoy a low-cost trip to your destination.

Why choose Bolt? 
• Get a comfortable, low-cost ride.
• Fast arrival times, 24/7.
• See the price of your ride before you order.
• You can pay inside the app (Credit/Debit/Apple Pay).

Easily request a ride with the Bolt app:
1. Open the app and set your destination;
2. Request a driver to pick you up;
3. See your driver's location on the real-time map;
4. Enjoy the ride to your destination;
5. Leave a rating and pay.

Bolt is available in 45 countries and 400 cities around the world.

Bolt’s mission is to bring fast, reliable and affordable transportation to millions of people around the world, while also helping thousands of drivers support their families. The next time you need a ride, take Bolt!

Earn extra money driving with Bolt. Sign up at https://partners.bolt.eu

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/BoltUnitedKingdom/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt_uk/
Twitter — https://twitter.com/Boltapp
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using Bolt!
 
We regularly update the app to provide a consistently high-quality experience. This update includes bug fixes and performance improvements.
 
Enjoying Bolt? Please leave a rating! Your feedback helps us improve.
reviews:
Řidiči každý den jezdí pozdě, nebo když jim napisu ze přijdu za chvíli tak to zruší, nebo po 15ti minutách řidič furt stal na místě a nevyjel zamnou. Bylo by to dobrý tam udělat trochu pořádek. | Too expensive .. hn | Where is it? It has been over 4 years since Apple introduced it. | Dnes poprve celkem zklamaná, řidič stal ve vojenské nemocnici sice z pavilonu A ale z druhé strany, takže jsme se nemohli najít ,  zima vichr a já s Berlěmi,
A hlavně jsem  měla na vaši potvrzene objednávce částku 325 Kč, na jeho mobilu bylo 345 a to dokonce po slevě 40 Kč ze 385. Takze jsrm platila 345. Zatím vždycky platila částka ktetou jstm viděla na  ekonomy  který jdtm si vybrala .
Není to divné?

Po jedné jízdě kdy byl řidič nevychovaný hulvát, tak mě zablokovali a proto dávám 1 hvězdičku | No dark mode | Vždy jsme spokojena🍀🍀🍀 | Recently had an incident where the driver indicated that they arrived, even though they hadn’t. Řidič vjel na hlavní silnici před obchodní centrum, je tam zákaz vjezdu. Zastavila nás okamžitě policie a pán dostal pokutu. Vypsání pokuty trvalo nějakých 15 min, pán neuměl ani česky ani anglicky a policista se s ním nemohl domluvit. Následně přejel 2x vjezd do tunelu takže jsme celou lokalitu objeli několikrát. Cesta co trvá normálně pod 10 min trvala půl hodiny. Pán byl velmi zdvořilý a omluvil se mi, ale zvolím raději jiný styl dopravy. Necítila jsem se v autě komfortně. | Když je člověk potřebuje v ČR tak si raději zavolá taxi… | The driver is very nice person | App keeps showing something went wrong, when you need it 😑 | Nejen že dost lidí jezdí na účet jiných, ale i ty ceny jsou přepal! I would rather pay more but enjoy better local taxi service! | Nelze platit kartou | Jsem častým uživatelem kuriérských služeb v Praze, a poslední rok je moje zkušenost s Bolt Food asi ta nejhorší. Jídlo přichází neustále studené, sleduji aplikaci, restaurace připraví jídlo během chvíle, ale kurýr vyzvedá x objednávek a teprve poté moji. Za tyto problémy mi nabídnou omluvu ve výši 50 Kč. Stejný problém nastává i při používání služeb obchodů a květin. Kurýr často nemluví ani anglicky, ani česky. Na druhou stranu, Bolt vždy reaguje a poděkuje za zpětnou vazbu, když se jí obrátím na podporu. | Waiting For The Driver 25 minutes and in application was written that he arriving in 4 minutes. I missed train because of this and had to wait 7 hours for another train and had to buy another ticket, also didn’t get refund for missed train from train company and after all Bolt support is even worst then this driver when I complain, I have been waiting 4 hours for respond. And at the end my time nobody can compensate. Zero stars not one. Travel with “bolt cost you a lot”.- they can use this as a slogan for their company. | I really really hate when you give me two options. One for 2 minutes another for 3, I pay the extra money for the 2 minutes and then you connect me with a guy that will take 7 and is in another trip. Meaning, it won’t be 7.

title: Waze Navigation & Live Traffic
description:
Waze is a community driven navigation app that helps millions of users get to where they’re going through real-time road alerts and an up-to-the-moment map. Thanks to our network of drivers, Waze saves you time by instantly alerting you to traffic, roadworks, crashes, police and more. From traffic-avoiding reroutes, real-time safety updates and low petrol price alerts, Waze is a community of drivers helping other drivers.


With Waze you…


• Get there faster: traffic-avoiding route updates
• Avoid tickets: know where police, speed cameras and red light cameras are located
• More accurate ETAs: based on live traffic, roadworks, weather and more
• Community-based navigation: real-time updates from other drivers
• Save money: find the cheapest fuel along your route
• Avoid tolls: see toll pricing when you choose a route
• Use Apple CarPlay: sync Waze to your car’s built-in display
• Live Speedometer: get alerts when you’re speeding and avoid costly tickets
• Customize your drive: get directions from your favourite celebs and characters
• No app switching: use your favorite audio apps right from Waze


Drive safer and smarter, with Waze!


You can manage your in-app Waze Privacy Settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.


Waze directions are not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles.
releaseNotes:
Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier with this update:

Fixed a bug so you can still see your route even if you lose internet connection.
reviews:

Jak říkám, mimo totálně. | Již podruhé během týdne nejde spustit navigace. Předtím nešla celý den. | Waze byla absolutní jednička v on-line navigacích, bohužel byla. - can't be used for navigation because it keeps sending me through nonsensical shortcuts

Díky👍 | K čemu Waze je, když ani nepozná, že je auto v tunelu a ne nad ním a tím pádem je nemožné zjistit čas příjezdu, když je v tunelu kolona!!!

šílený | Nápad aplikace i výhody za jízdy z pohledu řidiče jsou super. Bohužel, již X měsíců nefunguje na Apple CarPlay tlačítko “přidat akci” na mapu. (tím myslím policii, výmol atd…). Looks like the app needs data from that location, therefore it doesn’t offer best route for you, but most interesting route datawise for itself. | Dřív jsem jezdil jen podle Waze. Za posledních 6 dní jsem ujel přes 3500 km po Rakousku a Itálii a navigace nedokázala najít obyčejnou adresu hotelu, Red Bull Ringu, muzea apod. Už ji používat nebudu, našel jsem alternativu … | I have been happily using Waze in conjunction with my iPhone and then CarPlay in the car for many years. Mainly that after entering my appointment into the calendar, Waze automatically retrieved the address and then sent me 1. a notification about 1.5h before and 2. a notification 10 minutes before the ideal departure time. For over a year now, I've been dealing with a problem in CarPlay where after starting, Waze starts to lag until the map completely breaks down. title: Můj vlak
description:
Mobilní aplikace pro cestování vlaky ČD 
- Vyhledávání vlakového spojení 
- Nákup vnitrostátních jízdenek, místenek a doplňkových služeb ČD 
- Palubní portál - informace o průběhu cesty, aktuální poloha a zpoždění vlaku 
- Přehled výluk, mimořádností a změn na trase vlaku 
- Služby ve vlaku (řazení vlaku, přístupnost vlaku atd.) 
- Služby ve stanici (odjezdy vlaků, otevírací doby, poloha stanice, přístupnost stanice atd.) 
- Správce elektronických jízdenek 

Podpora: 
- Push notifikace (před jízdou, při přestupu, při vzniku zpoždění nebo mimořádnosti atd.) 
- Sdílení do sociálních sítí 
- Synchronizace elektronických jízdenek  (už. účtem z www.cd.cz/eshop)

--------------ENGLISH--------------

Mobile application for travelling on ČD trains
- Search for a train connection 
- Purchase inland tickets, reservations and additional ČD services  
- On-board portal – information about the journey, current position and train delay 
- Overview of closures, extraordinary events and changes on the train’s route 
- Services on the train (train composition, train accessibility, etc.) 
- Services at the station (train departures, opening hours, station location, station accessibility, etc.) 
- Electronic ticket manager 

Support: 
- Push notifications (before the journey, while transferring, when a delay, extraordinary event, etc., occurs) 
- Sharing on social networks 
- Sync electronic tickets (with user account from www.cd.cz/eshop)
releaseNotes: - Indikace předpokládaného obsazení vlaku
reviews:
Praktické, moc dobré! Tleskám | Po dlouhe dobe jsem dal zase sanci CD a proste chyba nejvetsi! Je to drazsi nez jet autem to za prve a vlak ani nevyjel ze stanice a uz ma hodinu zpozdeni! Mel jsem pul hod rezervu abych stihl schuzku, ale s CD je jistota jedina, ze nikdy nestihnete nic co potrebujete! Nejvic useless dopravce. Vubec se nedivim ze vsichni radsi jezdi autem a na verejnou dopravu kaslou… | Koupit lístek byla hračka 👍🏼

Akorat: 

1) na klíčové slovo CD nebo ČD ji iPhone nenajde! Musím hledat: vlak

2) v některých lokalitách se zeptejte na nádraží u okýnka. Jízdenku můžete tak koupit o dost levněji! | S aplikací jsem velmi spokojen. Děkuji. Jiří Novák | Jako pardon ale vaše zpoždění a nahazování výluky na poslední chvíli je fakt moc.  Stojím v Plzni, čekám na vlak co má 28 minut zpoždění, napadne mě po 5ti minutách aktualizovat spoj a skočí tam náhradní doprava. Prachy už mi nikdo nevrátí, hlavně ze ani kouřit se tu nemůže | Neni tyden aby aplikace fungovala bez problemu. | Dobre se v ni orientuje. | V aplikaci mi nejde nahlásit chybu plus mi nejde nakoupit místenky. Používám ji alespoň jako vyhledávač cesty vlakem a informace k vlakům. | Velice bych uvítal, kdyby si autor přečetl tuto recenzi + návrh.
Aplikace je vzhledově celkem dobrá, obsahuje skoro všechny podstatné informace a funkce. Je jednoduchá a spolehlivá.
Ještě mi schází možnost “live activity”, že bych mohl v oznamovacím centru vidět oznámení s aktuálním vlakem. Případně bych měl hned po ruce zobrazení aktuálního zpoždění. Je to drobnost, ale myslím, že by to byla dobrá funkce navíc | Indikace obsazenosti vlaků.Velice užitečná věc. | Aplikace spadne pokaždé v košíku při výběru místenky, už poslední půlrok iOS 17.03 | Chybí optimalizace na tablet… | Výborná aplikace, lehke objednani, funguje INka, zkratka super.

Co vsak zlobi je: 
Vyber mista (kdyz je to spoluprace se zahranicnim dopravcem budto nelze zobrazit plan, nebo nelze mistenku urcit vubec, problem kdyz cestujeme ve vice lidech)

Na iOS nemoznost pridat koupenoj jizdenku do kalendare (na androidu ok)

Zruseni jizdneho, trva strasne dlouho vyplaceni a spousta spamu o zrusene jizdence. Prosím o opravu této chyby. | Vždy když klepnu na řádek odkud aplikace spadne. | Nejde mi přes aplikaci koupit mistenka | Aplikace je super,protože s touto aplikaci nemusím ukazovat jízdenku a in kartu ,ale stačí jeden kód in karty z této aplikace a je to.daji se zde ukázat kde sedím a taky aplikace upozorňuje na stanice ve které se vlak nachází. title: Uber - Request a ride
description:
We’re committed to your safety at Uber. We’ve established a Door-to-Door Safety Standard to help you feel safe every time you take a trip.

And with Uber, your destination is at your fingertips. Just open the app and enter where you want to go, and a nearby driver will help you get there reliably.

TAKE A TRIP FROM ALMOST ANYWHERE
Request a trip from 600+ airports and in 10,000+ cities around the world. The Uber app is a great way to make your travel plans stress-free. Request a trip on demand or schedule one ahead of time.    

TAKE A TRIP TO ALMOST ANYWHERE
Whether you’re looking for style, space or affordability, Uber can help you find the perfect trip to fit your needs:

Enjoy elegance and premium features with Uber Exec
Ride with extra room (and more of your friends) with UberXL

Uber Travel
Whether it's your usual commute by train, escaping the city with friends in a hire car, a coach trip to Cambridge, or even the Eurostar to Paris, you can now go anywhere with Uber.

All of these transport options and more are available in one place with the Uber app.

SEE PRICE ESTIMATES
With Uber, you can see your price estimate up front before booking. That means you’ll always have an idea of what you’ll pay before requesting your trip.

YOUR SAFETY DRIVES US
We’re committed to making every trip with Uber as safe as possible. That's why – in addition to our Door-to-Door Safety Standard – we've built new safety features and updated our Community Guidelines for respectful and positive experiences.

You can share your trip
Give your loved ones peace of mind while you’re on a trip – you can share your location and trip status so they know you’ve made it to your destination.

You can contact emergency services
You can call the emergency services directly from the app, and your location and trip details will be displayed so you can share them quickly with emergency services.

TIP AND RATE YOUR DRIVER
After every trip, you can submit a rating along with comments. You can also let your driver know you appreciated your experience by adding a tip for them directly in the app.

Not all products are available in all markets.

To see if Uber is available in your city, visit https://www.uber.com/cities
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/uber
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/uber

Questions? Visit uber.com/help
releaseNotes:
We update the Uber app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:

- Updates to improve localization across the app
- Various bug fixes & improvements
  
Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber engine running. 
Any questions? Tap Help in the Uber app or visit help.uber.com.
reviews:

Zaplatila jsem řidiči 185 Kč a stejná castka mě býka stržena z účtu. Psala jsem i na podporu, ale odpověď jsem nedostala. No co se dá dělat. V. Behounkova | Super řidič | Během jízdy je možnost vybrat spropitné, které řidič po jízdě dostane. Zvolil jsem tedy spropitné. Po skončení jízdy také vyskočí nabídka spropitného. So, you might end with 15-20mins waiting for a uber. Not so helpful. | I rarely order Uber, only in cases when Bolt is not available, but each one of the encounters with the Uber drivers left me unsatisfied, many of them just drive past your location, and when you call them, they were silent for 10 seconds and ended a call.

First time i decided to not go against it, but the second time the same honest mistake, im deleting the app, and never coming to it again, please fix your app. | Objednáte si odjezd za 20minut, auto nepřijede.

title: Revolut - Mobile Finance
description:
Join the 40+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK customers only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore Stock Trading (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start trading stocks from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Stock trading services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (FRN: 832790), an appointed representative of Resolution Compliance Limited (FRN:574048) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA).

End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (Firm Reference 900562). Registered address: 7 Westferry Circus, Canary Wharf, London, England, E14 4HD.
releaseNotes:
Welcome to Revolut.

We’ve made some tweaks and improvements under the hood in this version to make your Revolut experience even smoother.

title: Trainline: Book train tickets
description:
Welcome aboard Trainline. Travel confidently with Europe’s leading train and coach app.

We’ve made it quick and easy for you to travel across the UK and the rest of Europe by rail and road. Book tickets for Avanti West Coast, GWR, LNER, National Express and more. You can even plan your international trips by train or bus across 45 countries in Europe and the rest of the world, including the UK, France, Italy, Spain and Germany. And if you’re looking for some travel inspiration, why not check our pick of popular journeys?


Plus, you’ll always be in control of your trip thanks to our live train timetable (for UK rail, Trenitalia, Renfe, and SNCF routes), price alerts, mobile tickets / etickets and seat selection (where available).

Get live train times, railcards, mobile tickets / etickets and seat selection. Safe travel is our top priority - use contactless travel and crowd alerts to find out how busy your train is.

Why Trainline?
•	Book all your train and coach journeys in one place.
•	Compare travel options from 220 rail and coach companies.
•	Quickly find the cheapest UK Advance tickets.
•	Ask Siri how your journey’s doing.
•	Pay in your preferred currency. Available in GBP, USD, EUR, AUD, CAD, CHF, and SEK.
•	Get great discounts like GroupSave 34%. (GroupSave is a discount of up to 34% for adults travelling on a single or return journey at Off-Peak or Super Off-Peak times in groups of three to nine people.)
•	Skip station queues using tickets on your phone (selected routes).
•	Find carriages with available seats.
•	Book in advance or on the day of travel.
•	Buy your tickets with Apple Pay, PayPal, and all major credit cards and debit cards.

Save money with cheap UK Advance tickets. Once you’ve booked your tickets, save them to your phone and use live train times, platform numbers or delay info to keep your trip on track.


Have you considered coach? Book coach tickets with Trainline and you’ll get air conditioning, free WiFi and VUER – National Express’ onboard entertainment system. Start your search and if there’s a coach available, we’ll show you the options. No need to print tickets either because with etickets, your phone is all you need.
Trust Trainline to get you where you need to be.


In the UK we partner with Avanti West Coast, London North Eastern Railway, London North, Western Railway, Great Western Railway (GWR), South Western Railway, London

Overground, TfL Rail, Gatwick Express, Heathrow Connect, Heathrow Express, Stansted Express, ScotRail, Greater Anglia, East Midlands Trains, West Midlands Railway, Thameslink, Southeastern, Southern Rail, c2c, Caledonian Sleeper, Chiltern Railways, CrossCountry, Hull Trains, Island Line, Grand Central Railway, Mersey Rail and TransPennine Express.



Eurostar (France and Belgium)
SNCF (France)
TGV Lyria (France)
Thalys (France)
Renfe (Spain)
Trenitalia (Italy)
Italo (Italy)
Deutsche Bahn (Germany)
ÖBB (Austria)
SBB (Switzerland)
SNCB (Belgium)
NS (the Netherlands)
Alsa (Spain) and Flixbus

You’ll always get the best fare for every journey and with every carrier. So, download your FREE Trainline app and get access to live train times and cheap train and coach tickets across the UK & Europe.


To find out more, see our FAQs: https://www.thetrainline.com/en/help/


Follow Trainline on social:
•	Our blog: www.thetrainline.com/blog
•	Facebook: facebook.com/thetrainlinecom
•	Twitter: twitter.com/thetrainline
•	Instagram: @trainline
releaseNotes:
The little things matter

Some small improvements are coming down the track with this update.

We’ve fixed a few bugs that were affecting our app and made some other minor changes.
reviews: I would like to post my review on this company. The interface was friendly and nice, thought can’t put same characteristics about the service. I was buying tickets from Prague to Vienna, i was surprised that in application i can’t choose sits even though i was buying first class with and paying for sits. I was assuming that this option will be available during the payment, i selected that we want to be sit near the window as preference. But after that no sit choosing, It didn’t give me such option even after i paid, so i wrote to support team because me and my fiancé were sat separately. They told me that they can’t do any changes in sittings and our tickets can’t be changed or refunded. But we can come on the train and agree with other passengers if they are willing to change places. So basically you would need to buy new tickets. Then i went to website of Czech Railways and there you could choose sits even before you paid, and tickets in 1st class cost 100 euros less!!! I was very upset so i would recommend people - if you want to chose sits better use different companies or applications and check the market wisely | The transit time between our booked tickets were so short that when our first train had a slight delay, we missed the rest of our trains and there was no refund or any help to book a substitute ticket. Very dissappointed. | No idea what have I done wrong but the app says it’s unable to accept my payment even if my card detsils are filled corectly. And it work on laptop websites. Otherwise, I love this app, makes my traveling around the UK way too easier. | I don t have any problem with this app... | This app works really well :-)

title: Agoda: Cheap Flights & Hotels
description:
Experience the world with Agoda, the ultimate app for booking your travel plans. Find cheap flights and affordable hotels in just a few taps! 

Booking international or domestic flights on Agoda is seamless. Discover countless airfare deals across 200 airlines worldwide. Our unique search engine compares flights and prices in near real-time  so you can book the best deal as soon as it drops.

Booking hotels, resorts, villas, homes, BnBs, and more is even easier now with over 3.9 million  accommodations available to book in 39 languages and currencies. Make the most of your hotel search with filters, hi-res photos, map views, local information, and over 28 million  verified reviews. On Agoda, you can even discover hotel rooms tailored to your travel needs and preferred budget. 

Want to earn? With Agoda Homes, you can become a host and start earning from your own property. 

Travel with confidence! See the world for less, with up to 80% off from Member Offers , Last-Minute Deals, and much more. Book a flight. Book a hotel. Book an unforgettable vacation with massive savings on Agoda. 

AGODA FEATURES
CHEAP FLIGHTS WITH JUST A TAP
- Search for affordable flights from over 200 airlines, flying to almost any destination
- Book flights knowing you’re getting a highly competitive price 
- Save your info and adjust your flight booking directly in the app

BOOK A ROOM EASILY 
- Choose from over 3.9 million  properties across the globe
- Reserve your next stay whether it’s a hotel, resort, villa, home, BnB, vacation rental, or anything in between
- Travel confidently! Read user reviews, view pictures, and browse local information

DEALS MADE FOR AFFORDABLE TRAVEL
- Save on trips with extraordinary deals on cheap flights and budget-friendly accommodations
- Plan your trip, travel, and fulfill your wanderlust without breaking the bank
- Enjoy a variety of special offers , with secret deals, discounts, and more

TRAVEL WORRY-FREE
-  Save your vouchers, details, and maps directly in the app for easy check-in and print-free travel
- Manage or edit your booking anytime, anywhere
- Need help? Agoda's Customer Support is available 24/7 in various languages to ensure your journey is both smooth and cost-efficient
- *Agoda speaks 39 languages!* You can get  the best Hotel deals: فنادق أجودا,安可达酒店订房,Agoda酒店,Agoda訂房,อโกด้า,תי מלון אגודה, حجوزات,اجودا,агода. 

To learn more about device information used in our app, including interest-based advertising and cross-device tracking, and to exercise certain opt-out choices you may have, please see our cookie policy.
releaseNotes:
Agoda now offers flights! Your trusted accommodation partner now brings you the very best updated deals on flights to your destination. So you can book your room and your flight from one great app, knowing you'll get the lowest price on both and 24/7 customer support. And with the Agoda Widget, you can stay on top of great deals and travel ideas!

Other recent improvements include:
- Find your next great destination with the Agoda Widget
- Send messages to a property when you have a question
- Easily recognize homes & apartments in search (pink stars)
- Host mode for Agoda Homes hosts (list your home on agoda.com/homes)

Explore, travel safely, and keep in touch!

Free hints for developers from a researcher: don’t build MVP and clutter it with more without structure to hold it. Becomes bulky and unpleasant. Took me days to find the price map and please always label the buttons…that’s like 101 in user experience science…build meaningful things you  can be proud of and feel good about yourself. title: Pinterest: Lifestyle Ideas
description:
Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Explore new ideas
- Find new trends
- Try new things

Explore billions of ideas to turn your dreams into reality. On Pinterest, nothing is impossible:
Finding easy recipes for cozy weeknight dinners? Discovering the secret to the perfect winter glow? Exploring ways to make your home more homey? Creating a life you love?

It's Possible.

title: Lime - #RideGreen
description:
You have places to be and people to see. Get there easily and on time with an emissions-free Lime e-bike or e-scooter! 

START YOUR RIDE IN 3 STEPS
Step 1
Download the app, create an account and accept our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement
Privacy Notice 
https://www.li.me/legal/privacy-policy/ 

Step 2 
Find a nearby Lime vehicle on the map (vehicle availability depends on your city and supply)

Step 3
Unlock your vehicle by scanning the QR code, entering the plate number, or by tapping a button on the app.
RIDE RESPONSIBLY
A safe community starts with riding responsibly. It’s important to remember the rules of the road before every ride. You should always:

- Ride in bike lanes, never on sidewalks
- Wear a helmet when you ride
- Park clear of walkways, driveways and access ramps
- Visit https://safety.li.me/ to learn more

#RIDEGREEN
Lime is on a mission to build a future where transportation is shared, affordable and carbon-free.


You can read more about Lime’s products and services, including how we calculate our prices in our terms and conditions https://www.li.me/user-agreement.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements
reviews:
Was charged for a scooter that does not work | I recently encountered a significant issue with the Lime app during a ride on April 6, 2024. Despite only using the scooter for 7-10 minutes, the app malfunctioned, making it impossible for me to end the ride properly. Consequently, I was overcharged as the session continued to run for 30 minutes. To make matters worse, I was stuck waiting an additional 15- 20 minutes for the scooter to lock since the app was completely unresponsive.

I captured screenshots and videos of the issue as evidence. While I understand that technical problems can occur, the inconvenience and overcharging due to app failure are unacceptable. I’ve reached out to customer support for a resolution and am waiting to see how they handle this. title: Planes Live - Flight Tracker .
description:
Planes Live Free is a simple yet powerful flight tracking tool that lets you watch the planes online all over the world and get up-to-date information on flights instantly! Track the flights of your family members or beloved ones as if you were traveling with them and find the best time to pick them up at the airport. 

Whether you are a professional pilot or an aviation enthusiast, you'll definitely appreciate our flight tracker - the simple, clean and informative interface coupled with powerful functionality!

FEATURES
* Track planes and biplanes online all over the world
* Get notified about the flight schedule changes with handy alerts: be aware of the flight status, canceled flights, new departure and arrival time and more
* Search for particular flights, airports, ​and locations
* Get detailed information on flights: from aircraft characteristics and picture to its route and schedule
* Find up-to-date airport information that covers accurate departures and arrivals schedule, airport timezone and local time, its location and weather forecast
* Add airports and locations to "My Places" to access them instantly!

PREMIUM FEATURES
* Weather Overlays
* Unlimited number of alerts
* 2x faster data update
* Terminal, Check In, Gate and Baggage info
* No Ads

* Subscriptions will automatically renew and payment will be charged to your iTunes account unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal depends on your Subscription Plan. Our standard Subscription Plans are:
- 1 week subscription with 3-day free trial ($2.99 USD)
- 1 year subscription ($19.99 USD)
For other currencies, the price corresponds to the same price tier on the App Store Pricing Matrix. 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Сoverage zone:
- Europe: up to 95% of the continent.
- South America: up to 90% of ADS-B coverage for airplanes.
- North America: close to 100% coverage of transmitter-enabled airplanes; 100% of data delivered with a delay of up to 5 minutes.
- Africa: major coverage of South Africa; partial coverage of the rest of the continent.
- Australia: 100% coverage.
- Asia: coverage of mainly densely populated areas.
- Oceania: 100% coverage.

Important Notice:
The airline tracker app uses data from several providers, which is collected from aircraft, equipped with ADS-B transmitters. ADS-B is not used by all airlines or aircraft. Due to technical limitations on how flight data is collected, ​it might be incomplete in some cases. We are working to improve this situation.

If you live in the European Union and wish to cancel your order, you may do so within 14 days.  You can do this by following the process laid out in the Apple App Store.  Please note and acknowledge: you cannot cancel your order or obtain a refund if you have downloaded the app and started using it (i.e. for example, by opening and using the App).

Privacy Policy: https://planeslive.com/privacyPolicy 
Terms: https://planeslive.com/terms

title: eSky - Flights, Hotels & Deals
description:
•••over 950 low-cost and regular airlines including: easyJet, Flybe British Airways, Ryanair, Wizzair, Eurowings, Blueair etc. in one app. Compare flight deals with us!•••

The eSky App is the simplest and quickest way to book cheap airline tickets and to stay updated with special flight promotions worldwide. You can also book hotel straightaway and rent a car.

The app is available in the following languages: English, Polish, Bulgarian, Romanian, Czech, Slovakian, Hungarian, Spanish, French, Portuguese, Greek, Croatian, Finnish, Swedish, Norwegian and others.

The eSky App:

• attractive flight deals
• attractive hotel offers
• access to everything: 63 000 cities, 3,000 airports, over 900 airlines
• book in 3 simple steps
• real time updates on deals and fares
• fast, simple and easy to use, the eSky Travel Search Engine generates the best flight results faster than ever before
• be the first to discover selected airline deals exclusively created for eSky App users

• A wide variety of travel options from regular airlines such as British Airways, Lufthansa, KLM, Air France, Alitalia, LOT
• Instant access to all low cost flights from airlines including Wizz Air, Blue Air, Ryanair and easyJet
• Secure transactions and personal details protected by SSL certificate
• Highly trained travel consultants ready to assist you in any situation, 7 days a week
• Instant confirmation of your booking, right on your smartphone
• Over 992 000 hotels worldwide. Best prices, quick booking
• All important hotel chains like: Mariott, Sheraton, Best Western, Mercure, Qubus, Intercontinental etc.
• Up to 15% discount on car rental
• eSky is one of the most well renowned online travel agencies in Europe and South America, with over 15 years experience
• With the eSky mobile App, it is easy to start planning your journey with friends and family, anywhere, anytime.
• Guaranteed low price on flight tickets

Download the eSky app now for free on your device and join the eSky Smart Travellers Community. With eSky, book quickly and easily, wherever you are.

title: Google Maps - Transit & Food
description:
Navigate your world faster and easier with Google Maps. Over 220 countries and territories mapped and hundreds of millions of businesses and places on the map. Get real-time GPS navigation, traffic and public transport info, and find what you need by getting the latest information on businesses, including supermarkets, pharmacies and other important places.

Get where you need to go efficiently:
• Find the best route with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closure

Find important businesses:
• Know what’s open in your area and their latest opening hours
• Find local restaurants offering delivery and takeaway
• Create lists of your important places 

Get there faster with real-time updates
• Beat traffic with real-time ETAs and traffic conditions
• Catch your bus, train or ride-share with real-time public transport info
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closure
• With Live View in Google Maps, see the way that you need to go with arrows and directions placed right on top of your world. There’s no second guessing or missing another turn.

More experiences on Google Maps
• Offline maps to search and navigate without an internet connection
• Street View and indoor imagery for restaurants, shops, museums and more
• Indoor maps to quickly find your way inside big places like airports, malls and stadiums

Some features not available in all countries

Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Google Maps! This release brings bug fixes that improve our product to help you discover new places and navigate to them.

title: Township
description:
Township is a unique blend of city building and farming! 

Build your dream town! Harvest crops, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with distant islands. Open restaurants, cinemas and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world. 
Are you ready to build your dream? Let’s get started! 

Township features: 
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town 
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories 
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill 
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Exotic goods brought from the islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals 
● Famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more! 
● Play with your Facebook and Game Center friends or make new friends in the game community! 

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's "Restrictions" menu. 

*You need an internet connection to play the game and enable social interaction, competitions, and other features.* 

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game! 
Facebook: www.facebook.com/TownshipMobile 
Twitter: twitter.com/township_mobile 

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to township@playrix.com or check our Web Support Portal: https://playrix.helpshift.com/webchat/a/township/?p=web&contact=1 

Privacy Policy: 
https://playrix.com/en/privacy/index.html
Terms of Service:
https://playrix.com/en/terms/index.html
releaseNotes:
Get ready for a new update!
It's getting hot in Township!

Two adventures with Richard!
* Magic is in the air! Help Richard find Ellen in a magical wonderland. Complete tasks and get the characters through all the perils to win an impressive reward!
* Join Richard and a smart speaker for a top secret investigation! Your mission is to find and apprehend a trespasser at a secret scientific base. Solve the mystery of the base to win a great reward at the end of the event!

Season Adventures
* Travel to an ancient world! Spruce up your town with bright thematic skins and dress your chickens in chitons to feel like you're in ancient Greece!
* Buckle up for Spy Games! The Stealth Aircraft skin and Secret Agent cow outfit will help you set the stage.

Also
* Plant the new Lavender crop!
* Build a Bridal Shop for all the brides in your town!
* Enjoy a new town expansion.

title: Mondly: Learn 33 Languages
description:
Learn languages in a fun and effective way with high-quality content and modern features such as Chatbot, Hands Free Learning & Voice Recognition. Practice speaking, reading, listening, grammar, and test your skills with fluent speakers





With Mondly you can learn 33 languages: Spanish, American English, British English, French, German, Portuguese, Italian, Russian, Norwegian, Danish, Dutch, Swedish, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Greek, Romanian, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Hindi, Hebrew, Polish, Bulgarian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Czech, Croatian, Finnish, Persian (Farsi), Thai, Afrikaans, Turkish, Bengali, Catalan, Latin, Latvian, Lithuanian, Slovak, Tagalog and Urdu for FREE.





Apps we love & App of the day – Apple 

“Mondly is like having a private tutor” – CNN 

“The new way to learn languages” – Inc. 

“A Practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted” - Forbes




•	Keep your mind sharp with quick Daily Lessons, Weekly Quizzes & Monthly Challenges
•	Full access to 41 different language courses – a total of 1320 language combinations 
•	Master the basics with 200+ lessons organized into practical topics – from family, weather, travel, to sports, food, and many more 
•	38 vocabulary builders to learn new words fast and cement your knowledge 
•	Learn pronunciation with 50+ conversations between fluent speakers 
•	Grammar features & conjugation tables to deepen your understanding of the language 
•	Access to the entire collection of over 3500 Daily Lessons, Weekly Quizzes & Monthly Challenges we have been creating since 2015 
•	30+ different English language progress tests with content from Pearson 
•	50+ Intermediate and Advanced categories for British English learning 
•	260+ video lessons for British English learning 
•	Hands-free learning to learn languages on the go 
•	Over 300 specialized lessons with business content for personal improvement & workforce training 


PLEASE NOTE

You will need a subscription in order to get access to all of this app’s courses and features.

Subscription options:
- One-monthly subscription for $US9.99 (or the equivalent in local currency), automatically renewed until canceled.
- One-yearly subscription for $US47.99 (or the equivalent in local currency), automatically renewed until canceled.

Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period.

Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.

When a subscription is canceled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

Privacy Policy: www.mondly.com/privacy
Terms: www.mondly.com/terms

We welcome your feedback and suggestions at: ios[at]mondly[dot]com
releaseNotes:
Major content update: 10 new courses teaching Business Communication comprising of:

• 240 engaging lessons / 5500 quizzes
• more than 2000 new words and phrases
• 3 proficiency levels: beginner, intermediate, advanced

Special feature: Introducing dynamic, personalized Review lessons.

title: Travel Town - Merge Adventure
description:
Explore Travel Town, where you can combine everything into better and more useful items while you travel the world!

Reveal secrets as you discover yourself and help the friendly people of Travel Town!


TRAVEL TOWN FEATURES:

== Match Objects ==
• Discover over 500 fantastic objects through hundreds of levels!
• Freely drag objects around the beautiful world and match 2 of a kind evolve them into more superior items!
• Fulfil the missions of the townsfolk to unlock more amazing items!

== Meet New Villagers ==
• Discover 55 villagers who live in Travel Town, and help them restore their seaside town!
• Match objects to upgrade them and unlock more and more items to support you on your journey!

== Town Building ==
• A storm has ravaged Travel Town - Collect coins and bring the town back to its former beauty!
• Discover and upgrade dozens of houses and improve the town beyond your wildest dreams!

Follow Travel Town on Facebook and Instagram for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: facebook.com/TravelTownGame/
Instagram: instagram.com/traveltowngame/

Terms of Service: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/terms.html
Privacy Notice: https://static.moonactive.net/legal/privacy.html

Questions about the game? Contact us in the game by clicking on Settings > Contact Us
Our support is also ready and waiting at:  https://support.traveltowngame.com/
releaseNotes:
Welcome to the latest update of Travel Town!
We’ve been busy improving the game and addressing bugs for you. 
Enjoy!
reviews:
I would looove this game if it wasnt for the stupid stamina…. Once I ran out there was an option to buy 25 stamina by watching an ad but then that option disapeared…. I could really play this game for hours, because i like that the merge is not restricted to just one game or level but another thing that pisses me off is when i do run out of stamina i have to click X on like 5 ads to buy it with real money (but What sane person would do that) | Afterast update i am stuck in loading on 35% and can not finish start game. | I totally love it | I really don't know what kind of game you guys are making. The benefits are terrible. The activities give you some gold coins or two diamonds, but nothing else. There are a lot of things at level 11. Do you really think this is fun? Take a look at the game Seaside Escape. Their game stamina is free of charge, and the activity benefits are 100 times better than yours. They also have a small box that gives you a level 7 item if you click on it, and you can get 38 boxes every Friday. My level there is already 140, and I played the game half a year later. It’s really funny. This game not only requires an Internet connection to play, but also requires krypton gold. It's amazing, I've never seen such a crappy game. In the past, the Internet was not required, but now it is mandatory. | I really enjoy this game, it is addictive, but the emount of energy is a joke, it allows me to play for 5-10 minutes and then i have to wait for another 3-4 hours to have my energy replenish fully, it is really annoying. I already purchased more energy for diamonds but that is also a small amount that can be used, i also purchased for my own money (which i cant do indefinitely). 

So maybe adding more energy or more chances to win energy (maybe some minigames included in the game) would be really apreciated. | It is definetely best game I know though rewards could be more generous. One needs 700 energy to fulfill a task. Daily payment is a need | Love to play it everyday. | Hra byla fakt super ale od poslední aktualizace je to katastrofa.
Denní výzva jde splnit pouze s tím že si člověk koupí !! nesmyslně drahé balíčky 😡😡

But developers make the game not playable without money with every update more and more. So now it is game only for rich people, who doesn’t care about spending a lots of money to complete tasks. | My god, used to be good. I updated it now after while and several minutes in and cant play any cause you force shove ten bilion ads in my face. Is there even game anymore or just commands to go here and go there and follow you there and there and there.. jesus christ, I used to relax playing this.
