I hope you are not going to discontinue usage of an old app, as the new one i really discourage anyone from using.

title: Gossip Harbor®: Merge & Story
description:
Welcome to Gossip Harbor 
Follow Quinn Castillo as her picture perfect life on Brimwave Island crumbles around her. Divorce, sabotage and secrets. Help answer the question everyone's thinking: Who's trying to ruin her life? 
Merge flavorful dishes, restore and decorate Quinn's restaurant and watch the mystery unfold. 
But who can you trust in Brimwave? 

Whip Up Tasty Dishes
Serve coffee, sandwiches, seafood, and a range of other dishes, to your customers. The more you play, the more dishes you’ll find to add to your menu!

Restore the Restaurant
Rebuild and design the best beach restaurant around! Choose the flooring, wallpaper and furniture to restore restaurant to its former glory! 

Build Relationships
Converse with customers and hang out with old friends. Or explore the possibility of a new budding romance. 

Catch up on the Gossip
You'll renovate and merged to reveal clues, and uncover hidden secrets of the residents on Brimwave Island. And perhaps even unveil the Castillo's hidden secrets…

Enjoying Gossip Harbor? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/GossipHarbor

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to serviceMergemerge@gmail.com
We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/privacy_2.0.html
Terms of Service: https://diary.cdn.mergesigma.com/resources/privacy/user_license_2.0.html
releaseNotes:
NEW EPISODE EVERY FRIDAY!
- NEW EPISODE: With new chapter updates every Friday; follow Quinn as she exposes secrets and solves puzzles.
- NEW EVENT: Amala is invited to the Brimwave Jazz Soiree! But she needs help to look sharp for a night out with some cool cats. Let's help her out!
reviews:
Hra je hezky zpracována a fajn, ale když se jedna o nějaký event, tak není možné, aby jste ho dokončili bez reálných peněz. A i když uz člověk investuje do této hry, tak většinou stejně nesplní daný event k vůli jeho náročnosti. 
Za mě to kazí cely dojem ze hry, protože tady platí klasika “pay to win”. 😡👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻 | Btw the first pictures on the description of the game is not like that, is like the last ones.
If you make a purchase they will not give you the free box that they give daily anymore. | niceee | Zabavý | i really wish there weren’t so many pop ups when you open the game. once you learn how to play it’s easy and you’ll check that all yourself. it’s really annoying. otherwise really good game. | Найкраща гра, яка не надоїдає
My favourite game 😍 | good | Nemuzu prestat hrat❤️❤️ | Super | Super | Very Good! | Fajn odychovka :-) | Moc se mi hra líbí | Using weird pronouns, first romance you come across is between two dudes…deleted without looking back. | I love this gameee | Zbožňuju když si můžu dělat věci podle sebe | Udělejte ještě nějaký gildu nebo klan ať se mohou lidí připojit 🙂 | Hraje se dobre. Zabaví

title: Memrise: Speak a new language
description:
Over 70 million people learn a language with Memrise, the app built by language learning experts. In 10 minute daily lessons you’ll get speaking a new language with confidence. 

Learn Spanish, Korean, Japanese or 20 other languages in lessons that teach you vocabulary, listening and speaking as if you were a local living in the country! 

Choose a language from Spanish, Korean, Japanese, English, French, Italian, Portuguese, German, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Chinese, Dutch, Danish, Icelandic, Mongolia, Norwegian, Slovenian & Yoruba.

JUST ADDED: Greek and Indonesian! 

Memrise is the best language-learning app for beginners that are starting to learn a language from scratch, intermediate learners that want to build on their listening and speaking, and advanced learners who are looking to improve their conversational skills

Unlike other language learning apps, Memrise is built around mastering specific conversations. 

1) Set your level and import your streak from other apps. 
2) Pick which conversations you want to master 
3) Learn practical vocab and phrases
4) Listen to native speakers, get used to their accents and tempo 
5) Practice speaking with your AI tutor, MemBot so you’re confident when you do the real thing.

Never get stuck learning a language but not knowing what to say. 

- 190,00 4.6 star ratings 
- Featured in BBC World Service, Forbes, The Verge, The Financial Times and more 

Why Memrise? 

Speak with our AI language tutor: Get unlimited speaking practice (and feedback) from MemBot, our AI language tutor. Build up confidence in private before speaking with natives for real. 

Hear how the locals actually speak: Watch 30,000+ conversations between real natives, so you can confidently understand their accents and listen to words and phrases they actually use. 

Learn words relevant to your life: Pick conversations that reflect your interests so you can show off your personality. 

--

What other learners are saying 

Voloúre - "Best app for getting experience listening and interacting with native speakers. Listening to conversations by native speakers is so much better for actually being able to understand people"

Beth Williams - "My Fiancé is Portuguese so I wanted to learn their language to communicate easily. Over the year I can now string small sentences together. I don't think I could have done it without the help of Memrise."

Serious about language learning? Build your confidence faster with Memrise Pro 

Memrise Pro: - Unlock all vocab lessons in Memrise-approved language courses - 30,000 native speaker videos - Unlimited speaking practice - 

Compare with our Free Plan: - Limited vocab lessons - Limited native speaker videos (2 per day) - Limited speaking practice (2 conversations per day) - Not Ad free 

--

Download our app for free and start learning with Memrise today: Learn French, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Mexico), German, Korean, Japanese, Japanese (no script), Turkish, Italian, Chinese (simplified), Dutch, Portuguese (Portugal), Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Swedish, Norwegian, Polish, Danish, Slovenian, Icelandic, Yoruba, Mongolian, English (UK) and English (US)! 

------
*PLEASE READ: A Memrise Pro subscription are designed for Memrise-approved courses. A subscription is required in order to access all our learning features. These features may vary depending on your device's language and language pair. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current payment period. Subscriptions can be managed or cancelled in your Apple App Store account. In-app Permissions – To enable some of the features of the Memrise app we may need to ask for your permission. For example, we'll ask to access your microphone if you'd like to practice your pronunciation skills. You can change permissions at any time in your settings. 

Privacy Policy: https://www.memrise.com/privacy/  
Terms of Use: https://www.memrise.com/terms/
releaseNotes:
In this update:

Fresh lick of paint, checked the oil, pumped the tyres, just a bit of a tune-up.

- We fixed a few buttons that weren't displaying properly
- Our designers popped in some new images
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

Kombinuju to dohromady s Duolingem... | Používám teda zatím jen chvíli, ale doposud jsem nenašel nic co by mi jakkoli vadilo. title: 3D Earth & moon, sun and stars
description:
The incredible real-time rendered the 3D Earth on your iPhone or iPad.
The powerful Apple Metal engine can make that amazing 3D Earth model and optic effects only.
Whole earth at your hands, billion stars, and galaxies.

Features:
- Real sun position
- Real moon position ( distance between earth not real )
- High-quality earth texture
- Texture bumping, you can see real mountains and hills on the earth
- Show your location ( geolocation service must be enabled at first run )
- Ultimate optic effects when the sun is shining to the camera
- Autorotate function, just swipe on the earth
- The earth atmosphere effect
- Rel reflection of the water
- Real the space image with stars, milky ways, and galaxies
releaseNotes:
- Improved app stability
- Minor bug fixes
reviews: Super hra doporučuji 😊😉 | Ta aplikace se mi moc líbí 😄 můžu se kouknout  kde jsem a to je fajn a nejsou tam žádné reklami🙂

title: DoKapsy od ČSOB
description:
The DoKapsy od ČSOB app is free for everyone, regardless of where you bank.

Take advantage of convenient payment using your mobile phone for parking, public transport tickets and refuelling. The app also gives you free access to paid media, and you can even upload your loyalty cards. With an ČSOB or ČSOB Poštovní spořitelna account in the app, you also have an overview of payment cards and the ČSOB Na cesty service for more convenient shopping abroad.

Public transport tickets
You can conveniently pay for public transport tickets in Prague, Liberec, Olomouc and other cities directly from your mobile phone using a payment card or Apple Pay. Simply show the driver or inspector your electronic ticket on your smartphone’s screen.

Parking 
Forget about having to look for a parking machine ever again – with the app you can simply pay for parking in all zones, at selected shopping centres or at private car parks in Prague, Brno and many other cities across the Czech Republic. And you can even extend your parking time right on your mobile phone using your payment card or Apple Pay.

Trips 
Discover many beautiful and unusual places with us. You can select tips for trips directly from the map or sort by the level of difficulty and time requirements.

Foodies

Maybe there is an interesting foodie event nearby. Or perhaps you have a just a short walk from your workplace to a wonderful cake shop. All you need to do is to look into DoKapsy and reach out for some interesting foodie ideas. 

Chargers
Find your nearest charging point, get a ride to it and pay with a QR code from the stand. You can search with your finger on the map, by name, or filter by parameters. You can easily save frequently used chargers to your favorites. 

Tankuj
At Globus filling stations, you can pay for fuel directly at the pump. Simply scan the QR code to pay and you're on your way.

Loyalty cards
Upload the loyalty cards from your favourite supermarkets, chemists, fashion boutiques, cafes and bookshops to your mobile phone. At the checkout, simply select the right card in the app and scan the barcode on the display.

Discounts 
Choose from promotional offers from our partners – with the DoKapsy app, you can take advantage of our Svět odměn loyalty programme, even if you are not a ČSOB client.

Other services
And that's not all! Try out other new functions: buy highway stamps, enjoy free access to paid news and articles, donate to charity or get an energy assessment for your home.

Extra benefits for ČSOB clients

Overview 
The app shows you all your payment cards, providing you an immediate overview of balances and payment history. 

ČSOB Na cesty 
With your year-long travel insurance, you get free ATM withdrawals abroad. And we'll refund you 1.5% on every card payment you make abroad.

DoKapsy od ČSOB offers extreme security.
Sign in to your app using Touch ID, Face ID or PIN. The app provides you only passive access to the funds on your account – you can view the balance and history, but you can’t send money.

title: Seaside Escape®: Merge & Story
description:
Kryphos has changed almost beyond recognition in the last five years, and fallen celebrity Rowan needs your help to turn things around. Here, the right merge can change everything.

Come and join us, and get lost in the world of Seaside Escape!

Game Features
• All it takes is a simple drag of your finger, to turn two basic items into something incredible! 
• With hundreds of items, you can merge almost anything you can think of!
• Help the residents of Kryphos not only survive, but thrive!
• Help Rowan restore her shattered confidence and rebuild her life!
• Uncover hidden secrets as you rebuild Kryphos!
• There are surprises hiding around every corner, just waiting for you to find them!

Enjoying Seaside Escape? Learn more about the game on our Facebook Fan Page!
https://www.facebook.com/SeasideEscapeGame/

Need help? Contact us by sending an email to SeasideEscapecustomer@gmail.com.We're here to help you! 

Privacy Policy: https://www.microfun.com/privacy_EN.html
Terms of Service: https://www.microfun.com/userAgreementEN.html
releaseNotes:
NEW CONTENT EVERY WEEK 
- Locations! Unlock a new location and its secrets!
- Events! Spice up your gaming experience with this weeks' event!

We've also fixed bugs and added cool new features!

I tried updating and even re-downloading the whole game… Please fix it. :((( | I am really mad because you show totally different Game in those ads, stop making fools out of people please :))))))) i’ve been playing that Game for almost 5 months and those ads are going wild! | After you reach a certain level (I think it was 110+ in my case) it is very hard to complete some orders even if you buy bundles. At some point it took me about 400 energy to complete one order. I like the game but I come for fun not stress and counting how much energy I need to complete one single order. Once magical forest is over (I paid for the pass) I will remove the game. Thank you | I love it but i don’t have the card game in it, what do i do to get it? | Lots of benefits, fun, recommended, recommended, recommended | Super | Super | Super | Gut hsmr

title: Fischer
description: Stáhněte si svého osobního průvodce na dovolenou a mějte všechny potřebné informace o vašem zájezdu v kapse. Informace o vašem letu, zakoupených službách, kontakt na delegáta nebo třeba i to, v kolik hodin se otvírá večerní bar tak budete mít vždy po ruce. Objevujte nové aktivity a navštivte zajímavá místa, která si během dovolené nesmíte nechat ujít.
releaseNotes: Změnili jsme odpočet času do začátku dovolené a vylepšili další funkce na základě zpětné vazby od uživatelů.
reviews:

Ti hosi jsou moc fajn , snazivi, ochotni . A to se tyka egypta . V recku diametralne odlisny pristup !! Mozna je to k zamysleni. Zajezdy radeji kupuji pres linku fischer nebot damy v pevnych obchodech ( nevim pric ) jsou mene ochotne, vstricne - proste je zrejme zdrzujeme ) 
Tot vse diky anitram
Anitramm | Super aplikace úžasně jednoduchá a chytrá :-) | První den v Melia | Aplikace ušetří spoustu času s hledáním důležitých informací o dovolené v e-mailech a na webu. Kdykoliv jsem se mohla velmi jednoduše a rychle podívat, v kolik hodin odlétá letadlo nebo třeba v kolik se otvírá bar na pláži nebo restaurace. Taky jsme vyzkoušeli tipy na zajímavá místa v okolí a moc oceňuji, že jsou i s mapkou, takže jsme na některá došli i pěšky. Příští rok beru appku určitě opět s námi. 👍👍 | Hezky zpracovaná aplikace, kde vidím jak letový řád,hotel či například kdy doplatit zájezd,který mám zakoupen…bonus je popis hotelu a veškeré info o destinaci, kde letím :-)

title: Eurowings
description:
With the Eurowings App you have your trip right in your pocket: Quickly and conveniently all important functions and information at a glance.

All advantages at a glance

# Mobile travel management
# Check in and create boarding pass
# Receive real-time flight information
# Earn miles (Miles & More)
# Use additional services, such as changing seats or adding luggage
# Special Assistance (information and assistance in case of flight cancellations and strikes)

Search & book trip
# Search and book flights
# 155 destinations in Europe
# Savings calendar (cheapest flights at the best tariff)
# Tariff overview for easy comparison for best alternatives

Manage bookings mobile
# All trips with flight schedule and history
# Personalized myEurowings account guarantees fast booking and administration of personal data

Online check-in
# Online check-in from 72h before departure
# Easy booking of seats (e.g. with more legroom)
# Information on permitted hand luggage

Create boarding passes
# Export to Apple Wallet
# Save locally in the app
# Send to e-mail
# Download as PDF

Real-time flight information
# Flight status & updates (terminal and gate changes, boarding time)
# Automatic push notifications

Frequent flyer benefits
# Earn valuable miles
# Lufthansa Miles & More

Book additional services
# Change seat
# Add luggage
# Rebook and cancel flights

Special Support
# Real-time information in case of flight cancellations and strikes
# Assistance on further procedure
# Contact and hotline
releaseNotes: This update includes bug fixes as well as improvements. You can contact us directly through the app via our feedback function. Have you noticed a technical issue? Write to us at mobile@eurowings.com.

title: SmartGuide travel guide & map
description:
Smart Guide – Where All Journeys Begin
You Explore, We’ll Guide

SmartGuide is your personal tour guide to the world. Turn your phone into a personal audio tour guide to accompany you on your travel adventures.
Whether you are looking for a self-guided tour, audio traveler guide, city offline maps or you just want to know all the best sightseeing spots, fun activities, and authentic experiences for your travel destination, SmartGuide is the perfect choice for your travel guide needs.

ONE DIGITAL GUIDE APP FOR THE WHOLE WORLD
This personal guide app offers travel guides for over 1000 popular destinations around the world. Wherever your journey may take you, SmartGuide tours will meet you there!
You explore. We’ll guide.

SAFE CONTACT-LESS TOUR GUIDE
Crowded tour groups from all around the world are a prime breeding ground for respiratory viruses and similar bugs. This is not a souvenir you want to bring from your trip. Our virtual tour guide recommends different places to each tourist based on their individual interests and guides you safely outside of the crowds. Stay safe with a self-guided tour.

AUDIO GUIDE
The personal travel planner app is your audio guide to the world that lets you conveniently listen to a travel guide with interesting narratives from local guides that play automatically when you reach an interesting sight. Just let your phone talk to you and enjoy the scenery!

FREE SELF-GUIDED TOURS
SmartGuide won’t let you get lost and you won't miss any must-see sights. City-guide app uses GPS navigation to guide you around the city at your convenience at your own pace, for free. Gone are the days when you had to follow the crowd. Now you can use SmartGuide and travel whenever you want, however you want.
Sightseeing guide for the modern tripwolf on the hunt for undiscovered wonders of nature!

FIND HIDDEN GEMS AND ESCAPE TOURIST TRAPS
With extra local secrets, our guides provide you with inside information about the best spots off the beaten path. Escape the traps when you visit a city and immerse yourself in the culture trip. Get around like a local and discover the actual culture and heritage of any locality!

EVERYTHING IS OFFLINE.
Download your city guide and get the offline maps and guide with our premium option so you have the freedom to roam and discover the world like the tripwolf that you are, without worrying one bit about finding an internet connection. Your travel guide will be available offline in the form of verbal instructions from natives and if you are someone that prefers reading over listening, the transcripts of the audio guides are also available.

Get the most out of your world travel experience by exploring with SmartGuide: Your Personal Travel Audio Guide!
releaseNotes:
Thanks for updating SmartGuide! What's new in this version:

Various improvements & fixes
- Not very noticeable but make the app more useful :)
reviews:
Takhle jsem se chtěl nechat provést:) | I love exploring new places and discovering the world. But I'm never alone. I always have my dog by my side, which can sometimes make exploring new places seem a little more difficult. 

But with SmartGuide, the best dog friendly guide, nothing is a problem. 

For most routes and places, I don't have to ask any guide for permission to take my dog Oliver with me, I simply choose a route in the area we're in and we're off to see and listen to what this pocket guide has to offer. | The app is super helpful while discovering various destinations around the world. I was amazed that I found there interesting info not just about the famous destinations but as well local gems, like history of a train station from my small village :) And! If you want to add a guide for your own town, you can easily created it yourself ;) I recommend to try it out! | forget paper maps and brochures. this guide app show you  the destination like a live guide. lots of information you dont find in google maps | I tried SmartGuide several times when visiting some european cities as a solo traveller. I was pleasantly surprised how the audio guide made my day trips more educational and exciting. I simply enjoyed to walk on the street and simultaneously listen about history, art or architecture of all iconic places. | SmartGuide’s the best! It’s like having a personal guide in my pocket. | Výborný pomocník na cestách. Taky super apka ve městě kde bydlím, o hodně místech toho teď vim mnohem víc díky této aplikaci. Díky 😉 | I really like the app! It helped me to find some interesting places during my solo trips :) | Thanks to SmartGuide, I feel like a local in every new city. So cool! | SmartGuide je úžasný! Nejenže mi poskytl všechny potřebné informace, ale také mě navigoval po skvělých trasách a odhalil mi skryté poklady. Je to nezbytná aplikace pro cestování. | SmartGuide has made traveling a breeze. It's like having a local expert in my pocket! | Absolutely loved touring around Auckland with SmartGuide. Excited to try it in other cities as well. | Skvělá aplikace! Moc nás baví s ní poznávat nová krásná mista | This is the best offline audio guide i have ever tried. Really user friendly and helps you to get oriented through out many different cities and countries. Since I have tried SmartGuide, my experiences about travelling have been out of this world! | Helpful! helps me in my ways, but still need some updates tho. | This travel guide was so handy during my last visit. + works offline! | Bývalý TripWolf | I learnt so much about the city nad it was very smooth. I will certainly use on other trips, hope to see the coverage grow | 👌 | I like it! | Great traveling app, has all the essentials you might need - offline map, public transport, restaurants, etc... | Excelent guide. Simple, easy to use. | Helpful, like it, simple interface and off line use. | Very nice guide :-) | Parada | Super aplikace na cesty

title: Grab: Taxi & Grocery Order
description:
Get everything delivered to your doorstep with Grab – the leading ride-hailing, taxi, food delivery, and grocery app in Southeast Asia!

We offer essential everyday services to over 670 million people across Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Philippines, Vietnam, Cambodia, and Myanmar.

Grab offers various ride-hailing options, including 4-wheel and 2-wheel rides, and taxi booking. Grab also offers a diverse range of services including food order delivery from restaurants, prompt package delivery, and groceries from supermarkets, making it a leading taxi app and delivery platform.

Experience convenience like never before with Grab – your all-in-one solution for ride-hailing, food delivery, groceries, and more!

Book a ride for any occasion and budget
Order a ride on Grab, the top ride-hailing and taxi app in Southeast Asia. Choose from a variety of transport modes, including cars, motorbikes, and buses, and get matched with a professional driver in minutes.

Food delivery for any craving
GrabFood: a leading food delivery app that allows you to easily order food from your favourite restaurants and get it delivered to your doorstep, making it convenient and hassle-free

Conveniently order food and groceries for delivery
GrabMart is a convenient food delivery app that allows you to order groceries and handpicked fresh produce from your favourite supermarket.

Secure and seamless cashless payments
GrabPay: A safe and secure mobile wallet where you can easily pay for Grab services, such as food and grocery delivery and taxis, as well as at local merchants

Reliable on-demand package delivery
GrabExpress: Order affordable, fast, and reliable courier service with insurance for your items

Rewards for using Grab
GrabRewards: Order food, ride and earn reward points for every dollar you spend and use them to redeem deals in the GrabRewards catalogue

Grab is the only ride-hailing and food-delivery app you need. Whether you are searching for a taxi app, express food delivery, or grocery delivery, Grab has got you covered.

In addition to our renowned ride-hailing, taxi, and food delivery services, we also strive to promote economic empowerment for everyone in the region. We provide financial services such as wealth management, lending, cashless payments, and insurance.

Find out more about us at www.grab.com.
Grab offers the ability for users to receive personalized targeted advertising, offers, and updates from Grab and its partners and communications/advertising from certain third-party apps based on activity on your devices. Users may exercise opt-out choices under the Privacy and Consent Management sections within Settings within the app. For further details, you may refer to our Privacy Policy at www.grab.com/privacy.
releaseNotes:
Most of us think dinosaurs are the most amazing creatures. However, scientists discovered that there are lots of creatures that existed long before dinosaurs. One of those creatures is the grasshopper. The fossil record shows that these insects first appeared more than 300 million years ago.

We don't know how long bugs inside the Grab app have been around. That's because we destroy them from the app once we see them.

Remove the dead bugs by updating to 5.303. It's not im-fossil-ble to do.

title: FlyAway
description:
Aplikace FlyAway vás upozorní na akční letenky už od 250 Kč. Levné letenky už nemusíte nikde hledat, aplikace FlyAway monitoruje levné letenky za vás.

V aplikaci publikujeme jen ty nejlepší nabídky akčních letů, které opravdu stojí za to.
Upozorníme vás pouze na lety s atraktivní slevou
Vybíráme hlavně přímé lety nebo s krátkým mezipřistáním
Bereme v úvahu ideální počet dní strávených v destinaci

V APLIKACI FLYAWAY REZERVUJTE LETENKY VŽDY ZA NEJNIŽŠÍ CENU

V aplikaci FlyAway letenky přímo neprodáváme (=nenavyšujeme ceny o svou provizi), vždy odkazujeme na rezervaci přímo u aerolinky. Jedině to je způsob, jak získat nejnižší cenu, nepřeplácet za doplňkové služby a v případě zpoždění či zrušení letů řešit transparentně a rychle refundace a jiné požadavky.

VLASTNÍ FILTRY

V aplikaci si můžete nastavit své nejbližší odletové letiště a dostávat tak upozornění na letenky, které jsou pro vás nejvýhodnější.

K tomu si můžete nastavit sledování akčních letenek i z okolních letišť, která jsou brána jako sekundární letiště a upozornění dostanete vždy pouze na lety, které se výrazně vyplatí i s ohledem na dopravu.

Dále si můžete nastavit destinace, které chcete sledovat a dostávat upozornění na akční letenky jen do vybraných destinací.

ITINERÁŘE

Kromě akčních letenek v aplikaci najdete také připravené itineráře do různých destinací. Stačí rezervovat svůj let a vydat se na cestu s připraveným itinerářem.

DETAILNÍ INFORMACE KE KAŽDÉ LETENCE

U každé letenky vždy vidíte:
Počasí v destinaci na termín cesty
Základní info o destinaci
Termín letu
Rozmezí dnů, kdy je let operován
Cenu a odkaz na rezervaci
Počet dní strávených v destinaci
Rozměr zavazadel a případné příplatky za příruční, či odbavené zavazadlo
Informace o případných přestupech
COVID podmínky vstupu a návratu

ZÁKAZNICKÁ PODPORA

V aplikaci je dostupný live chat k vašim dotazům, na kterém jsme každý pracovní den od 9 do 18 h.

Pokud máte jakékoliv dotazy, můžete se také obrátit na naši podporu na emailu podpora@fly-away.cz

Cestujte super levně a stáhněte si FlyAway.
releaseNotes:
- Nově jsme přidali live chat podporu. Live chat najdeš v záložce Nastavení.
- V cestovních itinerářích nově najdeš graf s teplotou a počasím v destinaci v průběhu roku.
- Každý předplatitel PREMIUM účtu má nově PLATINUM účet až do 31.10.
- Vrátili jsme týdenní zkušební verzi i pro měsíční předplatné.

title: Drops: Language Learning Games
description:
Join over 40 million people who use Drops for free language lessons. It’s fast, fun, and easy! Practice vocabulary in Spanish, Japanese, French, Korean, Chinese, German, English. Discover 50+ different new languages with Drops!

Learn new languages while playing games. You can become fluent, learn vocabulary and common phrases in English, German, French, Russian, and Italian. Set goals, unlock achievements, and get rewards!

• Become fluent in a foreign language with this language learning app
• Learn to read characters and scripts from different alphabets like Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Hebrew, Arabic, Russian, and Hindi 
• Custom illustrations for each vocabulary word makes it easy to remember
• From beginner to expert levels, grow your foreign language vocabulary
• A professionally curated vocabulary list with more than 3,000 words and phrases 
• Game-like language lessons that make language learning fun and effective
• Level up! Track your progress and get rewards
• Professional voice artists and sound design with correct dialect pronunciations
• Learn to speak languages like European Portuguese, Castilian Spanish, Korean, Japanese, Arabic, American English, British English, German, French, Russian, Italian, Mexican Spanish, Latin-American Spanish, Tagalog, Hebrew, Icelandic, Polish, Mandarin Chinese, Turkish, Cantonese Chinese, Dutch, Norwegian, Thai, Swedish, Vietnamese, Maori, Brazilian Portuguese, Farsi (Persian), Hungarian, Greek, Hindi, Danish, Samoan, Indonesian, Finnish, Serbian, Croatian, Esperanto, Estonian, Hawaiian, Ukrainian, Yoruba, Bosnian, Swahili, Igbo, Sanskrit and even Ainu!

"By focusing on visually appealing games and vocab, Drops aims to lower the barrier preventing users from exploring a new language and, ultimately, accessing the social and economic benefits knowing that language may provide." - TechCrunch

We are featured by CNET, Forbes, VentureBeat and many other places too!

Try Drops Premium with a 7 day free trial. Download the app to learn about different membership options, and register to learn all about exclusive discounts.

Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of Drops premium. Afterwards your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the iTunes Store after purchase. You can cancel your subscription anytime, and you won't be charged in the next billing cycle.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html
releaseNotes: We’ve made improvements to the Drops app! This update contains bug fixes and offers you a better play experience. Happy language learning!

title: Lufthansa
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and manage your boarding passes – the Lufthansa app offers you all this and much more. The Lufthansa app: your mobile travel companion for smooth and seamless journeys with Lufthansa Group Network Airlines.
With push notifications and real-time flight information, relevant flight status updates and offers will be sent directly to your smartphone. This way you’ll be up to speed throughout your entire flight.
The Lufthansa app keeps you informed during your journey, from the moment you book your flight to when you arrive and even after you have landed, ensuring everything runs as smoothly as possible. With your personal profile, you can conveniently manage your data and personalized services.
In short: With the Lufthansa app, you’re well taken care of during your travels.
The key features of the Lufthansa app:

Before the flight
•	Book flights, reserve seats and add baggage: Book your desired flight and rent a car if you need to. You can also reserve or change your seat and add extra baggage.

•	Online check-in: Use the Lufthansa app to check in for all flights operated by Lufthansa Group Network Airlines. You will receive your digital flight ticket on your smartphone and can conveniently access your mobile boarding pass from the app.
•	Travel ID and Lufthansa Miles and More: With the new digital wallet, you can store multiple payment methods in your Travel ID account, allowing for seamless and easy payment any time and from anywhere. Use your Travel ID or Lufthansa Miles & More login for personalized services. For a greater level of convenience, you can save your personal information in the Lufthansa app.
•	Real-time information and flight status: Your personal travel assistant provides you with important flight details and updates about your trip starting 24 hours before your flight departure. You’ll receive push notifications for check-in and the flight status and any gate changes will be displayed clearly on your home screen. This way you are able to keep track of your flights and prepare for them accordingly so you can start your trip feeling as relaxed as possible.
During the flight
•	Flight ticket and onboard services: With the Lufthansa app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and onboard services at your fingertips – even when you’re offline. Access all relevant flight information as needed and always stay informed about any changes, without having to ask the flight crew.
After the flight
•	Track baggage: Your digital travel companion is still there to support you even after you’ve landed. Conveniently track your checked-in baggage in the smartphone app and stay informed about the next parts of your journey.
The Lufthansa app is the complete solution for a smooth travel experience. Conveniently book your flights and rental cars via the app, receive automatic notifications and updates about upcoming flights, and manage your personal data conveniently on the go.
Download the Lufthansa app now and enjoy your trip! Your personal travel assistant is there for you before, during and after your flight.
Find out about our flight offers at lufthansa.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date with the latest news.
If you have any questions or need support, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch with us at lufthansa.com/xx/en/help-and-contact.
releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes and improvements
reviews:

title: Babbel - Language Learning
description:
Millions of people learn languages with Babbel — the language app built by language experts. Why Babbel? Our short and effective language courses get you speaking with confidence.

BABBEL WORKS:

• 92% of Babbel users improved their proficiency in just two months*

• After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found:
96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary
73% of study participants became better speakers**

====================

Our language experts build every language course tailored to your native language. This way you learn Spanish and 13 more languages quickly and effectively.

TRY BABBEL – DOWNLOAD THE APP AND TAKE A FREE LESSON

====================

LEARN 14 LANGUAGES:

Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian, and English

====================

Why learn languages with the Babbel language app?

SHORT, EFFECTIVE LESSONS
Easy to fit language lessons into your day

LESSONS FOR EVERY SITUATION
For travel, work, and more

LISTEN, SPEAK, WRITE
Well-rounded language practise

PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Sophisticated speech-recognition technology

RETAIN WHAT YOU LEARN
Review feature that’s optimised to help you retain knowledge

LEARN GRAMMAR IN CONTEXT
Useful tips & tricks as you learn

OVER 5,000 LANGUAGE COURSES
Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons

OFFLINE MODE
Download lessons and learn anywhere

====================

Read Babbel Magazine to get tips, tricks, and interesting facts about how to learn languages:
* Babbel Magazine: https://www.babbel.com/en/magazine

Follow us on social media for tips on language learning!
* Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/babbel/
* Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages/

====================

You will need a subscription in order to get access to the full learning materials for one language. Each subscription will be automatically renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is cancelled, access to the app’s courses and features will expire at the end of the current payment period.

You'll get access to all courses for the following durations:

3 months
6 months
12 months

Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/
Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/

CONTACT US:

Ideas, comments, or feedback? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com


*Vesselinov, R. and Grego, J. The Babbel Efficacy Study. New York 2016

**Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Loewen, S., Isbell (both Michigan State University) & Sporn. Z (Babbel), 2018. “Learning Spanish with Babbel: Oral Proficiency Outcome in App-Based Foreign Language Learning”.
releaseNotes:
Tired of all the bad news out there? Well, here's some good news from the Babbel universe! We've removed more of the bugs you mentioned to us and upgraded your favourite courses. So, cheer app and go on, try our latest version!  

Questions? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com
reviews:
I use for learning german language. I appreciate especially grammar exercises that are better prepared than for example in Duolingo. I am missing english learning from english - it is not possible. You have to speak different language to have option to learn english. However choice of other languages is limited. | Chybí podpora češtiny, nepoužitelne, lepší duolingo nebo jina konkurence | Platím si druhým rokem včetně neomezenych Live lekcí a díky tomu je progress při učení skutečně slušný. | Aplikace v plné verzi funguje spolehlivě a má krásný design. Společně s Duolingem velmi uživatelsky přívětivé aplikace na podporu učení cizích jazyků. | Je to asi nejlepší aplikace na výuku jazyků, kterou znám. Tady jen neopakuji slovíčka, ale opravdu se učím pracovat na gramatice a celkovém proniknutí do jazyka. Líbí se mi, jak si tvůrci vyhráli s namluvením rozhovorů, je to zábavné. Nevýhodou je platba za každý jazyk zvlášť,ale pokud se člověk rozhodne dělat pořádně jeden jazyk, je toto skvělá volba. | Після години використання iphone xs гріється так ніби я граю в pubg і додаток починає сильно глючити | I speak Czech, I want to learn English. I can’t even get through the initial setup | Občas padá, chtělo by to víc podcastů k poslechu. Jinak se mi líbí oddělené běžné lekce a lekce gramatiky, koncepce opakování - škoda, že se tam nedají ondividuálně přidat oblíbené věty z rozhovorů, které opravdu působí přirozeně a užitečně. Super aplikace. | I like my studying with babbel with this app. It's pretty well designed and easy to use. Just one thing I would like to see in newer versions: ways to report mistakes in lessons (doesn't happen often but spotted one at least once in the German course). | Good app! Miles better than its more well known competitor. There are two issues however: it is not possible to use writing with German without German keyboard. I'm not going to install it and I'd prefer the option to have reviews and stuff ignore umlauts and accept double S for gross S. Also it doesn't seem possible to configure I only ever wanna use writing in reviews. I have to select it every time. I use the app on the go without headphones and I'm not going to be listening to my phone aloud nor talking to out while out and about.

Update: The Babbel support is not very good. Downgraded the review to 3 stars not 4. | Excelente! Muchas gracias “nach” Berlin ☀️👍 | En lo personal, si eres una persona dedicada, luego de varias semanas de haber comenzando con la lengua italiana, comencé ya a estructurar oraciones con los verbos aprendidos y a mejorar mi fluidez. Definitivamente para comenzar la plataforma es recomendable. | If you look to learn Russian beyond A1, this is not the app you are looking for. | I enjoy getting back to learning foreign languages many years after my last attempt. It's not meant for linguists, but for an early start of speaking without being unconfident shy or whatever. Some essential simple grammar lightly infiltrates basic conversational topics. The course is far from being steep. Cons: * AFAIK no possibility not to start from scratch. * I miss Japanese. * My doughter would be glad to use Babbel to learn English based on Czech language, but it's not available (yet?). | The content is great but the app is wonky. Cant get iPad widget to work. | I learn Danish and I love it, the coversations (listening) and explanation of Danish lifestyle and tradition. I wish Babbel expand to Hebrew too! Are you planning to add Hebrew? Please consider it! | it’s very easy to use and it helps me to learn GER 👍 | very quick, efficient, funny, perfect graphics | When I do review with speaking it very often very poorly  recognizes my speaking, for Spanish. You can say whole sentence 5 times and always recognizes some nonsense words. But what is absolutely nonsense is that after you pres next it does no play the correct pronaunciation at all! Why it plays correct when you speak it correct and does no show you correct when you have troubles to say it!? | when you choose a language, it doesen't even ask you what your level is, you just start from the most basics and you need to go through it to unlock other lessons. if you dont pay, you can only play one lesson in which you learn how to say hello, please, good bye and yes. then you have to pay. its funny because even google translator teaches you more than this funny application that only cares about money. it would make a better sense if you put ads and by this way got the money, but forcing people who are trying to learn a language to pay right from the start is weird. | Everything works rather well, even the sync. Only problem I can’t get trough is the mic part. It’s absolutely random or too sensitive to for the sentence phonology. | The lessons are awesome. However after each exercise there is a lot of waiting till you get to a next slide. It makes it a little bit boring. But still worth it. | 3* - I am seriously missing this feature. When learning new words and expressions in Babbel, I want to add these to my note taking app open another window, having both apps side-by-side. Please implement it as soon as possible. I believe many iPad users will find it beneficial and practical. Thank you | I am happy with the language courses and options to learn. 

But please, make the in app keyboard more responsive like the iOS keyboard. It’s insanely slow and inaccurate when writing and it just drives me crazy to rewrite half of my inputs | I have been using the app for French for a while. At the beginning just the app (started from very basics), now (last 3 months) as a supplement for the official French course I am attending at language institute (A2). 

I am trying to do one lesson a day (10 min tops) in the app and I can say it follows the learning plan of my official course. I have got a bit ahead with a grammar in it ( the app explains it really well), so now I am basically reviewing stuff on class, which really helps me to build the knowledge fast. | Why the Review option is not available all the time? I wold like to review what I learned as much as I need before moving to the next lesson. Now I have to either repeat the whole lesson or just listen to all of the words one by one. It is very inconvenient. | This is a really good app, I tried to learn to speak italian. I remebered the first four words very quickly - but I cannot learn more - it needs to be upgraded to premium. I liked this app, but I don’t think it is worth so much money. | Please atd czech language. App is great but for Czech peoples is unusable. Thank you | I wrote once a word that the French guys are talking too quickly and I have the feeling that you slowdowned the Spanish ones :-)))) which we’re totally fine! I wish that the FRENCH speakers would talk way more clearly!!! Especially for the beginner like me is really difficult to catch the words they are saying even with listening again :-( 

But still very satisfied and happy to learn two nice languages, keep improving! | Die Lektionen sind zwar gut aufgebaut, jedoch fehlen mehr Übungen, um die wörte und Gramatik zu einprägen. | Hi, could you please add Japanese? I like the app and would like to try it, but I want to learn only Japanese. Thanks :) | Great app! I really like the way it teaches! It touches all the learning ways - through listening, writing, hearing and translating. Chapeau! | This app is great example of pure stupidity. I wanted to improve my english but you can ´t choose English as a language you wanted to learn........... 
Please use common sense or don ´t release unfinished apps. | I wanna practice my english but I cant chose to have this app in English language too. Could u do something with that? | Please add Czech. I want learn english but im from czech republic | A nicely done app, with useful vocabulary and varied exercises, a great tool for learning a little bit every day! | Great UI, the best way for language self learning. | This is really a 21st century way of learning languages. | Pro čecha, který si chce zlepšit angličtinu, nepoužitelné. Češtinu v této aplikaci nehledejte. | I was going to Brazil, so I paid for subscription for three months, My Phone get stollen and I forgot about it. They charged my several times before I noticed. No email, no thanks for paying. It's quite a trap so be careful about it !!! | I am learning German on this app an so far I like it. I would change order of some lessons but I general great. It learns you how to write, speak (improvement needed here as well, but this is issues for all apps that are using the same thing). Love it, affordable and recommend it! 4* from me since improvements are always welcome | The continue button after each part doesn't appear and it is not a possible finish a lesson.

Wasted money... | I just installed it. It is simple to learn basic words and grammar rules, however, I will see how it could explain more complicated grammar.

title: Radarbot: Speed Camera Alerts
description:
The only app that combines real time alerts with the best offline radar detection alert system. With Radarbot, you will have the best radar alerts, real time traffic alerts and specific speed limit alerts for different vehicles (cars, motorbikes, trucks and commercial vehicles) in one powerful app. Focus on what really matters while driving and enjoy your journey.

With Radarbot, drive more peacefully. Safer. Better.

SPEED CAMERA WARNINGS
Enjoy driving without having to worry about risking your safety or driving licence. Avoid traffic fines and penalties by receiving clear warnings before passing speed cameras:

- Fixed speed cameras.
- Possible mobile speed cameras (frequent areas).
- Tunnel speed cameras.
- Average speed cameras (the app displays the average speed).
- Traffic light cameras.

Plus:
- Dangerous driving areas.
- Seat belt or cell phone use cameras.
- Restricted area access control cameras.
- Potholes and speed bumps on the road.

* FEATURES:
- Works in any country.
- Compatible with other apps. You can use Radarbot together with other GPS navigators or your favourite music app. You will still receive alerts in the background or while the screen is turned off.
- Alerts only in the direction you are driving. The app automatically ignores speed cameras for traffic going in the opposite direction or off route.
- Voice alerts.
- Sound alerts when approaching a speed camera or going over the speed limit.
- Vibration mode for motorists.
- Fully configurable warning distances and parameters.
- Automatic Bluetooth connection and startup.
- Compatible with Apple Watch.

REAL TIME ALERTS
Real time alerts will warn you of any unexpected circumstances. Radarbot has a community of over 50 million drivers worldwide with whom you can share and receive alerts. Find out immediately what is happening on the road and avoid traffic jams, hazards, accidents, mobile speed cameras, police, helicopters, drones, and much more.

SPEED CAMERA UPDATE
Radarbot has the most powerful, up-to-date speed camera database in the world. Our team of experts perform daily updates to ensure that the database always contains the very latest information. Not a single speed camera can escape the prying eyes of Radarbot!

RADARBOT WORLDWIDE
Try our totally "FREE" version for as long as you like. If you want to get the full experience, you can try "Radarbot GOLD" and "Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" with integrated GPS navigation, unique advantages and, of course, no advertising.

GPS NAVIGATION AND SPEED LIMITS
Discover the power of Radarbot. The GOLD version offers everything you need on the road in a single app: GPS navigation, speed cameras and speed limits. Even if you don't have an internet connection, you will still arrive safe and sound at your destination. Get speed camera alerts wherever you are in the world without having to worry about using up your mobile data.

Where would you like to go?

* FEATURES:
- Offline navigation and 3D maps.
- Possibility of choosing a route with fewer speed cameras.
- Road speed limits.
- Alerts for school areas and associated speed cameras.
- Radarbot co-pilot. Put your seat belt on!

ARE YOU A PROFESSIONAL DRIVER?
"Radarbot GOLD RoadPro" includes everything a professional driver could need:

- Routes with special restrictions for lorries and commercial vehicles.
- Speed limits and specific speed cameras for lorries.
- Distance alerts adapted to heavy vehicles.

If you have any doubts or queries, we would be more than happy for you to get in touch with us at radarbot@iteration-mobile.com or by using the customer support option inside the app.

Download Radarbot now and become a member of the "Enjoy driving!" movement.

* Continuous use of GPS in the background can drastically reduce battery life.
releaseNotes: You asked for it... Now you can see all the radars in your country on the maps, not just the closest ones. Just zoom in on the map to discover them. We've also improved our customer service section, so resolving any queries is now quicker and easier. Lastly, we've spent time fixing bugs and adding aesthetic and functional improvements that you'll discover when you open Radarbot. Enjoy driving!

title: Merge Mansion
description:
Welcome to Hopewell Bay! A crumbling old mansion needs some serious TLC… and there’s also a mystery to solve. Can you get to the bottom of what Grandma is hiding?

Unlock spaces and rooms in the garden and mansion, and uncover clues about the Boulton family’s many secrets. Meet fascinating characters, find new clues and complete tasks to unlock more of the story.

Relax into this cozy merge game and story packed with more twists and turns than Grandma’s knitting.

MATCH & MERGE
Merge matching items to create new ones and complete the tasks. Enjoy the satisfaction of restoring the mansion and let the story unfold.


RESTORE & DESIGN
Restore the mansion and grounds to their former glory, collect themed decorations and customize your cottage and garden.


INVESTIGATE & SOLVE
Uncover secret areas and collect clues to find out what Grandma is hiding. , and how far the roots of these secrets really reach…

EXCITING EVENTS
Play events to score points, claim gorgeous decorations, and win awesome prizes.

Hopewell Bay is the number one destination for a cozy getaway - and it never gets boring! Download Merge Mansion now and start your journey.

——————————

Did you get stuck or run into a problem? Visit our support page in the Merge Mansion app or send us a message at mergemansionsupport@metacoregames.com.
releaseNotes: Small fixes and improvements. Thank you for playing Merge Mansion.

title: Turkish Airlines: Book Flights
description:
Are you ready to discover the World with Turkish Airlines privileges? Our mobile application helping you to experience the best travel experience speeds you up by remembering your selections and flights. You can use our application to benefit from features making your life easier such as reservation, ticketing and check-in.


USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN

• Either a vacations or a business trip, it now a lot easier to plan your travel! Our mobile application remembers your selections, likes and flights and makes recommendations exclusive to you.

•  We have created a new design focused on the ideal user experience. Now, you can easily make your travel plan, ticketing and Miles transactions. 

• Thanks to our easy to use application, you will buy tickets, arrange your reservations and view your registered flights a lot faster.


BRAND NEW DISCOVERIES

• Get ready to discover the world with the  airline operating between the most points of the world.  By viewing the special offers, you can fly with advantageous prices.

• By viewing the city guides, you will get to know about our recommendations that will color your travel. You prepare for an enjoyable travel by checking out the places to visit, the tastes to savor, airport transfer information and more for the cities you will visit.


RESERVATION METHOD

• You can make your reservation later by saving your flight. You can finish the payment whenever you want on all of your devices.

• From My Reservations section, you can add a new flight, you can change or cancel your flight and add infants to your flight.


FAST AND SECURE PAYMENT

• Among various payment methods and currencies available on our mobile application, you can select the most convenient ones and make payments easily.

• You can buy tickets a lot faster by saving your credit card or scanning your card with the camera at the payment stage.

• You can always feel safe by hiding your credit card and profile information.


MILES&SMILES PRIVILEGES

• We have developed a personalized Miles&Smiles experience exclusive to our mobile application. You can enter to your account with your finger print.

• You can get an award ticket or shop on Shop&Miles by using your Miles.
 
• Now, Miles transactions are much more extensive! Transactions like buying Miles and transferring Miles can be carried out on our mobile application.


ADDITIONAL SERVICES

• You can make reservations from any hotel you like and save time by renting your car before your travel with special prices or using your Miles. 

• If you wish, you can buy a travel insurance to take precautions against unexpected events during your travel. 

• In order to maximize your comfort, you can fly in the seat you wish by selecting your seat.


DETAILS MAKING YOUR TRAVEL BETTER

• It is now a lot easier to buy tickets for your travels including multiple flights. Just click on the multi-city selection.

• You can follow the status of any flight you wish by using flight status feature. 

• Before your travel, you can view the location of counters, cafes, restaurants, pharmacies and more on the maps with the uploaded airport maps.
releaseNotes:
We fixed some errors that we detected in our application and that we thought upset you.
Thank you for using the Turkish Airlines mobile application, see you in the sky!

title: MAPS.ME: Offline Maps, GPS Nav
description:
Fast, detailed and entirely offline maps with turn-by-turn navigation – trusted by over 140 million travelers worldwide.

OFFLINE MAPS
Save mobile data; no internet is required.

NAVIGATION
Use driving, walking and cycle navigation anywhere in the world.

TRAVEL GUIDES
Save you time planning the trip and never miss an interesting place with our ready-made travel guides. We've partnered with the best travel content creators to build travel guide catalog for hunderds of destinations around the world. Whether you prefer city travel, car trips or outdoor activities you will find a great choice of guides for a perfect journey.

INCREDIBLY DETAILED
Directions to points of interest (POIs), hiking trails and places missing from other maps.

UP-TO-DATE
Maps are updated by millions of OpenStreetMap contributors daily. OSM is an open-source alternative to Google Maps and Apple Maps.

FAST AND RELIABLE
Offline search, GPS navigation along with optimized maps to effectively save memory space.

BOOKMARKS
Save locations you love and share them with your friends.

AVAILABLE WORLDWIDE
Essential for home and travel.

MAPS.ME is free to download and use. 

AND MORE!
– Search through different categories, e.g. restaurants, cafes, tourist attractions, hotels, ATMs and public transport (metro, bus, etc).
– Make hotel bookings via Booking.com directly from the app.
– Share your location via text message or social media.
– When cycling or walking, the app shows whether the way is uphill or downhill.

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
If you have any questions, visit our Help Center: support.maps.me.
If you are unable to find the answer to your question, contact us at: ios@maps.me.
Follow us on FB: http://www.facebook.com/mapswithme | Twitter: @MAPS_ME

Privacy Policy: https://maps.me/policy/
Terms of Use: https://maps.me/terms/
releaseNotes:
This new version brings:

- The new Hub section features the best offers and discounts for travelers
- Up-to-date  traffic alerts on road events
- Brand new Bookmarks section design
- Brand new Search section design
- Updated Object card design with the ability to add your review
- Travel guides with the best routes around the world

title: Campu.eu
description:
Campu.eu - wild camping. With the consent of property owners. Over 1,300 properties on offer.

Escape!
From people. From the city. From work. From the stereotype. From the noise. From crowded campsites. Into nature. Into solitude. Into the silence. Into the countryside. Somewhere away.  



Find your place on the map. Search easily according to your preferences - alone, with amenities (toilet, water, electricity), with a view, with the possibility of fishing, in the middle of vineyards, property with playgrounds for children, properties suitable for dogs....



Book - reserve a place of your choice, even if it's just for you, only 5 minutes before check-in.



Enjoy! Go wild camping, with Campu.eu you don't have to worry about having to leave in the middle of the night.

title: British Airways
description:
To Fly. To Serve.

The British Airways app makes booking, boarding and accessing everything about your flights easier than ever before. Personalised to you, the app gives you instant access to the information you need, when you need it.

Features:

- Personalised home screen
Your home screen is your personal gateway into the BA app. Themed around your next destination, it will give you easy access to important information surrounding your flight, including your mobile boarding pass.

You will also have quick access to flights you track, your most recent search and our best return fares to our most popular destinations.

- Book flights
Booking a flight with British Airways has never been easier. Browse our cheapest fares or quickly access your recent flight searches made from any device, and book a flight from over 130 countries.

- Manage your flights
Access and purchase upgrade offers from your phone, book seats in advance, add flights to your calendar or send them via email and get up-to-date arrival and departure times for all of your flights. Additionally, lounge users can access the British Airways Lounge Wi-Fi password.

- Apple Watch
The British Airways app on Apple Watch provides easy access to the most important flight information while you’re on the move. You can quickly view the flight number, route, departure time, flight status, a countdown to the departure time and the weather at your destination.

- Flight status and schedules
Search and track all British Airways flights for the latest arrival and departure times.

- Exclusive features for Executive Club Members
If you’re an Executive Club Member, you can check your Avios and Tier Points as well as view your full transaction history on your device. Optional enhanced services available for our Executive Club customers travelling with baggage to check in at the airport. Anyone can join the Executive Club for free on ba.com


- Siri Shortcuts
Add Siri Shortcuts to quickly check your next flight and Avios points

Please refer to the 'Application Licence Agreement', linked on this page, to view the terms of use of this application and use of mobile boarding passes. By downloading the BA application, you agree to the terms of the Application Licence Agreement.
British Airways Plc Web Site British Airways Support Application Licence Agreement.
releaseNotes: We’re always working behind the scenes to make improvements to your experience. Our tweaks improve the British Airways app by making it faster, safer and easier to navigate.

title: LoungeKey
description:
Download the LoungeKey™ app today - the must-have travel companion for LoungeKey cardholders.
 
Register your account in the app with your payment card details to access a global network of airport lounges and experiences, including dining, spa and sleep pods in over 700 airports worldwide.
 
•Enjoy contactless entry with your Digital Card
 
•Stay up to date, check your current visit entitlement and history
 
•Search for lounges and experiences, and save your favourites
 
•Unlock more with access to additional Travel Services and benefits that elevate your travel journey
 
Enhance your airport experience with the LoungeKey app.
releaseNotes:
We regularly update the app to make it faster, safer and more engaging for you.
  
Here are a couple of the enhancements you'll find in this latest release:
  
 - Feature enhancements and bug fixes
reviews:
Nice app, but it is annoying, that if you have multiple cards with loungekey access, it is necessary to create multiple profiles to track lounge visits, which is annoying. It would be great to have single profile that would support multiple cards. | LoungeKey as a service is very good but the app deserves better care. Dark mode support si still missing and Apple Wallet support would be handy. | I cannot login. This app is total disaster! | After my bank replaced Mastercard with Visa I'm not able to activate new card. | Does not work properly | The app works as it should, however there are some features missing. It would be great to be able to save the LoungeKey card into Apple Wallet. Also I am missing the option to tie multiple cards (from different banks, to stack the free lounge passes) to the account. Could these be considered as new features? | The team who designed this should be sent to 12h Ryanair flight as punishment | A terrible log in system requires the one to create a new account when a new version is available, only to fail the account creation due to having the applicable card already registered with an account. This is after having been happy to have the app work for a few months after the very tedious and error ridden registration process mentioned by others. | Still no support for more cards from multiple providers 😟 Also no info on remaining free visits on the card. | Nejde změnit jazyk aplikace z Ukrajinstiny na cokoliv | Mají vnitřní preference pro vyšší třídu dle letenky a ve frekventovanem období se do salónku nelze dostat, upřednostňují bez ohledu na kartu Lounge key | Klientum ceske sporitelny nejde vymenit proslou kartu v systemu a nikdo nemi poradit. | Unable to register | They can’t show you just, if is or isn’t the longe where you want to go. You have to register, but if you want to register, you can’t put your country, because it doesn’t work. :/ | Worst login experience ever. After used my credentials it act like logged in, but they've forced me to create new account on top of it, but I was not able to use my original login name. I had to write card number three times and it took about half an hour to be able to use the app again. 
BTW if you have more key lounge supported payment cards, it's not possible to have more than one car per account  🤦‍♂️ | Nobody takes over accountability, when the the admission to the lounge is not granted due to “system” issues. | Asking myself for what purpose is this app made. It’s not helpful for me as Lounge Key services at all.
Plus, permanently refusing to verify my card…always responding “Oops! Something went wrong. Please again later.”

It’s very boring 😬 | Setting this up is really painful. They ask you for the same information multiple times, throw a bunch of marketing consents at you, bother you with filling your credit card number, that you used to register, again after log in. Give me a break. | it is not possible to verify my word elite mastercard.  application keeps losing connection, requires already entered data.  card registration requires all card authentication attributes, I'm concerned about security.  this does not seem like a premium service | I cannot verify my MC World Elite either in the app or on the website. I fill all the information and after I press Verify the response is: Your card number details are required. | I can not verify my credit card so the app is totally useless. Even if I try to verify my card on websites same error occurs. Useless service. I fill all card information and app response that they are not filled? WTF? | Totally useless app, support doesn't work at all. Even your own bank can't help you with this as it is a 3rd party app. As long as you have a credit card benefit. | Unable to authorize card | Hello 
I am trying to register my new card ( as old one is expiring ) but while registering I cannot find Czech Republic in country list . Actually there are like only around 25 countries in the list while you are registering your card . Can you fix the this asap . I dropped an email as well

Thanks | The app shows me some problem and tell me to try it later everytime I’m trying to registrate… | What is this app for, if I can’t see the remaining count of my free longe visits? That’s the only feature why I would use this app, and it’s missing. | App not working on my iPhone 12 Pro. Fields for username and password are locked (tapping on them does nothing), so I cannot enter my credentials.

title: Busuu: Language Learning
description:
Busuu helps you communicate with confidence from day one. Combine expertly designed language lessons with feedback and tips from our global community of native speakers and harness the power of learning together. 

Looking for the best way to learn a new language on your phone? You’ve just discovered it, with Busuu, a Chegg service – we’re the app that makes learning new languages easier, more fun and more effective for all.

Whether you’re learning to get confident having new conversations, for a higher grade, a career boost, or for mind-blowing travel experiences, Busuu’s got your back.

We’re already helping millions of people overcome their learning struggles, from lack of time and motivation to problems with grammar and vocab. We help our learners achieve their goals, one milestone at a time – and we want to do the same for you.

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW FOR FREE LANGUAGE LEARNING

================

How are we doing this? We’re glad you asked. Whether you’re learning on your iPad or iPhone, Busuu helps you…

– Learn up to 14 languages
That’s right, 14! We’ve got complete courses in English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Portuguese (Brazilian), Polish, Russian, Arabic, Dutch or Turkish with Busuu. 

– Master languages with real people
You want to learn the relevant language, right? You’re in luck: we’ll connect you with our community of native speakers so you can get localised language knowledge and support. Feel even better when you help other learners in return.

– Learn from the experts
Busuu’s online courses are created by our ingenious language experts. Learn step-by-step with bite-sized lessons, plenty of practise and lots of opportunities to test your progress.

– Say hello to useful language skills
Learn the language that will really take you places! With regularly updated content, video flashcards featuring real people and useful cultural tips, you’ll be fully immersed in no time. 

– Kiss goodbye to stressful timetabling
We’re serious. We organise your learning time for you with a personalised Study Plan. Simply tell us when you want to study and for how long, and we’ll send you notifications to keep you on track.

– Revise with ease
There’ll be no forgetting on our watch. Smart Review cleverly saves all the grammar and vocab you learn in lessons and stores them in one handy place, so you can make those tricky words and rules stick.

– Show off achievements with official certificates
With our Busuu language certificates, you’ll have actual proof of your language capabilities.

– Access specialised courses for language lovers
You’ve learned the basics, and now you’re hungry for more. Learn about manga, advance your pronunciation or add travel-specific phrases to your skillset, plus much more. 

================

DON’T JUST TAKE OUR WORD FOR IT.
See what others have to say about Busuu:

● EDITOR RATING: EXCELLENT - PC MAG
● Named 'Best Buy' language learning app by the Independent in 2021
● Language Learning App of the Year at the EdTech Breakthrough Awards 2020 


================

PLEASE NOTE
A lot of the features are free, but you will need a subscription in order to get access to all features of this app. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current payment period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged at the same price for renewal within the 24-hour period prior to the end of the current payment period unless you change your subscription preferences in your Account Settings.
You can manage your subscriptions through your Account Settings after purchase.
Privacy policy: https://www.busuu.com/en/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://www.busuu.com/en/terms/
releaseNotes: Improved learning experience. New content. Bug fixes. Our experts have been working hard to make learning languages with Busuu easy and effective.
reviews:

There is a disadvantage that the app is a bit slow. Otherwise I like it, especially the listening parts. | Best app for Korean and French lesson | Good for training and learning English | <3 | . | I'm learning Spanish and French. It's very good٫ but there is too many ads before lessons. The Bussu premium pass cost lot of money٫ so I don't want it. I think I understand people ho speak Soanish or French٫ so I think this app is good. | I like it a lot | Great app, for learning languages the best I’ve ever had. | It’s really helpful | I find it very useful as it explains everything perfectly. We absolutely love how all vocab is super high yield and natives correct your work! We have been getting premium version for 2 years now (and almost done with B2) and I can say, it’s worth every penny!!!! | Really | Naučím se s ní mnohem více gramatiky než ve škole a ještě mě to baví ;) | Great app for learning languages. | I am learning Japanese and German and its helping a lot :) | Skvělá app | It is great app | Very popular application, but there is no Ukrainian language. | Your enero can be corrected by natives and you can correct others in your mother tongue as well. I really love this community, you feel welcomed and it encourages you to keep going 💪🏼. 

PS: I have the free version and I would love to pay for more features | Die beste App, die hab ich gefunden. Es geht um die einzige App, wo kann ich direkt ins Niveau C1 springen und muss nicht mit dem Lernen  der Grundlagen wieder Zeit verlieren.   Und was kann ich empfehlen? Man soll die neue Wörter notieren und dann wiederholen, um die beste Ergebnisse zu erreichen. 

Best app for language learning, especially for intermediate or even C1 students. Thank you,  really great job! ❤️ | Wortho od that money! | I find it really useful. It is easy to practice every day by yourself through quizzes and you can also get in touch with teachers for private lessons. Those I haven’t tried yet but I’m planning to. | iPhone app have lot of bugs, and after 6 moths no big change or update. I can’t help
Others with correction. Setting study's plan doesn’t work as well. Some lessons are boring, meaning topic of lesson. From my point of view whole system of revision must be smarter and more focused for continuous learning key elements of English. Honestly the concept in general is good, but needs improvement to be best. If this improvement won’t come, I probably will not buy subscription next time any more. BR Jan | If you don’t mind paying subscription, this is much better option than Duolingo. I don’t feel tricked into learning by cheap addictive tricks. Just set my study plan, but learn at my own pace. title: Vueling Airlines-Cheap Flights
description:
Over 120 destinations await you on the Vueling app. Book cheap flights, choose the fare that best suits your trip and customise it with the most exclusive services.

BOOK YOUR FLIGHTS

Choose your destination and book flights at the best prices on your mobile app quickly and easily. Choose the fare that you prefer and book using your favourite payment method.

ONLINE CHECK-IN AND BOARDING PASSES

Check in online and forget about queueing at the airport. Download your boarding pass on your device, carry it with you at all times and check it whenever you want, even offline. We make your trip even more comfortable.

VUELING CLUB

Sign up for Vueling Club and collect Avios every time you book. The more Avios you collect, the more you'll save on your flights! And if you ever forget to collect Avios when you book, you can retrieve them on the app.

FLIGHT STATUS

Check the scheduled times, terminal and boarding gate for your next flight. All the information on arrivals, departures and possible incidents, just a click away.

MY BOOKINGS

Manage all your bookings easily. Add bags, choose your seat on the plane, change your flight, bring your flight forward... Everything you need at your fingertips.

FLEX PACK

Book our Flex Pack and enjoy more flexibility for your booking. If your plans change or something unexpected comes up, you can always choose the best solution for your trip: get the amount back as Flight Credit or change your flight at no extra cost.

Have we missed anything? Let us have your feedback and suggestions and help us improve so we can continue offering you new services and enhance your experience via the Vueling app.
releaseNotes: We are constantly testing our app to correct any possible errors and to optimise its performance. We hope you like the new version of the Vueling app. Thank you for your comments – they really help us to improve!
reviews:

title: BeeSpeaker Learn English
description:
BzZzZz! Join our hive and start communicating smoothly in foreign languages. It has never been easier to learn English!

BeeSpeaker is a true revolution and the first-ever app totally devoted to learning to speak English. It’s a voice-controlled tool, based on modern machine learning technology, which offers much more than just one-sided learning - the interface recognizes the words and sentences pronounced by you and checks your progress when you learn English. This way, you know how you're doing and what you need to improve.

Are you bored with English flashcards or another English conversation app? Are you feeling stuck when you practice English? Well, you're in the right place! BeeSpeaker is the perfect fit for you.

Thanks to BeeSpeaker, the obstacles and excuses that have stood in your way of learning English no longer exist! Our app features short and quick English lessons that you can do at your own pace, anytime, anywhere. We put emphasis on learning to speak English as we believe it is a key skill that is useful in every aspect of life.
Why should you take advantage of our digital native speaker - English teacher?

Because it’s the first step to bringing down your speaking barrier which often hampers learning English! Do your lessons (available categories: vocabulary, useful phrases, grammar, listening and pronunciation) and short video cards and get the premium version to access all English lessons and master English conversation.

Are you looking to learn to speak English fluently? Our instructors are experienced teachers, native speakers from countries like Great Britain, the United States, and Australia. Thanks to them you will learn different accents and ways of pronouncing particular words. 

During your ‘conversations’, you will quickly gain self-confidence and get rid of your blockages in speaking.

We focus on a natural method of learning English, which is a novelty in mobile apps. Instead of swotting up on English words, grammar rules, or reading flashcards, you learn by listening and repeating in English. And if you make a mistake - BeeSpeaker will let you know that you need to try again. It's an extremely interesting, fun and effective method for you to learn English, which eliminates stress and allows you to focus on what is most important - talking freely in a foreign language. The teachers in our app always speak English, thanks to which you start to break it up and just speak! 

Become part of the BeeSpeaker revolution. Start learning English today and you'll soon realize that speaking foreign languages is easy. English is really simple! Try it out today by downloading your digital native speaker!

Terms of Use : https://beespeaker.com/terms/

Privacy policy : https://beespeaker.com/privacy-policy/
releaseNotes:
Update the app and see what new waits for you:
- New course view - use the refreshed course view, which even better organizes the material and supports learning!
- Improved microphone mechanism - now you can activate it manually if you wish. Check "Options" during your lesson!
- Bug fixes - we are continuously working on improving the performance of BeeSpeaker.
- Dictionary - all words and phrases from lessons in one, easily accessible, place.
reviews:
Hezká appka, bez PRO verze nepoužitelná. Občas jsou cvičení zmatečná a nechytají vše co říkám, nebo generují chybějící slova. | excellent - excited from the first moment | Mrzí mě věcně problémy s přihlášením. Mám zaplaceno PRO, ale pravidelně mi nejdou otevřít všechny kurzy, protože si prý mám koupit PRO. Ja ho ale mám 🤷‍♂️ | Snažím se, ale v aplikaci jsem nikam nedošla. Nefunguje. Stále se něco načítá nelze se posouvat při opakování. Za mě neintuitivní aplikace, kterou nevyužiji i když bych ráda za ty peníze.
Stále nefunguje …. Funguje pouze další kupování verze “PRO”. Nefunguje mikrofon celý týden, ten mám v nastavení samozřejmě zapnutý. Opakuje se vše stále dokola. Jen se moták v kruhu. (Opravdu chcete lekci ukončit? Ano….)
