title: Qatar Airways
description:
Award-winning journeys, at your fingertips.

Book flights, manage your booking, check in and take full control of your journey with the Qatar Airways mobile app.



1. BOOK FLIGHTS

With the tap of a finger, find and book flights to enchanting destinations around the world. If you are undecided, you can hold your booking along with the guaranteed fare for up to 72 hours, for a minimum fee. Booking flights through our mobile app also streamlines the process, allowing you to enter your travel details by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport.



2. COMPLEMENT YOUR JOURNEY 

Enhance your journey with an array of additional services. Through our mobile app, you can purchase extra baggage as well as book lounge access, meet and greet services, hotel stays and car rental. 

3. MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Manage your booking conveniently through our mobile app, by adding your booking to “My Trips”. Once added, the app will help you keep track of every step throughout your journey. “My Trips” also allows you to seamlessly change your seat and meal preferences, modify your flight details and much more.



4. CHECK IN

Check in through our mobile app by simply pointing your mobile phone camera at your passport. Choose your seat, view/save your boarding pass and use the fast-bag-drop counters at the airport to check in your bags.



5. GET FLIGHT STATUS NOTIFICATIONS

Through our mobile app, you can request arrival and departure information on all Qatar Airways flights, and receive updated information on the status of your flight directly on your mobile phone, via SMS.



6. FIND EXCLUSIVE OFFERS

Through our mobile app, you can check our special fares for flying to the destinations you have longed to visit. You will always find the same fare available on the website at the time of search (and sometimes, you may even find reduced fares when booking through our mobile app).




7. MAKE THE MOST OF PRIVILEGE CLUB

Through our mobile app, Privilege Club members can easily view account details on their dashboard, use the My Calculator to check Avios and Qpoints that can be earned on flights, claim missing Avios on past flights, communicate with the Privilege Club member service centre, and much more.
releaseNotes:
To keep you updated along every step of your journey, our latest app enhancements include alerts for changes related to fares, special offers, meals and more.
 
You’ll also notice your e-ticket number has been added to ‘My Trips’, making it easier to claim Avios, as well as retrieve trips for passengers in the same booking.
 
We love hearing what you think about our mobile app. Email us at mobilepod@qatarairways.com.qa

title: Clime: Weather Radar Live
description:
Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!
 
STAY INFORMED:
- Radar overlay shows the areas of rain, snow & mixed precipitation in high resolution and vivid colors right on the interactive map;
- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours; 
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover;
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.

KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need; 
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location.

VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast;
- Current, today’s min & max and "Feels Like" temperature;
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info;
- Chance of Precipitation;
- Sunrise & sunset time.

Coverage Info:
Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps; wind map; snow depth forecast; hurricane, wildfire, lightning trackers; detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.
Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

Get Clime Premium:
- Severe weather alerts for all saved locations
- Hurricane tracker
- Advanced precipitation forecast
- Lightning tracker
- Temperature map
- Rain alerts
- Air quality index
- Wildfire tracking
- RainScope
- Hourly forecast
- 14-day forecast
- Animated wind map
- Snow depth forecast 
- No ads 

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose. 
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.

Privacy Policy: https://climeradar.com/privacyPolicy 
Terms: https://climeradar.com/terms

title: AccuWeather Weather Forecast
description:
AccuWeather’s trusted free weather forecast app is at your fingertips

Internationally recognized by the World Meteorological Organization with awards making AccuWeather one of the best weather apps:
“Best User Interface and Data Representation”
“Best Weather Warnings”
“Best Design and Presentation of Information, User-Friendliness; Access and Customization” 


Weather Forecasts You Can Depend On

-  Live weather forecasts - including MinuteCast® forecasts for Minute by Minute® precipitation updates
-  Local weather - including severe weather alerts, temperature, precipitation, and allergy outlooks for your day 
-  WinterCast™: winter weather forecasts - giving you advanced warnings of snowfall probabilities and accumulation
-  Daily forecasts - include rain probability, cloud coverage, wind, live radar, air quality index, snowfall, and even UV index
-  Advanced weather radar - gives you up to the minute views of storm tracking, snow, rain, ice, temperature changes, and much more
-  RealFeel® & RealFeel Shade Temperature™ technology - helping you get a better sense of how the weather actually feels

Live weather with Weather Alerts

The AccuWeather forecasting and severe weather alerts you know and trust. From local weather updates to WinterCast snow alerts, get the weather forecast you can rely on. With in-depth weather news, forecast updates, free weather alerts, plus today’s forecast and much more. Find out what makes AccuWeather the best as a trusted, free weather app. It’s the weather tracker you need!

Advanced Weather Radar
Setting the standard for free weather radar:
-  The accurate weather radar you know from AccuWeather
-  Weather watches and warnings for your local area
-  RealVue™ and Enhanced RealVue™ satellite imagery looking at weather patterns from space
-  Weather radar views for water vapor, rainfall, sustained winds, and even storm surges
-  Timely tropical storm radar tracking to see where and when storms might hit
-  Current conditions maps shows temperature and RealFeel in and around your area
-  5-day precipitation outlook to see what rain, snow, and ice could be in your area
-  24-hour snowfall forecast shows detailed maps with snow accumulation and winter weather
-  Temperature contour maps show how the temperature will change over the next day


For over 10 years, the AccuWeather app has brought you the weather


This free weather app can show you snow, wind, cold, rain and more! Stay prepared with our local weather and live forecasts. From extreme humidity, severe storms, allergy info, air quality index, snow storms, and ice alerts, get live updates that matter to you. Local weather forecasts are the AccuWeather specialty. 


Our weather tracker & live radar gives you Superior Accuracy™


Severe weather warnings, today’s temperature, free weather radar maps & more!

-  Get local forecasts and personalize the app depending on where you are in the world
-  Go beyond today’s weather and look 45 days ahead to ensure that you’re prepared for any weather
-  Try the MinuteCast feature for the most up to date live Minute by Minute weather forecast
-  Weather alerts, storm alerts, and more! Get trending videos from AccuWeather’s dedicated news team
-  Weather forecasting your way - a weather tracker that can filter and customize according to your preferences


Download the AccuWeather app today for free and enjoy award-winning Superior Accuracy in weather forecasting on your iPhone, Apple Watch, or other Apple device. More than just a daily forecast, try the best weather app and get more from your forecast.

title: Norwegian Travel Assistant
description:
Manage your trip with Norwegian on the move! Book flights, add Fast Track and other extras, keep track of your travel plans and get important updates about your trip – everything in one handy app.



* You’ll have all your travel documents in one easy-to-access spot – both tickets and boarding passes are stored in one handy travel folder
* Book flights directly from the travel assistant
* Add and keep track of trips that haven’t been booked with your profile
* Check in on the go – convenient and quick
* Add Fast Track and skip the queues through security – handy when you’re running late or when you just feel like spending your time on other things than standing in line
* Travelling with more bags than expected? The travel assistant lets you add extra checked bags easily
* Add seat reservations to your flights and make sure you get your favourite seat
* Get push notifications with up-to-the-minute info about your flights
* Automatic login for faster access to your information and for booking flights
* Travel archive with your previous flights
* Check if flights are on time with our flight status overview 
* Offline access – your travel information’s always there when you need it
* Passbook support for your boarding passes when you’ve checked in online



Help us improve the app!
Got tips or suggestions on what we should improve or include in the travel assistant app? We’d be glad to hear from you. Contact us at travelassistant@norwegian.com
releaseNotes: - This update includes various stability enhancements and bug fixes.

title: Zelená karta
description:
Nechat se zastavit policií může být stresující. V ten moment nechcete obtížně hledat zelenou kartu v přihrádkách, nebo ještě hůř, dostat pokutu za to, že nejste schopní předložit doklad o pojištění. Řešením je mít k dispozici důkaz o povinném ručení přímo v telefonu. V Čechách je nyní možné při silniční kontrole předložit zelenou kartu v elektronické podobě na displeji mobilního telefonu.

Jak na to?
- Jednoduše v aplikaci vyfoťte zelenou kartu od svého vozu,
- zadejte datum její expirace,
- trefně ji pojmenujte, ať se v tom vyznáte.

Aplikace Zelená karta vám dá vědět, až se bude datum expirace blížit a připomene vám nahrát si novou. 

Řídíte více vozů? Není problém! Nahrajte si zelené karty od každého z nich a mějte je vždy po ruce.

Tak šťastnou cestu! :)
releaseNotes:
- Průvodce nehodou: Teď můžete snadno zaznamenat informace o dopravní nehodě přímo prostřednictvím naší aplikace. Stačí pár jednoduchých kroků a budete mít všechny potřebné informace na jednom místě.
- Fotografická dokumentace: K nové funkci průvodce nehodou jsme přidali možnost fotografování škod. Už nemusíte složitě popisovat škodu, stačí pár kliknutí a fotografie bude součástí vašeho záznamu.
- Odesílání reportů přímo na email účastníků: Po zaznamenání a zdokumentování nehody můžete rychle a snadno odeslat kompletní report všem relevantním stranám. Stačí vyplnit emailové adresy a report je na cestě.

title: KLM - Book a flight
description:
Your journey with us starts when you open the KLM app.



With this pocket-sized travel assistant, you can book a ticket, customise your booking, check in and get real-time flight updates. Everything required for a smooth trip is at your fingertips!



BOOK A FLIGHT 
Select one of our many destinations and book your ticket. To save time on future bookings, add your contact information to your profile. Next time, we’ll pre-fill your details. 



MANAGE YOUR TRIP
View the pre-travel checklist and adjust your booking at any time until check-in. Lounge access or extra legroom? Enhance your travel experience yourself with just a few taps.


GET YOUR BOARDING PASS 
Travel with peace of mind – no need to print out your travel documents or wait in line at a check-in desk. Get your boarding pass directly in the app or add it to your Wallet. It’s so easy!



YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT
Check your Miles balance, book a reward ticket, modify your profile, or access your digital Flying Blue card in your personal dashboard.



STAY UP TO DATE
Turn on your notifications for real-time updates like gate changes and check-in times, and receive exclusive offers. Share your flight status to stay in touch with those on the ground. They’ll be happy to know you landed safely and sound.
releaseNotes:
Do you have an upcoming flight? Add it to "My trips" and enjoy your refreshed trip details feature. 

This update also includes some bug fixes and performance improvements. If you run into any trouble, please take a minute to let us know your feedback.
 
Thanks for using the KLM app!

title: Mytrip.com
description:
Welcome to the Mytrip app!

Our app puts the world in the palm of your hand. Fast, simple, safe and secure–instantly access your booking details and experience real-time updates and notifications so you never miss a flight again. Easily update your booking with baggage and other services from our pre-travel store. Get access to exclusive offers like early check-in for free (a $15 value), plus save up to 70% on flights, hotels rental cars and so much more!

What are you waiting for? Download now and let’s get traveling!  

FREE EARLY CHECK-IN
- Exclusively for our app users, passengers can now check-in for their flight, months in advance – for free! Let us do the hard work for you and we’ll send your boarding pass directly to your mobile device. 

BOOKING INFO AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Multiple bookings? No problem! All your bookings in one place–no need to head to the airline’s website or download their apps
- Easily access your booking info. From your reservation details, boarding passes the app has everything you need. Plus you’ll receive real-time notifications on gate or schedule changes in real-time, so you’ll never miss a flight again

BOOK FLIGHTS TO ANY DESTINATION, WORLDWIDE:
- Search and compare more than 650 airlines, big and small, to find the best deal there is.
- Flexible booking options – we get it, changes happen! Choose our Flexible Ticket option and change your flight when you need to.

AVAILABLE FOR A WIDE SELECTION OF BRANDS
- Get your booking info for many popular booking platforms including Gotogate, Supersaver, Supersavertravel, Flybillet, Travelstart, Travelfinder, Goleif, Travelpartner, Seat24, Flygvaruhuset, Avion, Budjet, Trip, Mytrip, Pamediakopes, Airtickets24, Flight Network and FlyFar.

ADD SERVICES ON THE FLY
- Already booked? Travel just the way you want by adding baggage, choosing your seat and more from our pre-travel store. 

PAY YOUR WAY
- Choose from a number of payment options available throughout the world.

FIND AND MAKE RESERVATIONS AT GREAT HOTELS
- The best places, the best prices – with more than 300,000 hotels to choose from, there’s something for everyone.

CHEAP CAR RENTAL ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
- Search and find great deals on rental cars. Take the scenic route and explore your destination at your leisure.
releaseNotes:
* Show refund status for cancelled orders
* Lost baggage service is now available for purchase
* Minor fixes and improvements

title: SAP Concur
description:
If you use Concur® Travel, Concur® Expense or Concur® Invoice at work, then download this companion app to your iPhone or iPad to manage your travel and expenses when you’re on the go! 

With the SAP® Concur® mobile app, you can:
• Review and approve expense claims, invoices and travel requests
• Snap a photo of your receipt and instantly add it to your expense claim
• Book a flight or train ticket, reserve hotel rooms or rent a car 
• Update or add new attendees to meeting invites
• Get hotel suggestions based on your preferences
• Capture and track mileage automatically
• Integrate your itinerary with TripIt to get real-time travel alerts and updates

*This is a companion mobile app for existing users of SAP Concur solutions.*
releaseNotes:
REMOVALS
• End of support for iOS 15.

title: Flighty – Live Flight Tracker
description:
"Truly phenomenal" NYTimes • iPhone App of The Year 2023 Finalist • Apple Design Award 2023 • Made for passengers first

LIMITED TIME: Pro is free on your 1st flight. No credit card. No trial.

▶ INDUSTRY-FIRST FEATURES
- 25-hour where's my plane
- private friends/family following
- pilot-grade FAA integration (direct data feed)
- delay forecast
- taxi times
- ground radar
- proximity radar

▶ FULLY AUTOMATED
- calendar sync
- TripIt sync
- email forwarding
- Flighty Friends: private sharing with friends

▶ PILOT-GRADE DATA
- live-streaming
- actual flight plans
- commercial data – same source used by your pilot
- FAA advisories, warnings, and delays
- your tail number with birthday and type
- pilot flight timetable
- proximity radar - see flights around you
- ground radar - radar even while taxiing

▶ PREDICT DELAYS
- Alerts for late or canceled inbound aircraft
- Alerts for airport weather or traffic
- Delay forecast

▶ ASSISTANTS
- Morning-Of Assistant - wake up informed
- Check In Assistant - your reservation number and check in link at the right time
- Connection Assistant - make tight connections a breeze

▶ WORLDWIDE + LIVE + UNLIMITED
- every airline
- every flight
- 24/7/365 live global coverage

▶ FLIGHTY FRIENDS
- Often sharing with Family and Friends? Invite them to see your flights and never manually share again!
- Picking someone up, excited for a friend to visit, meeting a colleague? Share your live flight status with one tap.

▶ WHATS FREE?
- no ads
- unlimited flights
- Flighty Friends
- live data
- weather
- actual flight route
- aircraft model and image
- personal flight log and map
- personal all-time and annual stats
- Apple Watch app
- iCloud backup & sync
- historical flight lookup limited to past 365 days (due to costs)
- lock screen widgets (limited refresh for costs)

▶ WHATS PRO?
- industry's fastest push alerts
- 25-hour where's my plane
- live inbound plane tracking
- live lock screen widgets
- pilot-grade FAA delay alerts
- unlimited past flight lookup
- delay predictions
- arrival forecast
- TripIt sync
- calendar sync
- email forwarding
- Apple Watch complications
- tail number
- taxi times
- and more

Pro is included on your first flight. No trial required.

developer: Global Flight, Airport, & Airline Status Tracker LLC
reviews:
Great app but I have two issues:

- flights from PRG show wrong terminal and usually no gate, 
- some of my previous flights cannot be added because they are apparently missing in your database - this is really frustrating and you should add an option to add those flights manually. 

Please fix these issues, I love your app! | Looks nice , but even entering historical data you need to pay, nah 🫸🏻❌🤦🏻‍♀️ | I love this app, I originally downloaded it to test it but now that I've added my historical flights and future flights I absolutely adore this app, the app itself is well optimized and generally works well. I recommend to everyone who flies a lot ✈️😁 | The amount they are charging for lifetime license is nothing but robbery. The app itself does not do much anyway, though seeing your flight info on Dynamic Island is an amazing thing. It’s a great idea, hidden behind a huge paywall. | Amazing and intuitive | I liked the app for the first flight with live tracking feature. But when I subscribed to the pro version for y next flight. I didn’t have live tracking nor Apple Watch tracking.
Disappointed. | Even as we were sitting in the plane, the app still didn’t show our gate. After arrival, it didn’t show our luggage belt. Dissapointing. | For the app that is supposed to make flying less stressful it’s too unreliable. 
 1. Live Updates still showing 2 hours until gate departure, meanwhile the same screen shows departure time which is in 5 minutes. On the same screen. 
2. Previous flight has been showing as as departing hours after I landed 
3. One of the flights I had got delayed for hours, app was showing everything running on time 
4. For some flights app had never shown gate assigned 
5. Notification 2 hours before the flight shows temperature in Fahrenheit’s despite my settings (Celsius).

Note: I’m take a lot of flights from Prague, which isn’t a small unknown airport. 
UI and feature set is nice though 👍 | Is this working only in the US? Very unreliable in Europe. It's a shame, App looks great.

title: Leo Express
description:
All tickets in your pocket. And much more.

The Leo Express app lets you easily manage your tickets. In addition, you can find out about any changes on your route. So what are you waiting for? Download and travel for experiences right now!

* TICKETS FULLY UNDER CONTROL
You can make an order fast and easily. You can see all your travels and cancel the tickets without any problems.

* INFORMATION ABOUT YOUR JOURNEY
Is your connection delayed? You will find out immediately with our app.

* TICKETS OVERVIEW
All your tickets together. You have a full overview of when, where and for how much you traveled or will travel.

* INTEGRATED SMILE CLUB
Sign up to the Smile Club and enjoy our app to the fullest. You collect kilometers for every ride for which you will get a discount on next tickets. That makes traveling even more fun!

* BENEFITS OF LEO CREDITS
Recharge your leo credits and pay simply anywhere, anytime. When you cancel your ticket, you will get its full value back in leo credits.

Did we forget about something? Send us your comments and suggestions and help us improve the Leo Express app. Send your ideas via the app or via the email address app@leoexpress.com.

title: European Coffee Trip
description:
Find a good coffee shop in a few clicks! European Coffee Trip is a mobile app built for coffee lovers and baristas living in or visiting Europe.

We manually curate a list of specialty coffee shops around Europe, from big cities to tiny villages, to guide you to excellent cafes nearby! Our database features over 3500 cafes in 39 countries that we handpicked for the best coffee experience.

We build this mobile to make it even easier to drink tasty coffee wherever you are!

-- KEY FEATURES --

- Find a specialty coffee shop nearby
- Find a specialty coffee in any European city
- Search by proximity or navigate through the map
- Filter cafes based on your preferences
- Browse through rich cafe profiles with photo galleries
- Plan your coffee trip in a few clicks

Our database is stored offline, on your phone, so you can browse and navigate even without the Internet. We regularly review and update cafe profiles with new photos, opening hours and offerings. You can quickly check if the cafe is open or not!

-- PICK THE RIGHT CAFE --

- Types of coffee: espresso, filter coffee or cold brew
- Food menu: breakfast or lunch
- Plant-based and vegan alternatives
- Kids or dogs friendly
- Internet access and laptop friendly

Our goal is to make it easy for people to drink delicious coffee. Avoid bad coffee; get the app!
releaseNotes:
Here’s what’s new in this update:

•  Fixed: We've fixed an issue with Google Maps navigation. Earlier, some users encountered wrong or multiple results when trying to navigate to a specific cafe. With this update, Google Maps will lead you directly to your chosen cafe, every time.
•  New Sponsors in 'About Us': Take a peek at the 'About Us' section! We're excited to introduce new sponsors who are joining us on this journey to enrich your coffee exploration.
•  Minor Updates: We’ve made some under-the-hood improvements for keeping the app up to date.
reviews: Do you love really good coffee? Then this app is for you. Not only does is save me in my Czech homeland, but especially when traveling abroad. I found some true coffee gems even in countries where specialty coffee is NOT the norm 🙌☕ | This app really helps me to save time during travels by finding the best coffee spots for me. I can plan my trip before, choose according to location or by the best looking photos. Also, I can send a report if the coffee was bad… | Really, the headline says it all. This really is a best app when it comes to finding and exploring new and fascinating speciality coffee shops. In the past, this app helped me to explore plenty of coffee shops all around Europe. For the past few years I have been living in Prague and to this day I still find this app very useful. So the only thing left to say is that you keep up the good work guys. Thanks. | This app is perfect for anyone that enjoys specialty coffee. I haven’t had a bad experience in any of the places featured🙌 | A great way to find nice coffee shops nearby! | 私はカフェラテが大好きな人で、いつも新しい場所に質が高いカフェを探し難いです｡ このアプリは様々な近くの面白いカフェを現していて、リモートワークのためにところを見つかるのが易しいです｡ | Skvělá, jednoduchá aplikace, která za drobný poplatek přináší hledání kaváren v neznámém prostředí - nahrazuje nepříjemné hledání nových kaváren na mapě v prohlížeči na stránkách european coffee trip. Aplikace je datově malá, přehledná, žádné zbytečné funkce navíc. Dobrá práce, kluci! | It is a really nice app for all specialty coffee lovers. You can easily find a good coffee shop near by U, u can add your favorite ones into the app or plan your (coffee) trip and u will not miss any good cafe 🙂.. awesome idea, now it’s our turn to help improve the app as well, so we gonna have all the great ones there. | Great app that every coffee lover must have 👍 | Great curated map of coffee-loving places. Hopefully, the app will only bloom in the future with new additions to the already large database.

title: Lyft
description:
Count on Lyft to take you where you need to go with safety first. Got an appointment? Need to pick up some groceries? We’ll match you with a driver, help you find the quickest bus route, or show you the nearest scooter — you’ll be on your way in minutes. If it gets you there, it’s on the app.

USING LYFT IS EASY
Choose your destination, find a ride in seconds, and pay directly in the app. It’s that simple.

CHOOSE HOW YOU RIDE
With Lyft, you’ve got options. Choose from a variety of different ways to travel, all available right from your app.* Whether you’re looking for an affordable ride, the most direct route, or a way to treat yourself – we’ve got the mode to suit your needs. 

* Lyft ride types may vary by region. Check the app to see what is available in your city.
—
Prices vary based on market condition.

By downloading the app, you agree to allow Lyft to collect your device's language settings.
releaseNotes: Thanks for using Lyft! We update our app regularly to make your rides even better. Every update of our Lyft app includes improvements in speed and reliability, as well as bug fixes and performance improvements. As new features are released, we’ll highlight those for you in the app.
reviews:
Imran is a great guy! I took Lyft the first time and he was very pleasant and very helpful! Will recommend it to friends!!! | TOMAS91574 | Please, start Lyft in Czech Republic. | Všechno vždy super a je nejlevnějši , jsme radi že je tu lyft a my ho mužem využívat . | Annoying text messages and notifications | Nejsou ridici ani v Praze. 
Plus to na mapach pise Czechia a to mi moc radost nedela. 
EN:
You should recruit some drivers over here. Plus I would welcome using Czech republic instead of Czechia | User friendly app and good service, I use both Lyft and Uber and the quality is absolutely comparable. | This is the worst app ever. There is never a car available. UBER  is 100% better never choose this piece of sh!!! App

title: Splitwise
description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who”. Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUS between friends 
- And so much more
 
Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
We also have powerful features that can handle almost any money sharing situation. Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for smartphones and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that reccur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
“Life Changing! I don’t review many things, but this app has seriously improved my quality of life. It has saved my sanity when it comes to splitting utilities, mortgage, groceries, dog expenses...the list goes on. No more saving receipts, making spreadsheets, and manually calculating each month. So handy for group trips/weekends, too! THANK YOU!!” – Courtney via the App Store

We offer in-app purchases for “Splitwise Pro”, the benefits of which are described below. The subscription amount will be charged to your App Store account and will vary by plan and country. You’ll see the total price before completing your first payment. If you don’t choose to purchase “Splitwise Pro”, you can continue using Splitwise for free.

Premium Subscription Service “Splitwise Pro”:
1. Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
2. OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
3. Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
4. Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
5. Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
6. Search full expense history

“Splitwise Pro” subscriptions purchased in-app renew monthly or yearly depending on your plan. Plan pricing may vary by country. To avoid renewal, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before your subscription ends. You can turn off auto-renew at any time by visiting the App Store.

Terms of Service and Privacy Policy: https://www.splitwise.com/terms
releaseNotes: Various fixes and improvements.

title: Microsoft Translator
description:
Need to communicate with someone who uses a different language? Microsoft Translator is here to help you break through language barriers and connect with people from around the globe.

Microsoft Translator allows you  to translate text, speech, images, and group conversations in over 100 languages - for free. Whether you’re traveling and need help understanding a menu or navigating unfamiliar streets, or you’re trying to communicate with a colleague at work or school, Microsoft Translator has you covered. Download it now and see how it can help you break language barriers, stay on top of group conversations by navigating easily within transcripts via chapters.With an intuitive interface and real-time accurate translations, Microsoft Translator makes it easier to communicate with confidence. Plus, use features like chapters and transcripts to navigate within group conversations to stay on top of the conversation.

Don’t let language barriers hold you back. Download Microsoft Translator now and see how it can help you connect with people from different cultures and backgrounds. With support for over 100 languages (https://aka.ms/applanguages), you’ll be able to communicate with ease no matter where you are in the world.

title: Air France - Book a flight
description:
Meet a pocket-sized travel assistant designed to help you at every step of your journey.





From booking a flight, checking in, and receiving real-time flight updates to managing your Flying Blue account, the Air France app is your must-have travel tool.





BOOK A FLIGHT

Book your ticket for any of our destinations using your preferred secure payment method. To save time on future bookings, simply add your contact information to your profile, and we’ll prefill your details. 




OBTAIN YOUR BOARDING PASS

Check in, select your seat, and obtain your boarding pass directly in the app.




STAY INFORMED

Turn on notifications and get real-time flight updates and exclusive content about your destination. You can also share your flight status with your loved ones to stay in touch with those on the ground.




MANAGE YOUR BOOKING

Need to review your ticket conditions, update your contact information or make a last-minute change to your booking? Manage your booking seamlessly directly in the app.



ENHANCE YOUR TRAVEL EXPERIENCE

Go the extra mile and add one of our extra travel options to your booking with a simple click (seat selection, special meals, lounge access, and more).



A SPECIAL SERVICE FOR YOUR CHILD

Is your child traveling alone via the trusted Kids Solo service? Track and manage their journey directly in the app.



ACCESS YOUR FLYING BLUE ACCOUNT

Check your Miles balance, book a rewards flight, modify your profile, and access your virtual Flying Blue card!
releaseNotes:
Are you ready to embark on your next adventure? Look no further than the Air France app and our newly designed trip details feature. With an elegant and refined layout, managing your booking has never been easier. 

In addition to these exciting changes, we've also made bug fixes and performance improvements to ensure your experience with the app is seamless and effortless. Your feedback is always appreciated, and we encourage you to let us know if you encounter any issues.
reviews:
So bad and unstructured app I did not see for long time. Nearly unable to make a simple check in… | I just tried to change my seats for the flight tomorrow and it didn’t work at all. Disappointing, not sure what is wrong with the app. | The problem freezes. Hello, I have a problem with the application on the iPhone 12 mini. When I move to bonus l bookings where I have a saved trip, everything freezes at that moment and I can't get anywhere. I have to turn the app off and on again. even reinstalling doesn't improve anything. Thank you for your help. | This application isn’t usefull. After checking you just get message, that you should ask for your Boarding pas on the counter on Airport. Wellcome in 2024 electronic exchange of documents! Just waiste of time with stupid application which doesn’t provide basical service. Another waiste of time is to go early on Airport and wait on counter. The AF service is worst in this than all cheap airlines. | l'application se bloque, s'exécute lentement et comporte de nombreuses erreurs.  les cartes d'embarquement ne peuvent souvent pas être affichées. | The button to add a boarding pass to the wallet is not available anymore after the recent update | even though I completed the booking and payment for the upgraded seat more than two months ago, it is not possible to complete the check in the day before departure. I paid 12,000 miles / €80 for the seat of my choice and the app shows me that I'll probably be sitting somewhere else. This is the second time this has happened to me in a row. 

The app also doesn't allow me to preview the seating chart on the plane the day before departure. However, the seat number that I have in my confirmation email after payment does not match the number that the app shows me the day before departure. So I can do absolutely nothing but wait to be surprised again before boarding the plane. | Restez comme vous êtes, accueillants, communicatifs, humains ...le contraire des robots ou des personnels qui récitent leur leçon. Vive Air France, son naturel, sa bonne humeur. A bientôt | I am very sad that you  have changed  the condition of flying blue…. | Déconnexion automatique constante, dysfonctionnement absolu lors d'une nouvelle tentative de connexion.  Un vrai idiot a dû inventer ça !  Je ne comprends pas que la gestion d'une telle entreprise n'a pas d'importance du tout.  Une application complète et inutile.  C'est une honte pour la France ! | I never wrote any review on any app, but this one is not working, automatically login in french, can’t find english… I only downloaded it because airfrance webstite don’t want to log me in on my phone (works only on computer or notebook)! So app doesn’t work, website also on phone.. idk if it’s just on iphone, but it doesn’t matter, still very very bad.. :( if there would be “0 star” option, I would use is over “1 star” | It doesn't work at all | still broken login…. Nothing better… | HELLO DEVELOPERS!  LOGIN PROBLEM!  Please wake up!  Have you noticed reviews published in the last 6 months?  If so, the login issue would have been resolved a long time ago.  So far, this seems to be a problem for Czech users.  Any advice or recommendation is welcome. | You can download this app and check in, so you can get a check in confirmation and get your boarding pass after standing in a queue for one hour :-) | I have opted out of “commercial notifications” but the app spams me anyway. | Hello, about a hundred times I have tried to log in via the app on the iPhone. I have never succeeded. The red login button just doesn't work. | Not possible to login from iOS 15.4. | Login and wallet on iPhone doesn’t work | Click on login does not work! Can you please do something about it? | I am unable to click on log in button anymore… | affreuse appli. pleine de publicités et d’autres informations inutiles, mais pour check-in pratiquement inutilisable alors que c’est la seule chose dont la plupart de voyageurs a vraiment besoin | This app is worst I have seen. Impossible edit or delete of passport, any change or update of personal informations doesn’t work! | Did not even find out how to switch to english.. Rubish app, developers wake up. It should be in english default!!! | Could have just sent via email | Really terrible experience, online check in is throwing errors when you want to download boarding pass. Would strongly recommend flying with another airline. | That’s the only thing the app can do: crash! Nothing more. Want to change your details? No! It crashes! Want to BUY a seat reservation? No! It crashes! Nothing works properly! | Doesnt work, I cant look up the connections... | I can’t find how to switch to English 🥴 | This is like the worst airline app ever, super slow, cluttered and when it comes to checking-in I never got a boarding pass directly and had to go to the counter. Simply “awesome”...you guys should look to the KLM app, it’s quite sad, that one airline holding can make a really good app that works perfectly for one part of the company, but for the other part it makes the absolutely piece of junk, that work like...well France. 
And please, developers, get rid of that French chauvinistic attitude, I really don’t need the app in French when I first install it, when my phone is completely in English!!!! Everyone can do that and you’re really not anything special to not do this... | App in french? Really? Are you serious? | App itself looks nice in first impression. But its very crapy. When you instal it, its in french by default. There is no visible button to change language, you need to find this posibility in menu which is in french of course. When you find it, all countries are in french. So you need to find somehow your country. Did you ever saw any french who changed language to for example czech? When you trying to create an account and you fil everything correctly a trying to save, you will get an error. But from error message you dont know whats wrong. So after few testings was only one solution. Erase app a never try it again. Very very french approach... | In love with it !!!! | This app is disaster. Lots of things stop working for no apparent reason. The only reason I use it is to get boarding pass into the Wallet. Search doesn't work most of the time, same problem with ticket purchase. Joining flying blue yield an error. From time to time app just goes into loading state which is never finished. Idk why this app exists at all

title: Journi Print | Photobooks
description:
Journi Print is like hiring a designer! It designs a photo book in seconds exactly the way you would have done. Our smart algorithm can find the best layouts for 1200 photos in just 34 seconds. Save time and money and start your photo book today because you already did the work when you took the photos.

▶ HOW IT WORKS 
▻ Choose your photo source: iPhone/iPad, iCloud, or Facebook
▻ Select a suggested album or hand-pick your photos.
▻ BOOM! In just a few seconds your photo book is ready for print!


▶ FAST & EASY  
▻ Want to add or edit something? Journi Print is beyond-easy. 
▻ Get beautiful & timeless collages - not just one photo per page.
▻ Don’t lose your head: Photos are NOT cropped! We never cut your precious memories.
▻ Dates & texts are beautifully arranged.
▻ Get amazing maps, automatically created by your photo locations!


▶ BEST QUALITY
▻ Enjoy the highest quality, printed in the Alps
▻ Environmentally friendly paper that is FSC certified
▻ Digital print on 170 g/m2 Plano Art Paper


▶ NEED MORE ARGUMENTS?
▻ Get it cheaper: Invite your friends and earn money.
▻ Your privacy is always protected 100%
▻ Want to create a photo book while travelling? Try our free photo journaling app: Journi Blog - Travel tracker

▶ QUESTIONS? 
For questions, assistance or other inquiries contact: 
Helpcenter - http://journiapp.com/faq
Email - support@journiapp.com
Facebook - http://facebook.com/journiapp
releaseNotes:
Introducing:
- New design to edit your photo book much faster
- Pick your favorite title color
- Wall Calendar: Pick your favorite background color
- Performance Improvements 
- Minor issues fixed

Tell us and other users if you like this version by writing a review in the store.

Doporučuji!!! | Moje objednávka nedorazila včas(a ani nevim kdy dorazí | Aplikace mě zaujala a neustále mi na mail chodilo upozornění na slevu. Vynikající aplikace. Jen je před odesláním nutné vše raději dvakrát zkontrolovat.

title: Tube Map - London Underground
description:
Tube Map is the award-winning navigation app that includes the official TfL (Transport for London) Tube Map. Tube Map - London Underground works both on and offline and is the #1 Tube Map with over 22 million downloads!


Key features:


Uses the official TfL iconic Harry Beck London Underground map design.
Includes additional map views for the TfL Night Tube and Rail Network. Plus a bonus map that we have created that is more geographical. 
An easy to use journey planner that works with and without an internet connection.
Check line status for delays, closures and service changes.
See what time the next Tube is due with live departures from TfL.
National Rail arrivals and departures.
Journey planning made easy with real-time routing around closures and delays.
Use step-by-step directions in the journey planner to find your way around London.
Save your favourite routes for quick selection when on the go.
Save your Home and Work stations for up to date station, line and route information.
Find your closest Tube station wherever you are in London.
Tube Map – London Underground Apple Watch app available.
Line status widget
Travel Guide
Exclusive features also available; First & Last Tube Times, Tube Exits, Premium Line status widget and Priority Support.
NEW - Remove advertising subscription


With over 60 million downloads worldwide, there's a Mapway app for many of the busiest transport systems in the world including New York Subway, Paris Metro, Bus Times London and Berlin Subway.


Plan. Route. Relax.


Please note: whilst we endeavour to ensure that Line Status notifications are delivered in a timely manner we can’t guarantee this 100% of the time. There may be occasions when the functionality isn’t available due to technical reasons outside of our control. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.


Tube Map Premium available as an in-app subscription: 99p weekly, £3.99 monthly or £9.99 annually, or as a one-off purchase of £24.99. Prices may vary by location. Cancel at any time, for any reason. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, at the cost of your chosen price tier. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings in your iTunes Account. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased, where applicable. Read our terms in full at https://www.mapway.com/terms-conditions/
releaseNotes:
Thank you for downloading the app. We regularly update the app to make it better for you. 


This release includes an updated map and some bug fixes and improvements for you.


To make sure you don’t miss a thing, just keep your updates turned on.



Got a question? Tap Support in the About section in the app.
reviews: Aqgftr | Good. But perhaps too much ads

title: Austrian
description:
Book flights, reserve seats and keep track of your boarding passes - the Austrian app accompanies you throughout your journey with the Lufthansa Group network airlines.
You receive real-time information and all relevant updates about your flight directly on your smartphone in the form of push notifications. The Austrian App ensures you are always up to date.
Experience a smooth journey with the Austrian app. From booking your flight to landing and beyond, you can stay informed at all times. You can also conveniently manage your data and access personalized services via your personal profile.
In short: The Austrian App keeps you well informed throughout your journey.
Here’s how the Austrian App makes your journey easier:

Before departure
•	Book your flight, reserve your seat and add your baggage: Search for your desired flight, book it, and rent a car that will be waiting for you at your destination. You can also add any additional pieces of luggage directly in the app and reserve or change your seat.
•	Online check-in: With the Austrian app, you can check in online for all Lufthansa Group Network Airlines flights. Your digital flight ticket will then appear directly on your smartphone. When boarding, simply open the app to show your mobile boarding pass.
•	Travel ID and Austrian Miles and More: You can now save several payment methods directly to your Travel ID account thanks to the new digital wallet. This means you can pay with ease anytime and anywhere. Enter your personal details and select your personalized services to make the Austrian app even easier to use. To do this, use your Travel ID or your Austrian Miles & More login.
•	Real-time information and flight status: Starting 47 hours before your departure, your personal travel assistant will provide you with all important updates and information about your flight. Push notifications about check-in, flight status and gate changes make sure you are always up to date. With messages that pop up on your home screen, you always have an overview of your trip and can relax and enjoy your journey.

During the flight
•	Flight ticket and on-board services: With the Austrian app, you always have your mobile boarding pass and all on-board services with you – even when you are offline. That way you can keep track of all important flight information and changes at all times.

After the flight
•	Track your baggage: Even after landing, the Austrian app will keep you informed of further steps that need to be taken. This means you always have an overview of your checked baggage and can track it easily.

The Austrian app is the perfect companion to ensure a relaxed journey. You can use the app to book your flights and rental cars, receive automatic notifications and updates on your next flight and edit your personal data easily and conveniently while on the move.
Download the Austrian app now for a relaxed travel experience with a personal digital travel assistant that accompanies you before, during and after your flight.
Learn more about our flight offers at austrian.com and follow us on Instagram, Facebook, YouTube and X to stay up to date.
If you have any questions or need any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. You can get in touch at https://www.austrian.com/at/en/contact#/.

title: WiFi Map: Internet, eSIM, VPN
description:
WiFi Map is an all-in-one app that will come in handy whenever you're on travel.

#1 App for Travellers in 100+ countries

WiFi Map and Passwords
Always find a free WiFi hotspot around. WiFi Map will navigate you to the nearest shared hotspots, show passwords, and let you connect to the internet in a few taps.
• millions of shared WiFi hotspots
• offline regions to find WiFi without the internet
• detailed map with hotspots and POIs
• guided navigation to public WiFi
• speed testing capabilities

eSIM
Stay online even without a Wi-Fi nearby. Get our eSIM now and access the internet wherever you go.
• Internet in 70+ countries
• 30 days validity
• 1GB, 3GB, 5GB and 10GB available packages
• fast refill
• High speed 4G and LTE networks
• no contract
• activation in a few taps


VPN
Secure your internet connection when using public hotspots. Select from dozens of VPN servers and enjoy fast, secure, and reliable internet access to your favourite services.

Handy Widgets
Meet small but useful widgets that contain all the information you may need while traveling. Find actual rates, calculate tips, keep an eye on the weather, and time from a single app.
• currency rates converter
• world clock
• tips calculator
• local weather
• and more

WiFi Map offers a subscription plan that gives you more functionality including downloadable offline regions, fast and secure VPN, and completely disabled ads.
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• An account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

----------------------------
Help Center and FAQ: https://intercom.help/wifi-map-help-center/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wifimapapp

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wifimap/
Telegram: https://t.me/wifimap_io
Website: https://www.wifimap.io/
Email: support@wifimap.io

title: Trip.com: Flight, Hotel, Train
description:
Winner of 'Europe’s Best Online Travel Agency 2023' from the World Travel Awards.
 
The Trip.com app is your trusted travel companion whenever and wherever you are. Get the app now to create your perfect trip at a fantastic price!
 
#Why is the Trip.com App Trust-worthy?
 
24/7 SERVICE GUARANTEE ► You can rely on timely customer support and post-booking protection with our 24/7 service guarantee. Our awarding-winning customer support helps every customer with a stress-free trip.
 
24 LANGUAGES SUPPORTED ► Switch the app to your native language and manage all your bookings with ease.
 
31 CURRENCIES & MULTIPLE PAYMENT OPTIONS ► We have a payment solution for international travellers. All frequently-used payment methods supported in the app.
 
TRAVEL INSURANCE ► Fly with peace of mind with our comprehensive travel insurance plans.
 
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ► Trip.com app is an official partner of National Rail, Eurostar, Ryanair, British Airways, meaning you have access to industry-leading travel products. In short, you can count on us for a reliable travel experience!
 
MEMBER-ONLY REWARDS ► Become a Trip member and get exclusive rewards, such as earning in our rewards scheme Trip Coins that will help you save more in the future. Join us now for free and get more for less!
 
#How can you get the best service at the best price on the Trip.com app?
 
FLIGHTS.
 
FIND YOUR PERFECT FLIGHT ► The Trip.com app offers flights to around 5,000 cities worldwide. You can even book a chartered flight! The Trip.com app lets you filter by price, flight duration, travel time, airline, or number of stops. Pick a multi-city itinerary, so you can fly into one city and out of another.
 
LOW-PRICE MAP ► The map offers our cheapest available flights worldwide, from Europe, Asia to the Americas, Oceania, and Africa. Get inspiration from thousands of routes and find your next adventure.
 
PRICE DROP ALERTS ► Can't find a flight in your price range? Just set up a price drop alert. We'll let you know as soon as it hits the point you're happy with.
 
FLIGHT STATUS CHECKER ► Enter your flight number and get real-time flight info.
 
TRAINS.
 
WORLDWIDE TRAIN TICKETS ► Whether you're hitting the rails in Europe (incl. the UK, France, Italy, Spain, and Germany), mainland China, Taiwan, Hong Kong, or South Korea, you'll find everything you need on Trip.com.
 
OFFICIAL PARTNERSHIPS ► We connect directly with the train's information for updated schedule info and prices, which lets you search quickly through available fares, saving you time and money.
 
SPLIT TICKETS ► Book your journey in separate segments and enjoy lower fares without compromising on your travel experience.
 
LIVE TRACKER ► We'll keep an eye on the status of your train. Check back one day before departure for the latest information.
 
HOTELS.
 
ADVANCED SEARCH FILTER ► On Trip.com, you can browse more than 1.4 million options worldwide. Whether you’re in the mood for a money-saving apartment stay or a luxury five-stay hotel, a cozy B&B or a fun-filled resort, it’s easy to find the right accommodation.
 
WE PRICE MATCH ► We aim to offer you the best possible price. If you find a cheaper option elsewhere, we'll refund the difference.
 
VERIFIED USER REVIEWS ► We have over 30 million verified hotel reviews to help you make your decision.
 
HOTEL AND FLIGHT BUNDLE BOOKING ► Save money by booking your hotel and flight together. If your flight is rescheduled, we'll guarantee your hotel room.
 
AND MORE.
 
TRIP.BEST RANKINGS ► You can find top attractions, family-friendly spots, natural sites and much more!
 
TRIP MANAGEMENT IN ONE APP ► You can add itinerary to your calendar, or save as a photo for offline use.
 
CAR RENTAL ► Free cancellation available!
 
Download the Trip.com app now to discover more amazing features and create your perfect trip - just like that!
releaseNotes:
We've been working hard to improve the Trip.com app, to make sure you have the best trip possible. Here's what's new:

【IT Trains】
Most tickets on the official Trenitalia and Italo websites can be booked on Trip.com. These tickets cover more than 90% of routes within Italy, as well as cross-border routes between Italy and France, Switzerland, and other destinations. Enjoy the convenience of real-time train info and e-tickets, and book in advance to save on fares. Plus, when you book trains in our app, you won't have to pay any booking fees.

【Trip Map】
Finding your way between airports, hotels, stations, and attractions too chaotic? Make Trip.com your travel assistant. Trip Map is a DIY feature you can use to visually display travel routes. Just tap to view your personal map, distances, and itinerary times, and even optimize your route.

We hope you love our new app version. If you need help or have any feedback, feel free to contact our online customer support or leave an app review.

Have a great trip!

The Trip.com Team

title: TomTom GO: Navigation, Maps
description:
Join +10 million drivers using TomTom GO Navigation’s reliable sat nav to escape traffic & save time.

Experience a reliable GPS navigation app for cars and trucks with up-to-date maps and live traffic updates on your device. Select the subscription that suits you and begin your free trial now!

► AVOID TRAFFIC & SPEED CAMERAS
◦ Live Traffic Updates: Seamlessly navigate around traffic congestion and roadblocks in real-time.
◦ Speed Alerts & Warnings: Stay informed and drive confidently with alerts for fixed and mobile speed cameras.*
◦ Apple CarPlay Compatibility: Access directions and real-time updates on a larger screen with immersive surround sound.

► ENHANCED FEATURES FOR A SAFER DRIVE
◦ Ad-Free: Stay focused on the road with minimal distractions and data privacy.
◦ Lane Guidance: Never miss a turn with precise lane suggestions for seamless navigation.
◦ TomTom Routebar™: A sidebar provides a route overview with alerts and notifications, ensuring a smooth journey.
◦ Offline Maps: Conserve mobile data and battery life with up-to-date GPS navigation, with no internet. 

► TAILORED JOURNEYS FOR TRUCK DRIVERS
◦ Input your vehicle's dimensions for tailored guidance
◦  Effortlessly locate designated truck rest stops & relevant truck POIs
◦ Provide details of hazardous cargo to steer clear of restricted routes
◦ Set your preferred maximum speed to receive an adjusted estimated time of arrival. 

Experience our premium features with a free 7-day trial. Opt to continue your journey with one of our auto-renewing subscription plan:

► CANCEL OR UPDATE ANYTIME
Car: 1 month: £3.99 | 12 months: £19.99 
Truck: 1 month: £24.99 | 12 months: £79.99

---------------------------------------

▼ Terms & Conditions: https://www.tomtom.com/en_gb/legal/
▼ Using TomTom GO Services: https://help.tomtom.com/hc/en-gb/sections/360004055020-Using-TomTom-Services
▼ Use Speed Camera Services: In accordance with local laws and regulations. Some jurisdictions prohibit this functionality. Check local laws before use. 
▼ Offer limited to one free trial per user.**
▼ Apple CarPlay is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements
reviews:

To samé Srbsko-Makedonie atd. Díky | Nemá v databázi čísla popisné. To neni dobrá mapa. | Dobrý den. Aplikace jako jedna z mála neumí nastavit jestli bude zvuk hrát z telefonu, nebo z Bluetooth zařízení v autě. Musí se nastavovat ručně při každém spuštění. Druhá věc je, že neumí hledat čísla popisný ve městech. Starší verze TomTom to bez problémů zvládaly. Jinak TomTom používám asi 15let a mám ho rád. Prosím o opravu těchto chyb. The first is that you don't have a lifetime license, for example for €65 and then a year-long overpayment for radar and driving around columns. The second thing is that there is no option on the route to cancel or set the option to change the road in a certain state, as Sygic has. At least the second thing would be great. | Nejlepší navigace | Pros: clear design, good navigation, info how far to the next petrol station, independent of mobile signal, good price, average speed in measured sections
Cons: long starting time at carplay auto, auto changing scheme color is annoying (others can change the scheme with lights on/off. There is some inbuild time schedule, which means you have full power of display brightness in very dard places during day - tunels etc), not so fast traffic recalculation, very slow at updates of maps (the last one where I can’t see the new roads - apple maps shows these roads already instead they use the TomTom data??) | Dobrý den, 
navigace je za mě super!! Nikdy nezklamala jenom bych poprosil update na Ipad 🥹💁.

Nastaly 2 situace, kde jsem potřeboval navigaci použít a ani v jednom případě se navigace vůbec nenačetla. 

Za mě to byly zcela vyhozené peníze... | I’m using this app for nearly 2years. It is stable and works nice with carplay (carplay has sometimes issue wit position, which require to disconnect and navigate from phone directly). Sometimes it is hard to find address or point of interest. 
What wold be nice are following improvements:
Add possibility to import location from Google or Apple maps
Add enhanced futures to limit road based on vehicle size (in my case with camper) and add futures which would select road with nice view (for motorbike or driving with caravan)
