And just remember that you must pay them for this…software. | I’d like to ask for advice. I’ve been using this app on iphone 14. I must have done something wring, because I am not able to find the option of planning of walking and cycling routes.
Please advise, what I should you. Of course I checked instruction manual. It simply mentiones the posdibility. I do not see it in the menu. Thanks in advance for help. Karel Schneider Prague | Happy to use TomTom with CarPlay. Only feature I am missing compare to other nav apps is voice search while driving. | I was really looking forward to trying the Tomtom after several years of using the car's built-in navigation (very good but hard to update). I immediately found that the app is not showing the traffic information along the way. I can see the traffic information in nearby areas, but it is useful only for short trips. For example, planning a trip from southern Switzerland to the Czech is impossible without any additional source like Google Maps. I can imagine that a traffic jam in Munich is not so important 4 hours ahead since it can change significantly, but road constructions could make me choose a completely different way (like Ulm, Nuremberg...)
For the planning, it would also be great to see alternative routes (sometimes the route is completely different, but the travel time is similar).
I would appreciate a button for a quick "north-up" map orientation when browsing through the map (it is very easy to rotate the map accidentally).
I will give it a chance, but after a first look, I am not very motivated for the subscription :-( | Assigning a waypoint sometimes doesn't work correctly - instead of the point being assigned to the current route, it is added as another point and the route is extended by that distance. Also, I'm missing the option to select my preferred fuel and gas station brand. EDIT: TomTom Go, iOS

EDIT2: No, the option to select preferred fuel and gas station brand has never existed in TomTom on iOS. My complaint is more of a feature request. | Nejen, že kdysi rozdělili navigační aplikace na Západní Evropu a Východní Evropu. Takže jsem si musel koupit obě dvě na cestu z Čech do Německa. 160€? Slibovali doživotní licenci a upgrade. A co nastalo? Vydali příšernou aplikaci TomTom Go, a “milostivě” mi dovolili jí používat rok zdarma!
JSOU TO PRACHSPROSTÝ ZLODĚJI! | Výborná offline navigace, dobře funkční CarPlay, dopravní info po Evropě s rychlým přepočtem, radary celkem dobře funkční. Uvítal bych možnost rychlého tlačítka v CarPlay pro objížďku, aby mě navigace nevracela na uzavřenou trasu po sjetí. Z aktuální nabídky offline navigaci hodnotím jako nejlepší.
Edit 13.6.2022/ ubíram hvězdu, k dokonalosti bych ještě zlepšil kontrast mapy, odlišil cesty dle třídy přehledněji, hlavně zlepšil celkové UI, zadat takovou jednoduchou věc jako adresu ci oblíbené není zrovna uživatelsky přívětivé !!! V tomhle je třeba konkurence mnohem lepší . A samozřejmě stále požadavek na objizdu v rozhraní CarPlay. | I am using TomTom on iPhone13, it has great stability, fast calculation of the route and shows on the screen just the key needed data, it is perfectly transparent and offersimmediate orientation   when one takes a quick look on phone screen while driving. Traffic data are actual. | Aktualizace 29.4.22
Objevil jsem další slabé místo této appky. Pokud se spolehnu na to, že se jedná o offline navigaci mám smůlu. Start appky a výpočet trasy musí proběhnout on-line jinak skončíte ve slepé ulici. Uzavírky i dlouhodobá omezení se načítají až při plánování trasy. Neni tedy možné být od začátku cesty offline. 
______
Začnu chválou. Grafika je přehledná a nestalo se mě, že bych ve složitých křižovatkách špatně odbočil. Výpočet trasy je lepší jak u konkurence a toho jsem mnohokrát využil. Vše by bylo na výbornou, kdyby měla navigace správné mapové podklady. Těch chyb je mnoho a trvají velmi dlouho - mapy pravidelně aktualizuji - takže problém je někde u Tomtomu. Např. trasa Praha - Liberec, po dálnici: před Libercem to vede přes vesničky, protože už skoro rok si navigace mysli, že je dálnice na Liberec zavřená. V Chotěboři je již více jak dva roky přeloženo usekové měření. Navigace to neví. Cca 25 km před Plzní po dálnici z Prahy to hlásí usekové měření, které tam není. Při vracení se zpět opět stejný problém. Do slepé ulice mě to vedlo pouze jednou, opět nebyly aktuální mapové podklady a v místě probíhala stavba. Předplatné už neobnovim. | Tak jak byl driv tom tom nejlepsi neprehlednejsi a nejucinejsi aplikace tak zde je ukazka jak se to nema delat jak z nejlepsi navigace dokazali udalat nejhorsi. Strasny neprehledny a bez funkci. Zmizeli napr obline polozky. (Nejde uz ulozit afresu a mit ji pripravenou k pouziti). Vse je kostrbate a neintuitivni. Budu doufat ze se casem vrati k puvodni aplikaci nebo ze tihle udelaji uplne odznova a poradne.

Bohuzel me totalne okradli. Zaplatil jsem tomtoma plnou cenu asi 80euro. Udelali novou navigaci a ted po me chteji platit vubrc abyvh navigaci mohl pouzit!!!! 100 kc mesicne. Dobra zlodejna. | I purchased unlimited lifetime maps TomTom Europe for my iPad TomTom stopped to support this after about a year. Gave me “unlimited” iphone Go app. No I opened it after many year to give it a try. But my it tells me that “unlimited” subscription has ended”!
NEVER NEVER AGAIN. | Dobry den, zjistil jsem ze navigace obsahuje pro me jednu zavaznou chybu, kvuli ktere je pro me v meste nepouzitelne. Pokud ma trasa obsahovat za sebou v kratkem useku (nekolik desitek mezru) 2 x odboceni do leva tak to navigace neudela, ale radsi vymysli nesmysli jak se tomu vyhnout. Prosim o opravu zminene chyby at mohu opet navigaci pouzivat. V pripadr potreby jsem ochoten sdelit emailem vic podrobnosti popr. zaslat i printscreen. | I have to admit that TomTom evolved a lot since I’ve used it years ago. Subscription prices are reasonable, map updates are frequent, and maps are also quite reliable. Traffic info, voice instructions, speed limits, lane navigation, sectional speed measuring, faster route suggestion, and other useful related features are all available within your subscription without any extra payments. The interface is well designed, it is stable, and all works well together. Even voice commands and street names reading is available and correct in Czech which Sygic has still issues with even years after I’ve reported that bug there.

If I could have one request, I would welcome an option to automatically download and install map updates. There could be options for automatic install like Always (Wi-fi & Mobile data), Wi-fi only, and Never (which is the only “option” now). | I like the app a lot, it works very well. | . Thanks for answer, but still facing the same issue. If I forgot to run application on iPhone, I cannot run your app even on iPhone and car. Other navigation I can run without running on phone. | Very slow loading. It has a loading bug when connected to Apple car. So annoying.
EDIT: tip from the support is not helping at all. :( | Kde najdu v aplikaci přepnutí na nákladní vozy ? | Již několik let používám TomTom, nyní se v něm objevila chyba, která znemožňuje použití aplikace. Podpora nereaguje na několik žádosti o vyřešení, budu muset s aplikaci skončit. | Navigace by byla fajn na 4-5 hvězd, zvláště za navigaci v pruzích, ta je skvělá, prostředi se mi líbí více než u jiných navigací, ale protože neumí navigovat ( vyhledat) číslo popisné, tak je v podstatě nepoužitelná. Viz. město Libušín (nenajde ani jednu adresu! ) a ve dalších menších městech a vesničkách bohužel také ne. Vždy najde jen ulici, ale číslo popisné nenajde ani když jej zadáte z adresáře. Škoda. Všechny další navigace tuto základní funkci zvládají bez problému, jen Tom Tom to prostě neumí. Proč? | Horrible UI | V SRN máte rychlostní limit 130 km v hodině. Takže neustále svítí zvýrazněná stotřícítka kvůli překročení rychlosti. | Пару лет назад использовал на Андроиде, почти идеально. На iOS возникли. 
Раздел с картами Германии называется «Германия». Вложенные карты регионов Германии поименованы как «Нiмеччина Пiвденний Захiд» и так далее. Не лучше дела и в других картах. На каком языке идёт поиск не проверял. 
Были непонятные проблемы с загрузкой карт («нет интернета»). Интернет был прекрасный. Оказывается, надо было в учётку ТомТом войти. 
Карты подвисают при использовании с CarPlay. Лечится сбросом программы на телефоне. Но в Европе телефон в руке - удовольствие не из дешевых. | Aplikace nabízí adresy ze seznamu kontaktů z telefonu. Bohužel, ani jednu nedokáže najít na mapě. Adresy jsou zadány správně. Konkurenční aplikace s tím nemají problém. | Problém s přehříváním iPhone byl vyřešen, ale dost mi chybí v CarPlay postranní lišta s dopravními informacemi. Jinak dobrá navigace. | Mám koupený traffic a velmi dobře funguje. Mnohem lepší plánování tras než Waze nebo Sygic. Po roce používání je to dle mého názoru nejlepší navigace . Carplay s alternativními trasami je super. Jen tak dále moc děkuji.👍 | Vse jede tak jak ma a vyhledani adres a navigace na jednicku . Diky | Špatné vyhledávání města a ulice. Asi jsem zvyklý na navigaci TomTom XL, kdy bylo všechno přehledné při zadávání adresy. Nevím proč to není i tady. Jinak navigace super. Ale když chci navigovat, tak si chci prvně zadat stát pak město ulici a č.p. a to v této navigaci nejde. Proto za mě palec dolů | Nefunguje rodinné sdílení, na help line mi nepomohli, prý to nefunguje kvůli aktualizacím pro i Phone.... největší blbost, jakou jsem slyšel. 
Jinak aplikace funguje skvěle. | Very good app. I used it on phone and it is the best one. Now I have moved to Carplay and there are some things I’m missing. Please add current speed circle beside the speed limit. And at least some traffic preview info. I’m missing route bar a lot. I saw in Sygic it is possible so it seems Carplay display limitations aren’t so restrictive. Thanks in advance. | Aplikaci jsem vyskousel a pak jsem to vymazal a porad pomne chce penize,i kdyz tu aplikaci uz par mesicu mam vymazanou. | Appka funguje vcelku slušně, včetně dopravní situace a radarů, ale zásadní výtku mám k mapám. Pokud se chci při navigací podívat na název obce, popř. číslo silnice, tak mám prostě smůlu. Mapu můžu přibližovat jako o život, ale velikost písma je stále stejná a to miniaturní. Za jízdy nečitelná a tak vlastně nebezpečná! | V poslední verzi při zadání nejrychlejší trasy obchází dálnice a plánuje po okreskách. Přitom dálnice normálně průjezdná a bez nehod. | Again crash when loading maps. Additionally this week (22.7. till 24.7.) no traffic info, at least not in my trip to Germany, Austria and Italy.
Long time everything was stable and worth the money, but latest news seem to be very bad. | V CarPlay nejsou dopravní informace. Mapy dost očesané,chybí hodně názvů obcí. Na placenou aplikaci fakt bída. Nedoporučuji. | Dlouhé čekání na podporu CarPlay vyústilo ve zklamání. Přes obrazovku autorádia nejde udělat téměř nic, ani se vyhnout uzavírce nebo nastavit hlasitost. Velká škoda, protože jinak TomTom naviguje mnohem přesněji než originál on-line navigace ve Škodě Superb.

title: Get Out Fun
description:
Zvládnete na své cestě posbírat všechny indície, abyste věděli kudy dál? Jste všímaví a baví Vás namáhat si hlavu při vašich netradičních výletech? Venkovní únikové hry v aplikaci Get Out Fun vás provedou těmi nejkrásnějšími místy významných měst. Nejedná se však o průvodce, kterého budete slepě následovat, naopak si cestu musíte najít sami pomocí někdy i velice obtížných úkolů. Složité úkoly pro vás však nemusí být překážkou, ke každému je možnost zvolit si nápovědu, která vás navede na správnou cestu ke zdárnému cíli.

Are you able to get all the clues on your way in order to know where to go? Are you mindful and enjoying unconventional tours in order to get to know the foreign cities? The Get Out Fun scavanger games will take you to the most beautiful places in the well-known cities. This is not a guide you will blindly follow, on the contrary, you have to find your way on your own by solving a few difficult tasks. However, complicated tasks are not an obstacle for you on this adventurous journey because you can always use hints in order to find the right path and successfully reach the end.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes
reviews: Poměr cena výkon je hodně špatný. Šifry jsou koncipovány tak, že řešení zná jen autor a jeho způsob koncipování šifry je hodně těžké zpětně pochopit. Za nás jsou to špatně šifry velké zklamání. Podobné šifry vymýšlím za jedno dopoledne a s daleko lepším obsahem. U mnoha šifer je mnoho jiných řešení a je opravdu nemožné odhadnout zrovna to správné, které zrovna autor označil za správné. Zkoušeli jsme pražskou tour de beer a pokud chcete ušetřit prostě si projdete pár hospod kolem miroveho náměstí a neutracejte peníze za tuhle blbost. | Cela unikovna mela az moc dlouhy pribeh, ktery nebyl zajimavy a zdlouhavy, na zacatku nam napsali at sbirame body, ktere pak k nicemu nakonci nebyli, byli jsme zklamani, ze na konci nebylo zadne vyhodnoceni ani odmena, nektere hlavolami uz byli i rozbite, celkove dost spatne :-( a to jsme se fakt tesili. | Sochy promlouvaly, příroda s náma mluvila, po tmě jsme byli totálně vyklepaní a do toho hlasy ze záhrobí. Puzzly byly přiměřeně obtížné i pro nás hloupější. Nejsme žádní nerdíci a přesto jsme si hru megaužili!!! | Nejdřív jsem myslel že je to normální únikovka ale tohle je originální tím že luštíte úlohy venku a zároveň si užijete hezkou procházku. Bylo to super, díky a udělejte další! 😊 | No tak jsem to zkusil a moc me to bavilo! Sice to ma nejaky mouchy ale to bude napraveno pry v dalsim updatu | Za mně super, je to jako escape game, ale venku, po krásné Praze. Prostě boží!!

title: Road Trip: Fun adventure town!
description:
Expeditions, adventures, merges, and puzzles await you in our exciting Road Trip game! It is an amazing life story of a girl Alex and her friends. Become a part of it!
- Expeditions to islands, locations, and caves.
- Hundreds of levels and cool riddles.
- Exciting plot.
- Merge and puzzles.
- Lots and lots of fun.
Hurry up and play our game and enjoy all its features.

Casual Adventure Game! Mobile Application Adventure Game. Casual Adventure in your pocket! Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure Games is an Adventure Game about traveling through the world of secrets and mysteries!  World with a unique history and events awaits you! 
        Mobile application Road Trip: Royal merge Adventure games is a mobile application that is always with you in your mobile device. Mobile game is an Adventure for the whole family. Road Trip is a whole Klondike Adventure! Real family island with different locations and mysterious places. Casual Adventure game is waiting for you!

         Our Road Trip game is a unique township of story-driven Adventures and journeys. Merge items and have fun with the events! Journey through our game will introduce you to Alex, the main character of this story!
   Join Alex, an aspiring designer, on a journey to discover the secrets of unexplored lands!
   Merge items Alex and her friends desperately need in their Adventure!
   Visit the unusual locations of the 1980s and enjoy their authentic architecture and interiors!
   Complete quests to advance in your travels with Alex and earn fantastic rewards!
   Solve challenging puzzles encountered along the way!
   Many colorful characters, different backgrounds, professions: cooks, mechanics, gallery owners, adventurers, shamans and scammers. Many animals - for each location of our game Road Trip!

  - 30+ locations with different geographical settings: empty ones are replaced by mountain peaks, snow forests, tropical islands! Urban landscapes with wild thickets, jungle - all this is available in our mobile game Road Trip: Royal merge adventure! Real road Adventure with a constant change of scenery outside the window.
  - Each chapter is a separate living world, a reference to a certain American state and iconic places like Roswell and UFOs and the like!
  - Each location is a small story. Our game Road Trip gives freedom of genres and moods: there are action-packed adventures in the jungle, traps and crocodiles, mystical ghosts of the Hawaiian Islands, chases and bizarre mechanisms, reality TV shooting (intrigue, investigation), dates and balloon flights. Treasures and architectural puzzles, caves and ancient civilizations! Love line and a triangle in the fight for the heart of our heroine Alex!
  - Setting in the spirit of 1960-1980 blurred timelines, lack of modern gadgets, nostalgia for a bygone time!
  - Road Trip: Royal merge adventure games has a huge number of different mini-games! Play for fun!
  - Every month there is an update with new mechanics/time events. We release a new location every week!
  - Event Expeditions, time-limited expeditions with new mechanics in the merge! Treasury rooms, crafting, garden beds, energy generators at the location, tournaments, season pass, wheel of Fortune!

Road Trip is a matching puzzle merge adventure game! Game of merge items for the whole family. Play our relaxing puzzle merge game. You’ll match and merge items, solve puzzles. You can play our Road Trip game without internet!

     The great merge journey is about to begin! Have fun exploring the worlds of Road Trip!
releaseNotes:
Alex's adventures continue! In this update, you'll find:
- Fixes of known bugs. Now the game is even more fun!

title: myAudi
description:
The myAudi app connects your Audi to your life and gives you innovative functions & services for greater convenience as you drive.

The fourth generation of the myAudi app is now even easier to use and provides even more convenience every day. The new version marks the start of a continuous update process that will gradually revolutionise the myAudi app with an intuitive and user-centred interface.
The vehicle dashboard is the start of this process. It has been significantly simplified on the basis of customer feedback and visualises information such as the vehicle status in the form of cards. The new quick action drawer has the most important vehicle functions, which are always just one swipe away.

Get real-time information about your vehicle at any time and keep a constant eye on your fuel tank level, driving range, service appointments, warnings and much more. Plan journeys in the app from the comfort of your own home and send destinations and routes directly to your vehicle. You can also remotely adjust climate control and open/close vehicle doors. (The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi)


OVERVIEW OF FUNCTIONS AND BENEFITS:

myAudi connect services
­	Keep track of important vehicle data and access information about your fuel tank level, driving range or oil level, right from your mobile device
­	Program the climate control to suit you, even before you get into the vehicle
­	Open and close your vehicle remotely

Audi e-tron
­	Use the myAudi app to plan and manage the charging process conveniently
­	Access specific information, such as electric range, charging status and remaining charging time

Navigation
­	Send destinations and routes from your mobile device to your vehicle
­	Plan your routes, including the walking route to the vehicle
­	Access contacts, addresses and your calendar from your vehicle

Service
­	Keep an eye on service appointments, upcoming maintenance, and all other information about additional work on your vehicle
­	Use the app to access your digital owner's manual 
­	Find your nearest Audi Service Partner
­	Manage costs and journeys with the digital cost and mileage tracker


You must register on myAudi to use the myAudi connect services. The availability of services may vary, depending on the model and equipment of your Audi. The myAudi app is provided by the importer for the applicable market. See the app legal notice for details about the importer.
Some functions depend on third-party providers and may not be available without restrictions at all times or in every country. We recommend a flat-rate high-speed data package to use our services – the applicable costs depend on your contract with the network operator. If you do not have a fast enough data connection, you may not get the full benefit of the features. Please also note any data volume restrictions imposed by your mobile service provider.
If you have questions, please contact us at kundenbetreuung@audi.de.
Running GPS continuously in the background can reduce the battery life.
releaseNotes:
- With our new Lock Screen Widgets, you can have information, e.g. the remaining range, displayed directly on the lock screen.
- Consistently fast and reliable: Our latest update brings the myAudi app back up to speed.
reviews:
Hello team.

I want to start saying that the app is a good plus to have some basic information about the car on the palm of your hands, but as a foreigner living in a non English speaking country it is kind of complicated to use the app. I would like to see the option to have at least English as a second language to choose from, regardless the country you are in. | Dear Audi team .  
   Last year I bought beautiful Q5 50 TDI 2020. 
  I am very confused by the fact that my application ( recently I have both) plug and play & my Audi…  
  I have spent €40 to make little control over very few options on luxury premium car. 
  To compare with  Lincoln Navigator  (wife) or even Volvo XC 90 -( my daughter ) … 
  It seems to me very poor coverage of many many extras I have in my car Audi…
   Please take more care about your recent offer of iPhone connection to “my Audi “application..
  It seems not very generous to pay €20 for very poor comparison to World leading SUV’s 
   Thank you very much, your Entusiates Vladimir Varhol | This is the only application in my iPhone which requires typing username and password after every turning on/off of the iPhone. Imagine doing this for every application in iPhone! It is absurd and make this app useless- I am not going to do this every day | Disappointed with the application for Audi RS7 last gen. actually, it can't do much... the other car companies are better with technology... where is the technical advance?????? | It takes longer to the car to react | The doesn’t always function as it should. The shop is impossible to use, failing even the most basic functions. Hot line availability is very limited. Very poor user experience. | Hello...aplication is very poor compare to e.g. Skoda app. I have a lot ideas how to improve. Feel free to ask me 😉. | Ještě horší app než u Škody. Mám zaregistrovaný mail a nejde se přihlásit. Pořád to píše nějakou chybu. Prostě za mne  šmejd! | The problem with this app is that it barely connects to my car. 
In half of the cases it doesnt even gets the latest status of the car or the car is not able to receive any command. Well, there is just one real function, the heating.
If the connection is successful, it always takes good 20 or 30 seconds to get ready. That means 20 seconds of waiting to switch the heating on. 20 seconds if you are lucky. In other cases I give up after one minute and try again. You dont really want to spend these minutes in the rush mornings.  
In unsuccessful cases it says “unknown error” or “not connected to the internet” (I am) or it just tries to connect to the car or do the task for a very long time. 
I like my brand new A6 but this app frustrates me so much. Such a disappointment!
After you fix this, also please add some more functions and I dont really mean a shop for bikes and scooters. | Velmi často se mi stává, že SW vykazuje “neznámou”chybu, auto nenačte, dálkově neodemkne atd. | Malé zlepšení přehlednosti by pomohlo. Také pod menu výbava by mohlo být více položek než jen VIN a barva vozidla . Zkratka by aplikace měla být více intuitivní .

Funguje dobře , ale mohla by být rychlejší při komunikaci s vozem. Nastavování nezávislého topení  pro 1 čas je nedostatečné . Doplnil bych spotřebu pro historické jízdy . | Nic moc apka do mob ! | The connection with my car is horrible via this app. The car availability is fifty fifty that car will not be reached. I am sad from this quality. | Audi should have better app than this. Škoda has way better app than audi. | The application looks nice and it’s simple to use. It would be great to include more features in! It’s very basic at this point! I was surprised when dealer offered me Bluetooth plug combined with other application to track trip data… This doesn’t feel right for a premium car manufactured in 2023. Please consider extending features of this application to not require a plug. | In general, the app doesn’t have much features, I’d expect much more (driving data, trips,…), especially from a premium brand.

All the car-related actions (lock, heating, …) take too long process.

As for the bugs, one of the latest is: supposedly, I cannot open a detail of a news (which is not in my language) due to no car in the app (of course it’s there). | Nefunguje odeslani  cile do auta do navigace | Hrozne, pomale, malo funkci, opravdova ostuda, meli by se ucit od Muska. | I’m not able to select another language in the app. The language is set depending on your residence country but it’s confusing if you are not native speaker. | Hey Audi, I think you can imagine that there are a lot of foreigners living in Czechia don't know Czech! Please give a choise of language in the app🙏🏼 Even only English will be perfect. | I enjoy the app, but will welcome more statistics about my routes. 
Great will be some alerts like when the car stays on one place for longer time and is not locked, or windows are opened.

I don’t know why after last but one update was disabled the possibility to run frequent actions directly by pushing on the icon of the app | Very slow app with many bugs like can’t load data etc. bad user experience:( | It just says that it is not possible to update vehicle status (eTron 2019).

Can’t view the baterry info, can’t start A/C, can’t do anything.

Can’t understand, why even basic test cannot be performed before the app goes live. | V nové verzi 4.13.0 přestala fungovat veškerá komunikace s vozidlem Q4. Aplikace hlásí, že nemůže spojit se serverem. Nepomohla ani reinstalace. Předchozí verze fungovala. | App 90% off time doesn’t work, even worse with each update. Now about one year of Q4 Etron owning I really hate Audi! What the support do?! | Cíle odeslané z aplikace se ve vozidle nezobrazují. | Doesn't Wok | Update of the data in the app takes ages and nit accurate (i still got low oil warning no matter that it is ok). But you cant see nothing more than mileage and % of fuel in the tank. I would expect something like Audi connect plug and play - history of drives, fuel economy, effectiveness etc.. This is not “vorsprung durch technika”… | Aplikace dobrá, bohužel nelze dokupovat výbavu přes My Audi. | Repeatedly falling down, disconnecting and connecting again. Unreliable. | First, the app can’t do too many things on my Audi A3 2020. I can only check whether my car is locked and how much fuel I have.

When I try to send a location to the car’s navigation, it takes eternity to actually fetch it in the car. I send it on my way to the car and receive it after like 10 Km of drive. Sometimes I receive it the next day… stupidest thing to send it over some Audi servers, when it can be sent via Bluetooth. But I know you want know everything about your customers.

Second thing is the annoying launch whenever I sit in the car. Can’t turn it off anywhere.. Just searching something on my phone and that damn app pops up in my face. Never seen that BS in any other app.

The only useful thing that keeps me from uninstalling is that I can check whether I locked my car if I’m not sure. Otherwise completely useless in my A3. You should start thinking about the users, not just yourself how to collect information about us. | Šíleně pomalé načítání, minimum užitečných funkcí, design .. | Proč firma jako AUDI neumí udělat funkční Aplikaci? Auta za milióny a apka k ničemu. Věčně nefunkční. | Aplikace je úplně k ničemu. Inzerované funkce vzdáleného ovládání vůbec nefungují ani po dvou letech update aplikace. Dnes se nedá přihlásit na servery myAudi, jak z aplikace tak už i z webu. Za rok to zase zkusím. Pokud bych viděl něco opravdu špatného na audi, tak je to tato aplikace a přístup audi to nějak řešit. | The app it self doesn’t show all functions as they are shown on the web page of my Audi…!!! Why??? Hey Audi wake up and look at Mercedes or BMW!!!!  I own and S7 Audi 2017… | Cannot register my car even after multiple discussions with support. | Unfortunately, this application is not good.
I don't understand if Audi have not the money to pay good programmers, but this app was done by a bunch of amateurs from school.
To clarify the problem, I will also write the car I have - the Audi Q7 E-tron
1) communication of the application with the car sometimes works, sometimes not. I didn't figure out where the problem was.
2) when I want to turn on the independent heating, the application sometimes responds for more than 1 minute, but sometimes it starts and sometimes it doesn't. I just point out that there is a SIM with enought data lmit in the car and the car is usually fully charged.
3) Unlocking / locking the car takes at least 10 seconds.
4) Restoring the condition of the car in App takes at least 10 seconds, sometimes 50 seconds!
 
I don't understand why such a company like Audi is not able to make an application that works without problems.

Hope it will be better in next version... | my car is very often unavailable, the data cannot be loaded and therefore, for example, independent heating cannot be switched on in winter. you can't mean that | Čím dal horší. | It seems that Audi is trying to make this app even worse with every new release. Huge connectivity issues. Nothing work as expected. I would like to give you minus one star but it is not possible unfortunately. | Často nefunguje nebo velká prodleva | This app is just "A Try" to be Smart. Good start for old fashioned car maker but poor for 21st century. No charging stats. Option to create trip tracking means to fill all by hand like in excel without using data from the car. Complicates interface. I like Audi, so hoping to make progress in IT soon. Two stars for e-tron itself :-)). | Tato aplikace je uplne k nicemu. Nic vlastne neumi a ani nenabizi, tahle appka ani v realu neodpovida screen-shotu v ramci teto nabidky v app storu. Jedine co vam to ukaze je, jak vase auto vypada na dokonale fotce. Jsem zklamany z celeho audi stylu ... | Audi A6 BJ 2020, in der App keine Anzeige von Füllstand, Fahrzeugzustand, u.ä.. | Shame. Shame. Shame. Somebody from Audi importer made a huge fail. Skoda or Volkswagen are online on app. Buying a Q7 was a obvious mistake. The seller even do not warn your that the Audi has not license for tele-services in CZE. I am going to sell it very quickly. The rumors says the services will be online in 2nd half of 2020 but it might happen that online sevices might be only for new models... | Hi guys. I could not event register in the app. This is a shame. | Well, Audi is a fine car maker, but that is probably all for now. 21st century is something they apparently try to ignore, because their approach towards ensuring reliability of this app may not be described by words admissible to these reviews. But this
might be too harsh rating for the app itself, since the problems are rather on the IT infrastructure of “connected” services. Is it normal that servers often crash just before weekend, so that comfortably resting Audi IT crowd does not make any remedy until Monday? Still glad that car goes without being connected to internet, but nothing more - navigation targets, remote control etc. is just nonexistent... would anybody use e-mail client if emails just stopped regularly  going in and out for two days? 
Two stars for the cars. | Koupil jsem AUDI A6 allroad v DRESDEN , ale ani to není záruka funkční aplikace. Absolutně se do ni nedá přihlásit a komunikace s autem je takřka nemožná . | Sorry guys, it’s 2019.. I paid almost 3 mil for Q8 and App myAudi is one of biggest disappointment in my life. The better aplication get owner of Skoda Kodiac. | Tak jak byla špatná aplikace audi connect tak ještě horší je myAudi. Důvod je to, ze z aplikace zmizelo i to málo co bylo v audi connect. I přes to ze v náhledu aplikace je vidět možnost ovládání auta tak to ve skutečnosti v ČR nefunguje což je u auta z roku 2017 za bezmála 3mil. velmi smutné. Pokud chcete aby tyto funkce fungovali tak si nekupujte Audi v ČR.

title: FREENOW
description:
FREENOW is Europe's largest multimobility app, available in 9 European countries. Book black cabs, Rides (private hire vehicles), taxis, eScooters and eBikes all directly through the app. You are in control to choose how you roll, book easily, pay in-app quickly and complete your trip safely!

HOW IT WORKS - RIDE-HAILING
1. Enter your destination
2. Book a car or a cab near you
3. Track your driver's arrival
4. Pay easily through the app

HOW IT WORKS - ESCOOTER & EBIKE
1. Switch to the 2-wheels tab
2. Find a eScooter or eBike nearby
3. Unlock the eScooter or eBike by scanning the QR code or by selecting it directly on the map
4. Go to your destination and pay easily through the app


FEATURES
- The only ride-hailing app where you can choose an electric Black Cab, Eco Taxi or Private Ride every time you take a trip! Same great service, lower environmental impact.
- You can choose a black cab or a taxi with a partition screen to allow for social distancing. 
- Highest quality drivers, fully licensed with all Ride drivers met and onboarded face-to-face
- Convenient prebook feature available up to 4 days in advance making planning ahead that bit easier.
- All black cabs and wheelchair accessible taxi options are available for those requiring extra assistance.
- All drivers are reminded to sanitize their vehicle after every trip. 


STREAMLINE YOUR BUSINESS TRAVEL
Automatically collect your receipt via email after each trip when you pay with the app, or skip manual expense reportings altogether by using a FREENOW for business account.

EASY AIRPORT TRANSFER
Book last minute or up to 4 days before your flight. Need a pickup? No problem, just collect your luggage, order your vehicle of choice through the app and follow the in-app walking directions to the FREENOW pickup point within your terminal.

FREENOW is available for both business and holiday travel at Europe's largest airports, including Heathrow, London City, Gatwick, Stansted, Dublin, Frankfurt, Madrid-Barajas, Barcelona El-Prat, Munich, Rome Fiumicino, Manchester, Düsseldorf, Vienna Schwechat, Milano Malpensa, Berlin, Paris Charles de Gaulle, Nice Côte d'Azur and Malaga.

BOOK THE RIGHT VEHICLE FOR YOU
UK:
Black cab: Iconic British taxi with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
EV black cab: Electric black cab with high-quality knowledgeable drivers 
Ride: Private hire vehicles with professional drivers and the lowest fixed prices in London
EV Ride: London’s largest electric fleet of PHVs 
eScooter: Book an eScooter directly in the app in London 

Ireland:
Taxi: Book a taxi with a fully licenced driver with Ireland’s shortest waiting times
Taxi + Screen: Taxi with a partition screen offering you a more comfortable way to travel
Taxi XL: Taxi with more than 4 seats
Accessible Taxi: wheelchair accessible for those requiring extra assistance 
Eco Taxi: Ireland’s largest electric and hybrid taxi fleet offering you a greener way to travel

TRAVEL ALL OVER EUROPE
The FREENOW  service is available across 10 countries in over 100 European cities.

SUPPORT
If you have any questions, please visit the help & contact section of the app (via your profile) to see our most frequently asked questions.
releaseNotes:
Make sure to update your FREENOW app. The most recent version ensures that you have the fastest and most reliable service yet.

What’s changed?

- Bug fixes and improvements

Enjoying the app? Leave us a review.

title: Jízdní řády - CG Transit
description:
Cestujete pomocí hromadné dopravy a potřebujete se rychle a snadno dostat do cíle? Aplikace CG Transit umožňuje vyhledávání dopravních spojení v jízdních řádech České republiky, na Slovensku a více než 20 městech v USA a Kanadě bez nutnosti připojení k internetu.
Kromě toho můžete vyhledávat trasy linek, zastávky a vše si můžete zobrazit na mapě.

Funkce:
• rychlé offline vyhledávání dopravních spojení (není potřeba připojení k internetu), možnost zobrazení detailu spojení a spojů včetně poznámek, trasy na mapě atd.
• oblíbená spojení a historie hledání
• vyhledávání spojení pomocí mapy s možností porovnávání výsledků přímo na mapě
• vyhledávání tras linek a spojů
• vyhledávání zastávek
• další doplňkové funkce jako možnost uložení spojení do kalendáře nebo jeho odeslaní pomocí SMS, SMS jízdenky apod.

CG Transit umožňuje v tuto chvíli vyhledání spojení v následujících jízdních řádech:
• vlakové jízdní řády České a Slovenské republiky, Německa, Rakouska, Polska, Beneluxu, Španělska, Portugalska, Itálie, Švýcarska, Francie, Maďarska a severských a balkánských zemí
• autobusy ČR a SR včetně dálkových a mezinárodních linek
• MHD asi 80 měst v ČR a asi 50 v SR
• MHD asi 20 měst v USA a Kanadě

Data poskytuje společnost CHAPS spol. s r.o., Inprop s.r.o. a jednotliví dopravci v USA a Kanadě

CENA:

Samotná aplikace je k dispozici ke stažení zdarma. Za datové soubory jízdních řádů se platí roční licenční poplatek. Jízdní řády je možné nakupovat buď jednotlivě nebo je možné zakoupit zvýhodněné balíčky pro Českou a Slovenskou republiku a evropské vlaky. Aktuální ceník naleznete na našich stránkách nebo přímo v aplikaci.

AKCE - noví uživatelé mají měsíc na vyzkoušení všech jízdních řádů zdarma

*** Pokud máte s aplikací problém, napište nám prosím na email ios@cgtransit.com - pokud napíšete problém do hodnocení aplikace, nemůžeme ho vyřešit. Díky. ***
releaseNotes:
• Drobné úpravy a opravy

Novinky ve verzi 5.0.0:
• Tmavý režim aplikace - téma se přepíná podle systému, případně je možné si v nastavení aplikace vybrat.
• Doporučené nástupy do metra - zobrazení vozů, kam je nejlepší nastoupit.
• Textový popis přestupů - zobrazení textového popisu, jak přestoupit (prozatím u některých zastávek v Praze).
• Zobrazení aktuální pozice na mapě společně s orientací zařízení a měřítko mapy.
• Možnost přepnout jazyk aplikace v nastavení.
• Další drobná vylepšení a opravy

title: Mercedes me Service
description:
THE MERCEDES ME SERVICE APP AT A GLANCE

YOUR SERVICE STATUS
Your calendar is always pretty tight? No worries, with the Mercedes me Assistant app you always know when your maintenance or annual inspection is due and receive timely reminders about it. 

BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENTS
Whether it’s time for your inspection or you want to change your tires: Mercedes me Assistant provides you with a direct link to your Mercedes-Benz dealership to book your appointments in just a few taps. 

FIND THE DEALERSHIP FOR YOU
Easily find authorised Mercedes-Benz dealerships near you. Not sure whether a dealership can service your car? Mercedes me Assistant only shows dealerships fit for you and your car.

PERSONALISED OFFERS
Want your Mercedes-Benz in good hands for maintenance? Get access to service offers that are specially tailored to the needs of your car (requires Mercedes me connect services), and book them right at your preferred service dealer.

LEARN MORE ABOUT YOUR CAR
Not sure how to pair your smartphone with your new car? Do you want to do some small repairs by yourself? Access curated videos and articles to help you get the most out of your Mercedes-Benz.

ALWAYS WELL INFORMED
Ever left wondering what a warning lamp meant? No need to search for the manual. Mercedes me Assistant shows you active warning lamps (requires Mercedes me connect services) and gives you in-depth information about them and what to do next.

Please note: 
The Mercedes me connect services only work with Mercedes-Benz vehicles equipped with the Mercedes me connect communication module. The range of functions depends on the respective vehicle equipment and your booked services. Your Mercedes-Benz partner will be happy to advise you. An active, free Mercedes me account is required for use. The functions may be temporarily restricted due to insufficient data transmission bandwidth. Continuous use of the GPS function in the background can reduce battery life.
releaseNotes:
We are continuously working on improving the Mercedes me Service app. For this reason, there are regular app updates. This update includes the following changes:
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements
- Damage report
reviews:
Nejlepší aplikace | Dobrý den, 

bohužel není možné zvolit servisní partnera jinde než v České Republice, čekal bych že v dnešní době by to mělo být možné. | Super funguje... | Dobrý den,s aplikaci jsem spokojen ale mám velký problém s tím že si nemohu zvolit servis v zahraničí,(Německo ) kam obvykle jezdím jelikož to mám blíže.Přibude tato možnost v nějaké další aktualizaci ?

title: FordPass™
description:
FordPass offers the ability to manage your vehicle right from your phone:

•	Send convenient remote commands – Lock, unlock, and start your vehicle using complimentary remote vehicle controls (1) – when equipped with FordPass® Connect (2)
•	Electric vehicle ownership support – Monitor charging progress and use Departure Times to pre-condition your battery and cabin (3) 
•	FordPass feature availability varies by vehicle and country. Images shown for illustrative purposes only


(1) Remote lock/unlock requires power door locks. Remote starting requires automatic transmission.
(2) FordPass Connect (optional on select vehicles), the FordPass App and complimentary Connected Service are required for remote features (see FordPass Terms for details). Connected service and features depend on compatible network availability. Evolving technology/cellular networks/vehicle capability may limit functionality and prevent operation of connected features. Connected service excludes Wi-Fi hotspot.
(3) Effectiveness of cabin conditioning may be reduced by extreme outside temperatures.
releaseNotes: • This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes
reviews:
Slabé pokryti od Vodafonu

Is this feature still available? Thank you. | Po aktualizaci mne aplikace odhlásila a nepamatuje si heslo. Takže ji budu moci zase používat až se za pár dnů vrátím domů, kde mám heslo uložené. To vás bude bavit! Prosím, milý Forde, zkuste tu aplikaci svěřit někomu, kdo tomu opravdu rozumí. Navíc z ní jen postupně odebíráte zajímavé funkce, které ještě nedávno uměla. Čím dál horší, bohužel. | Alarm function was disabled. The app is loosing more functions that it had before.

Would be nice to set up what will be switched on after remote startup | As an owner of the Ford car I'd greatly appreciate if access through app to my vehicle would be more secure by implementing MFA and biometrics. | Works fine, but seems like a temporary product. I’m missing trip/fuel consumption data and possibly other OBD-like diagnostics. | již 14 dni čekam na aktivaci

title: Marriott Bonvoy
description:
Book direct and enjoy exclusive offers with Marriott Bonvoy® to take the stress out of travel and find the best hotel deals.  

Search hotels, resorts, and luxury destinations across 8,000+ hotels, 130+ countries, and over 30 brands. Join for free and earn rewards when you book with Marriott Bonvoy.  

Unlock extraordinary hotel deals, flexible trip planning, and travel ideas with the Marriott Bonvoy app! 

BEST RATE GUARANTEE: 
There are few guarantees in life. But our Best Rate Guarantee is one of the best. It ensures you’ll always get the best rate when booking directly with Marriott. 

SEARCH HOTELS, BOOK STAYS, AND EARN REWARDS: 
Search hotels and book your travel all within the app. Earn and redeem points for your stays booked directly with Marriott and reward yourself with a vacation. 

FLEXIBLE CANCELLATIONS: 
Need a last-minute hotel change? That’s why we offer flexible cancellation options to reassure you when booking your next stay with us. Use the app to adjust travel plans with ease. 

CHECK-IN TO YOUR HOTEL ON-THE-GO: 
Check-in to your hotel from anywhere with Mobile Check-in. Let us know when you will arrive, and you'll get a notification when your room is ready. 

MANAGE YOUR MARRIOTT BONVOY ACCOUNT: 
Check your point balance, view your stay history, folio, and more. 

ENJOY EXCLUSIVE MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL OFFERS: 
・Get rewarded with instant benefits and exclusive perks for Marriott Bonvoy members. 
・Marriott Bonvoy also offers free Wi-Fi for Bonvoy members at most hotels. 
・Not a member yet? Download the app and join for free. 

ORDER FOOD AND DRINKS AHEAD OF TIME: 
Order ahead while you’re out exploring. Browse and order food and drinks from your hotel’s menu at participating properties, and it will be ready when you return. 

CONTACTLESS CHECK-IN WITH ACCESS VIA MOBILE HOTEL KEY: 
・Never worry about losing your key card again. Use your mobile device to open your hotel room and easily access any hotel amenity, like the parking garage, fitness center lounge, and pool. 
・With Mobile Key you can get to your room faster. Once opted in, we’ll send you a notification to your phone or Apple Watch when your room is ready. 

CONVENIENT WAYS TO CHAT DURING YOUR STAY: 
・Mobile Chat lets you talk directly to your hotel. Available just before, during, and even after your stay, ask the front desk for local recommendations, request amenities, and more while on-the-go. 
・Need something? Mobile Requests give you a list of amenities to choose from to customize your stay, or even ask for something you forgot, like a comb or toothpaste. 

MARRIOTT BONVOY HOTEL BRANDS: 
Use the Marriott Bonvoy app to book hotel stays with any of our 30+ brands, including AC Hotels by Marriott®, Aloft® Hotels, Autograph Collection® Hotels, Bulgari®, City Express, Courtyard®, Delta Hotels®, Design Hotels™, EDITION®, Element®, Fairfield Inn & Suites®, Four Points® by Sheraton, Gaylord Hotels®, JW Marriott®, Le Méridien®, Moxy® Hotels, Marriott Executive Apartments®, Marriott Hotels®, Marriott Vacation Club®, Protea Hotels®, Renaissance® Hotels, Residence Inn®, Sheraton®, SpringHill Suites®, St. Regis®, The Luxury Collection®, The Ritz-Carlton®, TownePlace Suites®, Tribute Portfolio®, W® Hotels and Westin® Hotels & Resorts.
releaseNotes:
- Discover the ideal room for your stay more easily with our refined filter buttons design. Easily narrow down your options by room type or rate type.
- Performance improvements and bug fixes.

We are constantly improving our app to offer you a frictionless trip planning and travel experience. Thank you for trusting the Marriott Bonvoy® App for your travel!

title: Royal Cooking: Kitchen Madness
description:
Enjoy cooking mania and fever, get ready to make food and open a restaurant or don't forget to work in a crazy kitchen! Are you ready for the madness of this crazy kitchen?

Do you love time management games? Or are you looking for a different food gameplay?
If so, this crazy kitchen is totally for you. You can be a creator of your own restaurant story and open a family style cafe or diner. Immerse yourself into the mania and fever of making food!

This restaurant game teaches you to make food & cook delicious burgers, good and great pizza and other popular street foods. Join this crazy kitchen with time management gameplay and simulation fun.

The Royal Cooking game is one of the most interesting restaurant games. Experience the fun of time management!

 FEATURES:
 - Enjoy gameplay, classic casual and time management games.
- Unlock advanced diaries, make food and become a star chef with mania and fever.
- Hundreds of fun levels: you need to cook good and great pizza, burgers, and sweet baked goods.
- Get combo streaks to earn big rewards.
- Upgrade your crazy kitchen equipment to become the star chef of mania and fever.
- Use powerful boosters to have more fun!

You can find the answers to many questions by contacting our in-game support team. The FAQ is available here: 
https://matryoshka.helpshift.com/hc/en/8-cookinglive/

Reach out to us regarding any questions or suggestions you have. We read all the messages!

Subscribe to our social media pages to stay up to date on the latest news and to get useful tips for the game: 
https://www.facebook.com/matryoshkagamescom

Sincerely, the Matryoshka Games team
releaseNotes:
New Culinary Moves!
- We've introduced new animations to make every action in the kitchen look even smoother! Time to whip, chop, and cook like a real chef!
Smoother Than Ever!
- Some glitches have been fixed and overall game performance has been improved.

title: Pulse for Booking.com partners
description:
Why you’ll love Pulse 
Our new property partner app lets you keep Booking.com in your pocket. Manage your property easier and faster – plus keep your guests happy anywhere, anytime.

Whats going on today?
-Stay up-to-date on today’s arrivals, departures, new bookings, cancellations, modifications, and reviews

Interact with your guests in a few taps
- Stay in touch via live chat between you and guests
- Use pre-translated templates to quickly reply to frequent requests

Quickly view at a glance…
- Your performance, updated daily
- Your reservations calendar for previous or upcoming activity
- Reservation details including the number of guests, rooms, room types and nights
- Total rate and breakdown per night
- Applicable cancellation policies

Download our app now

title: BVG Tickets: Train, Bus & Tram
description:
BVG Tickets is the official ticket-purchasing app for public transport in Berlin! 


With BVG Tickets you can buy tickets for train, subway, tram, and bus from the official source and travel anywhere in Berlin. Purchase and download tickets straight to the app and enjoy your trip.


By the way: You can now order the new Deutschlandticket via the BVG website or in our customer centres. It costs €49 per month and is available as a personal season ticket without transferability. With the ticket, you can use the entire public transport system, including regional trains, throughout Germany. It is not possible to take other people, or bicycles with you on this ticket.


We will provide you with the ticket as a mobile phone ticket or as an electronic FahrCard in good time before the nationwide launch. Do you already have a BVG subscription? Great, you don't have to do anything at the moment, because we'll get in touch with you.


Travel anywhere with your BVG ticket, whether you are a Berlin local or a visiting tourist. Always as fast and as simple as possible!


So how does it work?


• Download the BVG Tickets app to your device 
• Connect your payment information 
• Select your ticket type
• Purchase the ticket 
• Download straight to your device and start your journey


BVG Tickets offers a ticket purchasing service only and does not contain any other kind of travel information. If you need further travel and transport connection information then please download our BVG Fahrinfo app. 


Avoid waiting for the ticket machine in busy train and metro stations by connecting the BVG Tickets app with payment methods such as Amazon Pay, Apple Pay, credit card, PayPal, prepaid, SEPA direct debit, or express purchase (registration and payment with Apple Pay, PayPal). 


In our app you can purchase tickets covering any of the following tariff zones: 


• Berlin AB
• Berlin BC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)
• Berlin ABC (C area includes, for example, Potsdam and Berlin Airport BER)


All you need to do to get your next train, subway, tram or bus ticket straight to your phone is to register by using your email address, password, first and last name...that’s it. You’re good to go as soon as you purchase your ticket with the app. 


Do you already have a BVG account? Great, you don’t need to register again. You can use your current account information to log in and purchase tickets.


BVG Tickets can offer you any kind of ticket for traveling in Berlin. We have something for everybody whether you have lived here for 20 years or are only visiting for 2 days! 


With the BVG Tickets app, you can purchase any type of ticket for travel in Berlin, whether you are on your train journey to work or on the subway home. 


Our ticket app offers: 


• Monthly pass 
• 7-day card
• Monthly ticket trainee (AB)
• Berlin Ticket S (AB)
• 4-trip card
• 24-hour-ticket
• Single ticket
• Short haul
• Connection ticket
• Tourist tickets
• Bicycle ticket


We’ve got you covered for any type of ticket you need in Berlin whether you’re taking the train to Schöneberg, taking the subway in Kreuzberg, getting the bus in Neukölln or riding the tram in Prenzlauer Berg. Just purchase any of these tickets to suit your needs and away you go


We guarantee that buying your Berlin transport tickets through the app will save you time on any purchase. Don’t wait around in line at the service desk or ticket machine ever again. With the BVG Tickets app, your transport links throughout Berlin just got a whole lot easier and faster! 


We welcome your feedback or suggestions. If we can do anything to help, you can contact us at appsupport@bvg.de and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.


Accessibility disclaimer for the BVG Tickets app:
https://www.bvg.de/en/subscriptions-and-tickets/all-apps/ticket-app/accessibility-disclaimer

title: HoppyGo
description:
Unlimited freedom of movement for everyone!
 
Do you want to head out for an adventurous weekend in a new crossover? Do you need a van to move your furniture? Or are you in dire straits because your car is being serviced? With HoppyGo car sharing, you can easily rent from more than 1 500 cars directly from the owners. Find the perfect vehicle for any occasion with over 300 car types in more than 240 cities across the Czech Republic. Get the key from your first rental within 24 hours since the sign up. 

At the same time, if your own car is parked in the lot far too often, you can join hundreds of car owners and start earning money by renting it to the others. HoppyGo will be your middleman. 

Is car the only missing piece in your plans?
1)	Create an account 
Signing up, filling in your profile and uploading necessary documents takes only a couple of minutes of your time. The approval process then takes less than 24 hours.

2)	Choose your car
Pick whichever car fits your need, choose the time of your rental and select your pickup location. All you have to do now is to wait for the approval from the owner. We recommend requesting multiple cars in case of some owners being busy. Finally, payment for the rental happens through app. You pay only for the car that has approved your rental first.

3)	Pick up your car or have it delivered to your doorstep
Communicate with the car owner via the HoppyGo app. Then meet the owner, go through the handover procedure and hit the road. You don’t have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.


Is your car sitting in the parking lot unused?
1)	Create an account within minutes
Becoming a part of the community of HoppyGo owners could not be easier. Then add your car, upload car documents and complete the car profile section.

2)	Fill in the rental details
Set the price for which you will rent your car and use our calendar to choose the times when your car is available. 

3)	Rent your car
Communicate with a driver beforehand and upload photos while handing the keys over for insurance purposes. You don’t have to worry, all rentals are insured to cover both drivers and owners.

4)	Collect the money 
The money arrives to your bank account in less than a week after the rental is finished.

Follow HoppyGo on
Facebook via https://www.facebook.com/HoppyGoCZ 
Instagram via https://www.instagram.com/hoppygo.cz/

Have a question?
Try our blog https://blog.hoppygo.com/ or give us a call at +420 220 311 769

Opening hours update

If you take it on Wednesday 14:00PM and return it Thursday 11AM you will pay for 2 days despite the fact you used the car for less than 24 hours. | Chtěl jsem půjčit na svatbu kabriolet a obrátil jsem se na servis HoppyGo. To byla chyba. Našel jsem tam auto, “krásný” Chrysler Le Baron. Na fotkách naprosto krasavec, bílý, lesklý, úplně v perfektním stavu. Zaplatil jsem pronájem a v klidu čekal na den vyzvednutí, představoval jak krásné budeme v tom vypadat - máme skoro klasické auto, v hezkým stavu. Realita mě docela překvapila. Na autě chyběly kousky laku, obrovské žluté skvrny. Byl jsem v šoku a prosto nevěděl co dělat. Po krátkém hovoru z majitelem bylo řešeno rezervaci zrušit a bylo mě řečeno že peníze pošlou na účet za 3 dny, a celou částku za pronájem. Za šest dnů, žádné peníze ne přišly, a po telefonickém hovoru zjistilo se že bude vráceno pouze 50% z částky, protože “auto je technicky v dobrém stavu, a musíte počítat ze je starší”. Ve kterém technickém stavu to je - nevím, ale kosmetický stav je opravdu ošklivý, a nebylo uvedeno v inzerátu, a nebyly tam fotky těch defektů. Do konce už prošlo 8 dnů, a žádné peníze na účet se nevrátily, manažery aplikace neustále chrání majitele vozu, i s tím že žádná prohlídka předem nedostupná. Z tohoto vyplývají že zákazníky vůbec nejsou chráněné před podvodem ze strany majitelů vozu a nedostupné bezpečné používání servisu pro zákazníky. Servis nedoporučuji, nemáte žádné práva jako zákazník. | It’s a great app, easy for all parties, all nice, needs few improvements in the filters, but otherwise love it! | Doesn't open at the start!!! | Bezvadné auto. Ma svižný motor a je v perfektním stavu. | Different prices before and after registration… I’m not actually sure if that it is legal | Guys be careful of this service they used my bank card information without my authorization for withdrawing money above the agreed rental fees, and when I get back to them they mentioned that it is for cleaning and when I explained to them that this is a fraud from the car owner because he got the car in good status they didn’t listen to me so please be careful about your bank account information. | Miluju tuhle aplikaci:D vydelava mi, diky ni se nemusim zbavovat auta a jeste mi vydela na pojistku:D jsem prekvapena ze se vubec nekdo ozyva kdyz nebydlim v krajskem meste :D | Easy and best in Czech Republic. I love Volvo XC60 from Prague 5, Revnicka. 🤍 | Top | fantastic practical fast and perfect offer Recommend | Very good experience, even late arrival wasn't any issue | Už více jak půl roku mi nefunguje aplikace iP12. A nejedná se o individuální problém. Problém se už tu v komentářích objevil několikrát. Hold dobrá myšlenka, ale nedostatečný development. | Super domluva, bez problemu, auto krásné a ciste | A great selection of vehicles at great prices! | Široký výběr a nízké ceny - ideální služba pro ty, kteří si chtějí levně půjčit auto a ještě podpořit soukromé majitele. | This service is simply great, of course together with the app! | Děkuji a doporučuji | The app is nice and all, it works pretty well. But up to 7 working days to return the deposit? That must be a joke | Půjčení 24 hodin je pro aplikaci 2 dny | Moci využít již vyrobená a někým pořízená auta, čerpat z nich užitek, majiteli tak pomoct splácet cenu auta, které by jinak stálo na dvorku, a ještě mít k dispozici flexibilitu, které konkuruje jen volný carsharing, a neuvěřitelně široký výběr, to si troufnu označit za revoluční projekt. Aspoň v našich končinách.

Za mnohých okolností vás nicméně volný carsharing vyjde paradoxně levněji, protože zde není v ceně palivo, jak bývá zvykem. Pokud ale toužíte po jiném autě, nebo chcete být v osobním kontaktu s majitelem, kterého navíc všichni mohou otevřeně revenzovat (stejně jako majitelé řidiče), pak je toto perfektní rozšíření portfolia sdílené mobility.

Ocenil bych v aplikaci filtraci také podle technických specifikací vozidla (např. výkonu, rozměrů…) a přidání dalších údajů (provozní hmotnost, ne jen maximální, již zmíněné rozměry, točivý moment, možnost pro majitele vypsat spotřebu pro různé situace). Společně s ne vždy konkurenceschopnou cenovkou (holt mají hlavní slovo majitelé a je to dobře) tedy velmi symbolicky bez poslední hvězdy. | They have a great costumer service. As I needed fast approval of my profile and had an issue due to the quality of my uploaded documents, I reached out to them and a nice employee names Tereza handled my case fast, easy and with a very friendly attitude! | Aplikace mi na iP12 již půl roku nejede ... | I love the app and the idea. I am renting my car through the platform and could not be more happy. They have awesome customer service that replies within minutes and also picks up phone immediatelly (even on weekends). The only thing I am missing is loading prices for each days. I hope it will change and I will be able to create more dynamic pricing policy. | Use my code RC3Bi1oK

title: NS Travel Planner
description:
About the NS app
The free NS app is your ideal travelling companion. It lets you plan your entire journey to any address in the Netherlands and keep up to date with the latest travel information and any disruptions as you go. You can also easily check where you can hire a public transport bicycle or shared car in your area, or quickly find the nearest P+R if you are travelling partly by car. See how crowded it is on the train and have your tickets quickly on hand. Everything to help you get going by whatever transport suits you best today.

Why traveling with the NS app
+ Best app in the Public Transport category
+ over 2 million users
+ Quick, safe and easy payment
+ The “Nearby me” feature lets you see exactly which forms of transport are available in the neighbourhood, from train, bus, tram and metro to public transport bicycles and shared cars. All in a single overview. So it’s the easy way to plan your entire door-to-door journey.
+ Arrange it all easily in Mijn NS. You can check your balance, access your journey information, simply change your travel class and view and change your season tickets.

Feedback
Every journey starts with the NS app. That’s why we’re always improving the app with new functions that will help you with your journey even more. If you have any questions, tips or other feedback, let us know in the app. That will let us make the app experience even better!
releaseNotes:
Every journey starts in the NS app. That is why we keep improving the app with larger and smaller changes that help you on your way even more.

If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know in the app.

Enjoy your trip!
reviews: No way to buy bus or tram tickets | It often cannot read the ticket uploaded on mobile phone.

title: ESTA Mobile
description:
The Electronic System for Travel Authorization (ESTA) app from U.S. Customs and Border Protection allows Nationals of Visa Waiver Program (VWP) countries to apply and pay for a travel authorization without a visa. The ESTA app is a mobile version of the ESTA application process and information that can also be found on the ESTA website at https://esta.cbp.dhs.gov. 

The ESTA app currently has two features available: Apply for New Individual Application and Search for Existing Application.
•	The “GET STARTED” feature allows travelers to create a new ESTA application, pay for the ESTA and submit the application to be processed by the system to determine if they are eligible to travel to the United States under the Visa Waiver Program without a visa. The system will provide the traveler with an automated response.
•	The “FIND IT” feature allows travelers to check the status of their existing ESTA application..
CBP recommends that you apply for ESTA at the time you book your travel, but no less than 72 hours prior to boarding.
releaseNotes: Fix to address scanning issue with some recently issued passports
reviews: Missing support for Apple Pay and ESTA in Wallet would by nice. | You must log in with your esta application nr. And your passport nr and details time to time. | Scanning of a passport doesn’t work

title: Yandex Go: Taxi Food Delivery
description:
Yandex Go is an app to request rides, order food from restaurants or send items across town. Request a ride or delivery with just a tap and track your driver in real time. Never waste time again with another call center or parking problem.

• AFFORDABLE FARES
Choose a service class for any occasion. Ride Economy for everyday errands, treat yourself to Comfort and Comfort+ to relax in a more spacious car, or go with Business when every detail counts. Use Delivery to ship items of any size by car. Fares and available service classes vary by location, but we always show the exact price (or a fair estimate) before you request a ride.

• PAY BY CARD OR CASH
You can pay for rides automatically if you add your card in the app, but drivers also accept cash. Payment method availability may vary depending on location.

• A SMART APP THAT SAVES YOU TIME
Yandex Go uses smart algorithms built on live traffic data to connect riders with drivers who can reach them fastest. Depending on your location, the app will also suggest alternative pickup points to help lower your fare.

• RIDES WITH MULTIPLE STOPS
Request a ride with multiple destinations, like if you’re dropping your kids off at school, picking up a friend on the way, or need to run a quick errand. Yandex Go maps all your stops on one route and calculates the fare for the entire trip upfront.

• CHILD SAFETY SEATS
Choose the Kids service class to ride safely with your child in a safety or booster seat.

• DELIVERY
It's just like requesting a ride: enter your address in the app, and a courier delivers your item. Both sender and recipient meet the courier at their car.

• FOOD FROM RESTAURANTS
Order food from local cafes and restaurants. Just enter your address and we’ll show you everything that’s available nearby. Narrow down your search with filters and find your favorites or try something new. Currently available in Russia, Kazakhstan, Armenia, Uzbekistan and Kyrgyzstan.

• AVAILABLE IN 9 COUNTRIES
Russia, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Uzbekistan, Serbia and Moldova. Visit https://taxi.yandex.com to see rates and availability in your city.

If you’d like to share your opinion about our app, a driver or company that handled your ride, please send us feedback in the app.
releaseNotes: Do you love new features? It's time to update the app! If you're travelling to another city, check if the City to City service class is available to save on your ride (not yet available in all cities).
reviews: Молодец!!! Все было очень профессионально, вежливый! | Vsjo otlichno! Rekomenduju!!!! | Ребята, что за говно постоянно с оплатой. Почему у меня никогда не получается нормально сделать заказа? Летом (июнь 2021) пытался заказать в лавке еду и не мог привязать карту для оплаты и оплатить ApplePay. Пришлось писать в тех поддержку, умолять Всевышнего и поклоняться Сатане, лишь бы хоть как-то заказать бедному программисту (себе любимому) покушать, чтоб не выходить из дома. Но как говорится, буй с ним, привязал - заказал - успокоился. Спустя пол года. У моего друга возникает день рождение (такое бывает). Я, находясь в другой стране, хотел его порадовать сочными бургерами из Макдональдса. К сожалению, на привязанных карточках денег не оказалось. Думаю, ну, ребята из Яндекса же не пальцем деланные. Все-таки крупный IT гигант не только на российском рынке, но и на международной арене. Явно уже всё починили, там же программистов всяких как дерьма в болоте, что-нибудь-то они умеют. Но, спойлер-спойлер, не умеют. Новую карту привязать не удалось. ApplePay использовать тоже не удалось. Пришлось, как в Древней Руси, переводить деньги с одной карты на другую, которая привязана, и потом платить. Может ещё пушнину Вам в офис привезти, только потом курьера начнёте искать для моих чизбуреров?! Естественно, пока я все это делал, подорожала доставка Яндекс еды. На 100₽. Не много, но сам факт - это неприятно. Что из-за недо программистов, приходится терять время и я же за эти ошибки потом ещё плачу. Вывод: так себе, Вы IT гигант. Вы как Джимми Браво - прическа и мускулы большие, а по факту - говно на палке. | Приложение ошибается в геолокации - в результате списывают дополнительную сумму за «ожидание водителя». Если отказываешься сразу от предложения - все равно списывают деньги за «ожидание», даже если уже уехали на другом авто от того же «Яндекс такси». Очень неприятно. | Yandex doesn’t seem to care much about public health in Russia as 90% of drivers don't wear masks. | Полный ноль | It works exactly as I would expect it shall :-). I just problem using iPal, but the same credit card used directly works perfectly. Good job, | Not for foreigners - Uber was mucj better | Ложка дегтя: была удобная опция: заказ такси к определенному времени, теперь её нет. | Cool app

title: Rentalcars.com - Car hire App
description:
Rentalcars.com Car Hire App.
Need a great car at a great price – fast?Download our mobile app and you can...
1) Book the nearest car at the lowest price.Need a car on another continent? Or just around the corner? With over 49,000 locations worldwide, our app will find you the right hire car in the right place – at the best price.
2) Pick your car up with your phone.The Rentalcars.com eVoucher is accepted almost everywhere, so forget the printer. Just save your voucher on the app and pick your car up with your phone.
3) Enter your details once – and only once.Every booking, every driver, every credit card… our car hire app stores all the information securely, so you don’t need to re-enter your details every time you hire a car.
A great travel app for people on the go!
The world’s biggest...As the world’s biggest car hire booking service, we work with every major car hire company in the world and serve over 7.5 million customers every year. That means we can negotiate the best rates – and pass the savings on to you.
For exclusive deals in over 49,000 locations, download our app today.
releaseNotes:
We update our app on a regular basis, making it even faster, simpler and more reliable.

It’s already the ideal companion for anyone who loves the freedom and independence that only a car can provide.

And each new release means it’s easier than ever to find the perfect car, wherever your journey takes you.

title: TfL Go: Live Tube, Bus & Rail
description:
Travel confidently around London with maps and live travel updates on our official TfL app. Check live arrival times for Tube, London Overground, DLR, Elizabeth line and Thameslink trains as well as Trams and IFS Cloud Cable Car. Make step-free journeys and look up station facilities. See on the map when stations and lifts are closed. Walking or cycling? Our reliable journey planner will map a safe route.

The app is built around our iconic Tube map. To get started:
• Touch the map or search to plan your journey
• See the status of all lines
• Check how busy each London Underground station is right now
• Re-route as you travel - we’ll suggest alternatives
• Switch to the step-free map for accessible journeys
• Find out when your next train, bus or tram is due
• Look up which platform your train will arrive on
• See when the stations you want to travel through are quieter
• Check out station information and facilities such as toilets

Most recently we’ve:
• Added more information about station toilets – find out where they are by gender and which ones are accessible and/or with baby changing facilities
• Built a new map showing nearby bus stops – making it simple to see where you can catch your bus from
• Refreshed the navigation – it’s even easier to get to the features you want

Our simple and clear layout is designed to make using the app easy for everyone.

Planning your journey: We’ll suggest multiple ways to get to your destination – you pick the one that suits you best. Choose the quickest journey, bus-only or one that’s step-free.

Check before you travel: See how the line is running and when to expect your next Tube, bus, train or tram

Freedom to explore: Choose the right travel options if you or someone you’re travelling with needs to avoid steps, lifts onto a train or in a station.

Bus stops near you: Find the bus stop nearest to where you are, and next bus live arrival information for every route.

Available underground via Wi-Fi (or 4G in some places) for live updates on the go.

What users have said:

“I think that out of all of the transport apps I have owned on my phone, this is by far the best”

“I love how clean the design of the app is & how easy it is to use. The best part of the app is it’s simplicity & how it helps you to navigate across London so effortlessly.”

“The map is awesome! The ability to zoom in and out and see more/less information as you do so. The station information is really useful and seeing which lines/stations are closed or have delays at a glance is really helpful. It’s also beautifully designed! Very slick, clean, and responsive.”

“The app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well."

“This is a must have app … very much worth the wait. Well done TFL.”
releaseNotes: Improvements to VoiceOver support, plus some other bug fixes.
reviews: The one fair finder is missing in app | Amazing application. I am absolutely charmed with it. | The app is beautifully designed and free to use. Step free mode also works really well. Just maybe add a night tube and national rail map.
