it looks cheap and tempting and then it's not so cheap.
At the end, 3 vehicles for about 2 hours cost me 40 euros! | i parked very well and sent a photo of parking but it did not end the ride. The ride continued and after 1,5h it was ended automatically, which is good but it cost 20€ more than it should. The developer has maybe 2 brain cells and couldn’t set program that ends the ride after 10 mins automatically, but what he can is to end it automatically after 1,5h to scam my money! I LOVE THIS APP! | It is insane !!! The prices you charge I can rent luxury car like Aston Martin or Lamborghini for whole Day. The money Ive spend were the last money You have seen from me ever!!! | Absolutně nefunkční, nezobrazují se žádné kolobežky na mapě, myslel jsem ze to vyřeší aktualizace ale již po druhé žádná změna. Možnost vracení peněz neexistuje! Nedoporučuji | Dikybohu konečně v UH plné funkční ;) | The pricing in Czechia is ridiculous. I'd rather use Lime than Bird JUST because of the price. 🙄 | Půjčila jsem si koloběžku,když jsem ji chtěla ukončit nešlo to a tak jsem to asi 2 hodiny zkoušela všude možně ukončit 🙈 bylo tam i více koloběžek,ale ta moje nešla,jen teď čekám kolik mi to vezme peněz a jak se to bude řešit,protože jsem ji jen uzamkla a odešla,protože jako co jiného s tím,když 2 hodiny to nešlo 🙈 už nikdy více 🙈 | I downloaded app and found out that in my region you have to have a prepaid balance to use it. I did not want to top up my balance, so did not use the app and did not rent the scooter, however next day found out from bank statement that app changed me without my permission or acceptance. Trying to get a refund but their support doesn’t reply for 10 days now. Would not recommend. Use Lime instead. | Jsem velice zklamaná nefunguje a dobíjet si když nevím jestli se my jízda bude líbit je zbytečné. | I am in Tbilisi, Georgia. Today application didn’t work.  Please fix it. | Jen v aplikaci při zápůjčce nejde vidět zóna. | Co to má za smysl dávat koloběžky které nefungují? Zaplatil jsem si 500kc, dojdu ke kolobezce, naskenuji kód a aplikace píše 'odemykání koloběžky', já s ni pohnu a začne houkat. Co to má jako být? Chci Zpátky své peníze protože zkusit nahodit ty koloběžky zabralo víc času než kdybych šel pěšky. | Hrozne! Snazil jsem se poprve vypujcit kolobezku a nahlasilo mi to chybu komunikace se serverem. 5minut na to mi vola moje banka ze mi nekdo z Holandska z pochybne adresy provedl 6x blokaci 500Kc na karte a kartu mi system zablokoval pro podezreni o zneuziti. Radsi budu chodit pesky nebo zlatou MHD. | Má někdo zkušenost jak si poslat peníze co jsou jako kredit zpět? | Application is OK however pricing is confusing - In Kraków Poland - 9.99PLN for a 30min ride, even if you go for 5-10mins you are charged for the same 9.99!! Payment is done with fixed 15 or 30 or 50PLN. So for 2nd ride you are charged for another 15. Be careful... | Díky | Štve mě že kód na jízdu zadarmo nemůžu použít víckrát protože když jsem ho zadal tak jsem omylem koloběžku zamčel po pěti minutách a celých 440 Kč se smazalo🙃😔 | Jizda super, akorat do kopce se tomu moc nechce. | První jízda, která má být s kódem zdarma mě stála 84 Kč, navíc si musíte aplikaci nabýt kreditem. Jelikož se v Brně nepohybuju, mám tam teď zbytečných 500 Kč. | Für 2,2 km habe ich 10 Euro bezahlt.Das ist sauer teuer. | Vše funguje jak má a je to levné

title: Gotogate
description:
Welcome to the Gotogate app!

Our app puts the world in the palm of your hand. Fast, simple, safe and secure–instantly access your booking details and experience real-time updates and notifications so you never miss a flight again. Easily update your booking with baggage and other services from our pre-travel store. Get access to exclusive offers like early check-in for free (a €15 value), plus save up to 70% on flights, hotels rental cars and so much more!

What are you waiting for? Download now and let’s get travelling!  

FREE EARLY CHECK-IN
- Exclusively for our app users, passengers can now check-in for their flight, months in advance – for free! Let us do the hard work for you and we’ll send your boarding card directly to your mobile device. 

BOOKING INFO AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Multiple bookings? No problem! All your bookings in one place–no need to head to the airline’s website or download their apps
- Easily access your booking info. From your reservation details, boarding passes the app has everything you need. Plus you’ll receive real-time notifications on gate or schedule changes in real-time, so you’ll never miss a flight again

BOOK FLIGHTS TO ANY DESTINATION, WORLDWIDE:
- Search and compare more than 650 airlines, big and small, to find the best deal there is.
- Flexible booking options – we get it, changes happen! Choose our Flexible Ticket option and change your flight when you need to.

AVAILABLE FOR A WIDE SELECTION OF BRANDS
- Get your booking info for many popular booking platforms including Gotogate, Supersaver, Supersavertravel, Flybillet, Travelstart, Travelfinder, Goleif, Travelpartner, Seat24, Flygvaruhuset, Avion, Budjet, Trip, Mytrip, Pamediakopes, Airtickets24, Flight Network and FlyFar.

ADD SERVICES ON THE FLY
- Already booked? Travel just the way you want by adding baggage, choosing your seat and more from our pre-travel store. 

PAY YOUR WAY
- Choose from a number of payment options available throughout the world.

FIND AND BOOK GREAT HOTELS
- The best places, the best prices – with more than 300,000 hotels to choose from, there’s something for everyone.

CHEAP CAR RENTAL ANYWHERE AND ANYTIME
- Search and find great deals on rental cars. Take the scenic route and explore your destination at your leisure.
releaseNotes:
* Show refund status for cancelled orders
* Lost baggage service is now available for purchase
* Minor fixes and improvements
reviews:
Needs better integration with iOS. Calendar, Maps, iMessage. 

Update: No update at all. | All good with cheapest rate for flights | This app is easy to use, contain clear and accurate information. Reccomended! | Applikace nebyla rychle aktualizovaná, tudíž jsem musela sledovat jiné portály. Navíc při nákupu doplňkových služeb to házelo chybu. K ničemu

title: United Airlines
description:
Meet the United app 
 
From planning, to booking, to day of travel, we’ve got you covered.  

On our app you can: 
• look for flights across our global network and book them easily for yourself, or your friends and family
• check in for your flight and get your boarding pass before you get to the airport
• change seats, or flights, if something better becomes available
• make sure you’re prepared for your trip with our Travel-Ready Center
• add your bags, drop them at bag drop shortcut, and track them along your journey
• use our built-in terminal guide to find your gate and navigate the airport with ease
• watch movies, play games, and pay for inflight snacks and drinks while you’re in the air
• enroll in MileagePlus or manage your MileagePlus account and use your miles to book award travel in our app
• talk, text or video chat with an agent if you have any questions about your trip
• figure out your next move if your flight is delayed or cancelled
releaseNotes: We continue to make enhancements to help make the app easier to use and provide more consistency.
reviews: Death is better than flying with United. Save yourselves. Totally worthless airline that cannot help you in cases of emergency. This app did not help in any way. | Czech Republic not in the list if countries ... | You can't select Czech Republic when you are creating new account. Otherwise is a good app. I especially like that it's showing which flights have wifi | Pay attention or it will kick you out of the plane..

title: mi Flight Radar & Tracker
description:
mi Flight Radar turns your iPhone or iPad in to your own personal air traffic radar or flight tracker. Flights are tracked and displayed in real-time on beautiful maps near you or anywhere in the world. Point your device at a plane in the sky to identify it and where it is heading. Track the flights of your family and friends and determine the best time to meet them at the airport.

We are passionate about providing innovative flight status, radar and tracking apps. Please contact us for any features or improvements that you would like to see incorporated.

This is the FREE version of the mi Flight Radar Pro app.

Features of mi Flight Radar Lite that has made it the #1 travel app in over 10 countries:
* Track flights in real time
* Combined flight tracker and airplane tracker
* See an augmented reality view of the world, identify aircraft by call sign by just pointing your device at the sky
* See planes near you with real time updates on a map display. Click to see further details such as call sign
* Scroll the map view to see planes move in real-time anywhere in the world
* Have easy access to full flight details such as flight number, airline, aircraft type and tail number, photo (where available), departure and destination airports, distance to and from airports, altitude, speed, latitude, longitude and aircraft in-service dates
* Get airline for individual aircraft

Please note that coverage will vary depending on your location around the world. Data can sometimes be delayed due to FAA regulations. Flight positions are estimated using realistic physics based flight and route planning models and for some flights can cause inaccuracies in the real-time position updates.

CONNECT WITH US (mi Flights)
Like us on Facebook for the latest news on mi Flights apps.

Also by mi Flights:
mi Flight Tracker - Flight status and tracking
mi Flight Board - Airport Departures and Arrivals

HELP & SUPPORT
Visit our website www.miFlightsApp.com
Please email info@miFlightsApp.com for help and support or see the FAQ pages on our website.

DISCLAIMER
The use of this app is strictly limited to entertainment purposes. This specifically excludes activities that might endanger yourself or the lives of others. Under no circumstances will the developer of this app be held responsible for incidents resulting from the use of the data or its interpretation or its use contrary to this agreement. We reserve the right to anonymously track and report a user's activity using the app.
releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: ParkSimply Brno
releaseNotes: Děkujeme, že využíváte naši aplikaci. Co je nového?  Přidali jsme podporu pro tankovací karty od společnosti AXIGON, jde o karty Shell, EuroOil, karty CNG. Udělali jsme pro Vás živou aktivitu zobrazující platnost zakoupených parkovacích lístků v realném čase, přehlednější sekci platebních metod, přepracovali uživatelské preference a došlo také ke zrychlení chodu celé aplikace.
reviews:
Firma, která dělala novou verzi, to udělala skvěle. Vše funguje a dokonce pozlátka jako live activity jsou super. Díky moc! | Even I left the city hours ago and I am 200 km away my phone still shows P and time 0:00 in notch view. Cant get rid of it. This is serious bug guys! | Věčně nefunguje… | Nejhorší aplikace na parkování, jakou jsem kdy viděla. Díky Brnu za hodinu zdarma a to je vše. Abych zjistila, kolik času potřebuji do 6:00 ráno, musím vypočítat sama a zadat platbu. Až po zaplacení zjistím, do kdy mám zaplaceno. Nelze přidat k parkování třeba 5 minut, musím uhradit půl hodinu. Podívejte se na aplikaci Easypark a učte se! | Wow it’s unbelievable, but it’s working now :D
And I was even able to park and make a payment via apple pay.

Two points to mention:

1) you are offering to add a mobile phone number and even support foreign numbers. In my case, when I was putting my Estonian phone number, it was saying it’s a wrong format 🤦‍♂️c’mon guys, seriously? Please, let your QE/QA to check such things carefully 

2) it’s easier now to select the parking zone, but as for me who is always confused about zones and their rules, I wasted some crowns as I was parking in the zone C in the morning and I selected I wanted to park for 2 hours and it took money, but there wasn’t any notification or warning pop-up window saying hey there is free to park until 17:00 and your payment is going for after free hours and it’s not necessary to pay now. But there wasn’t nothing and I paid for unused hours | Nejde zvolit místo parkování přes GPS. | alespon me ne. Pri placeni vzdy pise, ze nemuze nacist detaily nakupu, funguje to nekomu? | Dobrá práce 👏 | Nic nefunguje
Lokace
Platba
Hrůza | Po updatu prestalo fungovat. Nenacte se detail platby. Ale hlavne, ze ma novy “moderni” design… | Aplikace byla dřív super, ale po posledním velkém updatu je na-prd, je nepřehledná, oznámení překrývají ovládací prvky a navíc při pokusu prodloužit dobu parkování byl místo toho zakoupen úplně stejný parkovací lístek a ještě jsem dostal pokutu… takže místo 60+20 Kč to činilo 60+60+500 Kč za pokutu… | neumí vyhledat zónu podle místa zaparkování jako dřív a žene vás k pkatebnímu stojanu s qr kódem!!!!
nejstrašnější downgrade za poslední rok v mobilních aplikacích. 
přecházím na mpla. 
sbohem. | Škoda, že aplikace neumí nastavit defaultní auto, vybere vždy první v pořadí dle SPZ. Mám v apce nastavena dvě auta, protože jedním jezdím stabilně a druhým příležitostně. Ale při koupi lístku musím dávat velký pozor na to, kterému autu lístek kupuji. V předchozí verzi se přednastavila SPZ z minulého nákupu. Budu rád za úpravy. Díky. | Zase Brno musi aplikaci vylepsit tak ze nefunguje. Proc to nemuzete nechat v zakladni verzi jako puvodne nebo jak je zakladni aplikace pro parkovani. Kdyz to neumite tak to nevylepsujte | Člověk je zvyklý na aplikaci, kterou úplně bezdůvodně celou předěláte absolutně špatným směrem. Proč? Nechápu proč musím zadávat zónu, když to fungovalo automaticky. Teď je to nepřehledný. Hodně špatnej krok!!!! | Skvely upgrade. Drive vteriny na listek, dnes minuty. Snad doslo na poradne sankci poskytovateli. | Obrovský skok dopředu v designu aplikace, funkčně stále dobrá, nemám vyhrad | Po posledním updatu aplikace nedoplňuje automaticky zónu po kliknutí na ikinu polohy. Také si aplikace již nepamatuje poslední použitou spz a neustále nabízí první v seznamu přičemž ale SPZ v seznamu nelze přesouvat. 
Tento update byl bez debat nejhorší kdy nesmyslně odebral užitečné funkce. | Nefunguje možnost platby kartou. | Tak ubohou aplikaci jsem dlouho neviděl. Stupidní funkce zrušení zakoupeného parkování zde neexistuje. Nebo info, v které časy se na tom a tom parkovišti platí… ubohost. | Bohuzel nejde zaplatit | Aplikace mi při přechodu k platbě vyhodí error ať dělám co dělám, proto radši chodí na internetovou aplikaci. | Nejhorší parkovací app, co jsem kdy zažil…otřes Brno a to su brnak | Aplikace nelze spustit již třetím rokem.
Nefunkční na jakékoli verzi iOS, nulová podpora a jak i vidím smazání původní recenze.

Tak či onak gratulace dev teamu.

Odzkoušeno na různých zařízení pod různými apple id. Na ani jednom aplikace nelze spustit.

Oprava: Lze spustit, stačí aplikaci vymazat a nainstalovat znovu. Ovšem to musí udělat člověk pokaždé co ji chce použít 🫡🤣.. | Platba nepodporuje Apple pay. Platební stránka má speciální klavesnici, která je naprosto k ničemu, protože potlačí možnost vstupu ze správce hesel. Pokud jdu do správce hesel a zkopíruji číslo karty do schránky, pak nejde vložit. Nakonec jsem musel opravdu vytáhnout fyzickou kartu a opsat kód. Celý proces mi zabral 10minut. | Kde je prosím podpora Apple pay? 😞 | Aplikaci chybí historie všech zakoupených lístku. | Chybí historie parkování na appce. To poslední se zobrazí bez data, času. Z portálu parkovacilistek.cz, kde historie je, mi zmizela též historie, a to jsem parkovala často přes tuto aplikaci. Asi chyba systému. Stála mě nervy s obsílkou a 400 Kč pokuty. 😕 | Appka funguje jak má, jen mě překvapilo, že o víkendu, kdy se v zónách parkovné neplatí, aplikace nabídne placené parkování, které pak platí až po víkendu. Zbytečně vyhozené prachy… Čekal bych, že nebude tahat z lidí zbytečně prachy. | aplikace je super na samsungu valila pefekt. přešel jsem na japko a nula .Apka nefunguje neuložím kartu a nezaplatím tak že japko je piča telefon | Hodně špatný když už se vám podaří za běhu vyplnit platební karta a zjistíte, že platba neproběhne a musíte se vracet hledat někam parkovací automat. Simply as always. | Garbage! | Po vyplnění údajů v apce přesměrování do banky (KB), potvrzeni platby přes klíč KB,  aplikace se vrátí na bílé pozadí a zamrzne. Nefungovalo mi to na staré verzi iPhone SE a ani teď na nové verzi SE 2020. | Na iPhonu 8 i 13 funguje bezvadně bez jediného problému. | Neumí apple pay, nutnost zadavani platebni karty. | Aplikace plna bugu, po nainstalovani pada a nejde spustit. Zakoupeny parkovaci listek se mi podarilo zobrazit jednou, navic s nic nerikajicimi hodnotami (null, atp). Od te chvile jsem se do aplikace nedostal.

Nedoporucuju pouzivat. Obere vas to max o penize. | Plni ucel. Bez problemu. | Po vybrani parkovani zdarma aplikace prestane fungovat. Pada pri kazdem spusteni. | Nejde zaplatit parkovné:) Sedíme ve více lidech u stolu a ani jednomu nejde zaplatit parkovaní:) Opravdu super apka.) | Aplikace funguje jakžtakž co se placení a karty týče. Ale bohužel, možná pro úředníky, město a městskou policii bohudík, tak aplikace sice zahlásí konec platnosti, ale bez zvukového či vibračního upozornění. Takže o skončení platnosti se dozvíte jenom z displeje. Ostatní aplikace co jsou v telefonu upozorňují normálně. Odzkoušeno na iP 11 a iP 12 Pro Max a na tlf. mé manželky iP 11 opět to samé, že by náhoda? | Pokaždé když si zaplatím parkování, musím odinstalovat aplikaci a pak znovu nainstalovat protože mi pak nejde otevřít | Asi moje první aplikace, která nefunguje. Potřebuji zaplatit za parkování a sekne se na dokončení transakce platby, prostě bílá obrazovka a dál nic. Zkoušel jsem 2x. Nic víc po ní nechci a ani tohle nedá, katastrofa. | Ze začátku aplikace před pár měsíci fungovala celkem dobře. Nyní je to katastrofa. Manželce po potvrzení platby bezpečnostním klíčemAplikace nevydala parkovací lístek. Všimla si toho až pozdě a možná přijde pokuta. Po odeslání stížnosti na email nikdo nereagoval.

Aplikace pravidelně zapomíná uloženou kartu a musí se vždy smazat a znovu zadat. Při zpracování platby dochází často k chybě a chyba se nedá rozluštit. při novém vkládá ní karty se nedá vložit číslo karty ze schránky a musí se zadávat číslo po číslu. Proboha proč appka nemá podporu Apple pay a bylo by to vyřešené. 

Radši teď hledám automaty na ulicích než platit přes tuhle napůl nefunkční appku. | Aplikace je naprosto k ničemu. Platební kartu nelze zadat, dovolí mi to zaplatit pouze sms - to by ještě nebyl takový problém, ale např. je prvních 60 min v zóně B zdarma a dalších 60 min za 30,-Kč. Tak proč po mě pak sms z aplikace chce za dvě hodiny 60,-Kč 😠?! | Totalni fail. Stale hlasi chybu pri placeni error payment status 6. Pouzila jsem jednou v zivote a pak to uz neslo. | Uzivatelsky desive | Naprosto příšerná aplikace. To snad programovali žáci základní školy. Ani na 10. pokus nejsem schopen provést platbu. Používám iPhone 12 a Komerční banku.
Jak může chtít Brno, aby lidé platili za parkování, když k tomu používá takovouto nefunkční aplikaci. | Při kliknutí na dobu času parkování zahlásí chybu a nepodaří se parkování zaplatit.
Nepoužitelné pro IPhone, nechápu jak tuhle aplikaci město muže tolerovat ! | Parkoval jsem na zóně C u Monte Bu v Brně. Během hledání automatu, kterej nevím kde tu je a stahování aplikace projelo kontrolní auto s kamerama. Asi minutu po průjezdu kolem mého zaparkovaneho auta jsem zaplatil pomoci karty má mem iphonu přes aplikaci. Za asi 30 minut jsem lístek v aplikaci nenašel. Šel mi aktivovat jen lístek na 60 minut zdarma. Aktivoval jsem tedy alespoň toto. Kde je problém? To teď mohu očekávat pokutu či co? | Zaplatit nejde, pořád padá a když už nějakým zázrakem ta platba projde, tak aplikace ukazuje 0 min a platná do Null a jakmile z ní vyskočím, tak už se do ní nejde vrátit, protože při spuštění hned zase spadne.

title: Dott – Unlock your city
description:
Got somewhere to be? Take a Dott!
Simply unlock an e-bike or e-scooter in the Dott app, ride to your destination, and get on with your day – easy as that. 
To get started:
1. Download the Dott app
2. Check the in-app map to find a nearby e-scooter or e-bike
3. Scan the vehicle’s QR code to unlock it, and you’re off!
Pro tip: Grab a Dott pass to save on your ride. Or simply pay as you go with your secure payment method of choice.


Why choose Dott?
Dott is the simplest way to move around your city, safely and efficiently. Ditch the crowded commute and enjoy traveling in the open air. Avoid traffic jams and arrive at your destination on time – for a fraction of the cost of a taxi or car share.
Our e-scooters and e-bikes are available 24/7, making moving around your city a breeze! They’re brought in for regular maintenance and boast all the latest safety features. Plus, thanks to the smooth electric acceleration, riding our vehicles is a piece of cake.

Ride a Dott whenever you're:
* Meeting a friend for dinner
* Commuting to work
* Heading to class
* Going on a date
* Exploring your city on your day off, or sightseeing in other countries


Get around without breaking the bank
Simply pay for your rides as you go, at a price similar to public transport. Or, explore Dott passes to ride more for less: grab a pass for 24 hours, a week, or even a month to save on every ride. If you fancy a ride for free, just refer a friend and you’ll both get a free ride each! Want in on even more discounts? Turn on notifications to hear about our limited-time deals.

Where you’ll find us
Dott is currently available in 40 cities across Israel and Europe – with more on the way! Want to see Dott in your city? Drop us a line at support@ridedott.com.
releaseNotes:
We've made some small under-the-hood improvements to the app and added a few local features to make hopping on a Dott even smoother.

Enjoy the ride!
reviews: Good ride ,but 20km/h MAX…

title: Xe Money Transfer & Currency
description:
Welcome to the Xe money transfer app, your one-stop destination for all your currency exchange and international money transfer needs.

HUNDREDS of MILLIONS of people trust Xe:

●	Check live rates
●	Send money internationally to 200+ countries
●	Transfer across 100+ currencies
●	Set Rate Alerts
●	Fast, secure, and reliable way to transfer money around the world
●	Over 105 million downloads
●	Thousands of money transfers sent every day

Transfer Money in Minutes

●	Transfer money in as fast as minutes to 200+ countries around the world.
●	Competitive transfer rates that often beat those offered by banks and other money transfer providers
●	Real-time mid-market rates for global currencies
●	Easily create a money transfer account using our app, get an instant quote, and send money straightaway once you've selected your currency pair and checked the mid-market rate
●	Easily track your money transfer from the moment you confirm it until we send it out

Send International Money Transfers to 200+ Countries

●	Send money internationally to over 200 countries, including India, Mexico, and the Philippines
●	Whether you're sending money to friends and family, paying for goods and services, or making international payments, Xe has you covered

Easy to use

Send money on the go whenever you like. Plus, you can exit your transfer and easily pick up where you left off

Flexible Payment Methods

●	Flexible payment methods to make it easy for you to transfer money internationally
●	Choose from bank transfer, direct debit/ACH, debit card, or credit card, depending on what works best for your needs

Your choice of secure Payout Methods

●	Choose from multiple payout methods for your recipient to receive your money transfer, including bank deposit, cash pickup, and mobile wallet
●	Send money directly to hundreds of major banks globally, and you can also pick up cash at over 500,000 convenient locations in more than 150 countries.
●	Send money directly to major mobile wallets in 35+ countries around the world.

Bank Deposits

title: Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages
description:
Learn a new language and start speaking like a native with Rosetta Stone.

Learning a new language has never been easier than with the new Rosetta Stone. The award-winning language solution combines proven learning methods with its proprietary speech recognition technology. Rosetta Stone is different because it works.

“Rosetta Stone is the gold standard when it comes to learning a new language.” - Mashable

“With its excellent user interface, clear instructions, a wide variety of games and challenges... Rosetta Stone has got it going on.” - TechCrunch

► LEARN INTUITIVELY THROUGH IMMERSION
Learn using our proven immersion method. Rosetta Stone carefully crafts sequences of words and images, so you can intuitively derive the meaning of each new phrase, without translations. The lessons recreate real-life scenarios, immersing you in the kind of situations you will encounter on holiday, at work or speaking with family. 

► GET ACCESS TO 24 LANGUAGES
Choose from 24 languages: Arabic, Chinese (Mandarin), Dutch, English (American or British), Filipino (Tagalog), French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Persian (Farsi), Polish, Portuguese (Brazil), Russian, Spanish (Latin American or Spain), Swedish, Turkish, or Vietnamese.

► 5-10 MINUTE BITE-SIZED LESSONS
Make progress one step at a time. Our bite-sized lessons fit into your busy day.

► PERFECT YOUR PRONUNCIATION
Start fine-tuning your pronunciation from the very first lesson with our patented TruAccent speech-recognition engine. You’ll be confident that you know what to say and how to say it.

► CUSTOM LEARNING PLANS
Maintain your focus with a personalised learning plan. You define your pace. Select a learning plan that matches your goals such as improving your communications at work, preparing for travel or speaking fluently with family and friends.

► OFFLINE MODE
Never miss a thing and continue learning even when you’re offline. Use Offline Mode to download units so you can complete them later, even offline.

RECENT AWARDS
• 2019 PCMag Editors Choice
• 2019 Tabby Awards Winner
• 2019 Best Mobile App Awards: Best Designed App and Best Overall App

Select a subscription:
We offer 3 and 12-month subscriptions — as well as a Lifetime option.

Subscription Details:
• For the first time, we’re offering every one of our languages in one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you’d like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe.
• Get full access to all lessons, stories, and audio companion when you subscribe to Rosetta Stone.
• Payment will be charged to your Apple ID.
• Your account will be auto-renewed 24 hours prior to the end of the current period.
• Manage or cancel your subscription from your App Store User Settings at any time after purchasing. Payment will be taken until the end of the current period.
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

Enterprise and Education Learners
• Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners.
• Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners.

For questions or assistance, please visit http://support.rosettastone.com
releaseNotes: • Includes various fixes and enhancements to improve your experience with Rosetta Stone.
reviews:
This service cost a lot to my company however their web platform is down regularly andnI can't connect to the app. Pure garbage | This app is not optimized for iPhone at all. Pictures are tiny, content doesn’t fit the screen so you have to scroll all the time, menu is UI nightmare, voice recognition has a pretty big lag and therefore marks most answers incorrect etc. If this was 5 dollars app, that could be accaptable, but not for hundreds of dollars. | I really like Rosetta Stone. Please add Ukrainian language. It is really important nowadays when there is huge number of Ukrainian refugees in Europe. Thanks ❤️ | Very small font - 0.5 mm for sentences 👎 (iPhone 7 - 4.7”) | Very good app for learning new language. Just need to improve the voice recognition. | Vážně, nejlepší “nalejvárna” jakou znám😋! | Super app!Full of pictures!!! | Je to vynikající on-line, nechybí skoro nic kromě tréninku psaní. Ale pozor pokud používáte aplikace na více přístrojích nepoužívejte off-line protože to je pak broken. Nezobrazuje se postup off-line a on-line. Takže pokud máte určitou úroveň na on-line a začnete dělat off-line tak opakujete stejné lekce. | The latest version of the app allows you to download lessons for offline learning. This is a great feature that was sorely missing in earlier versions. 
But there are problems. 
Why, when I am on line does it take 30 second or more ' downloading required file' and do that every time I open the app? 
After it has done that, it resets the view to level 2 unit 2 lesson 3 core lesson! 
What is worse is it resets progress. I am on level 2 unit 8 lesson 4( which I downloaded. ) and I've had to repeated many sections a number of times. 
Also, when online in a downloaded lesson, it seems to re download the lesson data instead of using the downloaded data. I suspect this because if I'm sitting in a location with poor wifi it can take a minute or more to down load a single page.  Why is that if the lesson is downloaded? 
It's not all bad though. It now caches your login data so you don't have to click though two login pages every time you load the app. 
You still have to verify audio setting every time you launch the App. 
So Rosetta Stone. Please fix These annoying issues. 
Looking foreword to an update and writing a more positive review. | Aplikace ma co dohanet, ale palec nahoru ze tu konecne je. Rosetta je jeden z nejlepsich programu pro uceni jazyku. Vhodne  pro samostudium, procviceni zakladni gramatiky a rozsireni slovni zasoby, idealne spolu s nejakou tistenou ucebnici.

title: Pegasus: Cheap Flight Tickets
description:
Discover the Most Affordable Flight Ticket Prices with Pegasus App
Are you ready for your next trip? Are you looking for a flight ticket? It’s time to use the easy travel app by Pegasus for cheap air tickets to your selected destination. Click on the “search flights” button and follow these steps:
Click the single or return ticket options,
Find the nearest airport to your choice of city,
Browse the year, month and day on the calendar,
Tick your time preferences on the specified date, 
Wait for flight prices to appear on the screen.
Renewed User-Friendly Design
Every click saves your time. This easy-use plane tickets app helps you monitor the best deals on search cheap flights panel. Airlines tickets booking is reserved on the app memory. Log in to see your reserved flight with the date, time and flight prices. What is more on Pegasus flight ticket app?
Check low-cost travel by the compare flights and ticket fares options.
Screen your Boarding Pass on the app.
Click on Extras icon to check and pay ticket charges for exceeding amounts of luggage.
Use the My Trips icon to get access to your reservation flight and previous travel tickets.
Easy Reservation
Flight ticket booking app designed for Pegasus passengers keep an easy travel motto. Book a flight and pay for your airline tickets after several browses and clicks. 
Fast and Secure Payment Process
Complete your flight reservation with easy payment steps. Pegasus App keeps your personal and financial details private during payment steps. Encrypted data on the app enables secure payment with a fast connection to your selected bank. You can prefer credit cards or payment orders from several options to buy your airline ticket. Pegasus app helps you freeze the ticket price if you don’t finish the payment immediately. You can pay in any currency of your choice.
BolBol Privileges
Pegasus stands out with its Gift Card and BolBol credits. BolBol members get the benefits of this frequent flier program.
Earn extra BolPoints by shopping at Pegasus BolBol shop. 
No need to remember your PNR number, BolBol membership does it for you!
Double your BolPoints by spending on the Pegasus app.
Book international flights or a ticket to domestic airports using your BolPoints.
Pegasus cheap airline tickets are available not only for BolBol members but also for their spouses, children and associates. 
Additional Services

Download Pegasus App to get the comfort of fully planning your flight, accommodation, transport, and insurance needs. You can directly access Additional Services by clicking the ¨More Services¨ icon. What kind of services are available on the Pegasus flight ticket booking app?  
Book your hotel, B&B accommodation and airport transfer via Pegasus offers.
Rent a car at your final destination using packages by Pegasus partners.
Buy travel insurance connected to your flight ticket. 
Show your affection by sending your loved ones a Gift Card to enable their free trips. 

Advantages of Using the Pegasus App
Flight search on the app monitors cheap flight tickets for the specified dates just with a click.
Join the BolBol members family to collect BolPoints for discount tickets. 
Activate the Notifications of special offers to plan your next travel search.
Use Travel Assistant under the ¨My Trips¨ menu to manage your seat reservation, add meals, pay for extra baggage and see urgent notifications.
releaseNotes:
Dear Guests,
This version includes an update that will allow you to see within your profile what you can buy with your BolPoints. You will be able to see the options you can purchase with your BolPoints accumulated in your BolBol account, such as flight tickets, seats, sandwiches and in-flight entertainment, within your profile.
By the way, a little reminder! Update the app now and discover all the exciting new features before anyone else!

title: Vetus Maps
description:
Die Zeit vergeht, und die Landschaften ändern sich, es ist sehr schwierig, auf einem riesigen Feld ein uraltes Geisterdorf zu finden. Das schafft erhebliche Hindernisse für Lokalhistoriker und Liebhaber der Antike. Vetus Maps löst dieses Problem! Jetzt alle notwendigen Alte-Karten der Landkreise und Provinzen in Ihrem Smartphone. Die Anwendung ermöglicht es Ihnen, die alte Karte auf die entsprechnede moderne Karte zu übertragen.

Anwendungsmerkmale:

- Übertragung auf eine moderne Karte (Satellit, Hybrid, Gelände)
- Änderung der Transparenz der Karte
- Kartenkatalog zum Herunterladen
- Markierungen setzen
- GPS-Tracks aufzeichnen
- Suche nach Orten

Auf den alten Karten ist eine große Anzahl verschiedener Objekte angegeben, die man als wertvolle Datenquelle für die Toponymie verwenden kann, da viele Namen verloren gegangen sind - sie sind auf keiner topographischen topografischen Karte zu finden. Selbst in unserer heutigen Zeit, viele Jahre später, kann man mit Hilfe dieser Karten recht sicher durch die Landschaft navigieren.

Alte Karten sind immer offline verfügbar, für Satellitenkarten ist eine Internetverbindung erforderlich. Die Markerinstallation erfolgt durch langes Drücken auf die Karte

Premium Abonnement:
Mit dem Jahresabonnement erhalten Sie Zugang zu allen Karten zum kostenlosen Download und können auch Karten von Drittanbietern oder Ihre eigenen Karten mit Dropbox herunterladen. Die Zahlung für den ersten Abonnementzeitraum wird Ihrem iTunes-Konto bei Bestätigung des Kaufs belastet. Der Preis ist regional unterschiedlich und beträgt nun 14,99 € pro Jahr.

Ihr Abonnement wird automatisch jedes Jahr bzw. jeden Monat zum gültigen Abonnementpreis verrechnet, und dieser Betrag wird 24 Stunden vor Ende des Jahres-/Monats-Abonnements von Ihrem Konto abgehoben. Um Ihr Abonnement zu verwalten oder die automatische Verlängerung zu beenden, gehen Sie einfach zu Ihren Kontoeinstellungen und inaktivieren Sie die automatische Erneuerung mindestens 24 Stunden vor dem Verlängerungsdatum. Nach Berechnung der Jahres-Abonnements können keine Rückzahlungen mehr erfolgen. Jeglicher unverbrauchte Anteil der Probezeit verfällt bei Kauf eines Abonnements. Für weitere Informationen, sehen Sie bitte die Benutzungsbedingungen (http://www.vetusmaps.com/termsofuse.pdf) und die Datenschutzerklärung ein (http://www.vetusmaps.com/privacypolicy.pdf).

Die Aufnahme von GPS-Tracks läuft im Hintergrund. Die fortgesetzte Verwendung von GPS im Hintergrund kann die Akkulaufzeit Ihres Geräts erheblich verkürzen.

title: Donkey Republic
description:
Donkey Republic - The most convenient and flexible bike share there is.

Join the Republic and get access to hundreds of Donkey bikes and e-bikes in more than 60 cities across Europe. Whether you need a quick ride, a bike for the entire day, or get a monthly membership, you will find the most flexible and affordable solutions with Donkey.

Find the right way to ride for your needs:

• Pay as you go
• Day deals
• Wallet
• Monthly Plans (Memberships) 


EASY TO USE

We believe that every ride counts!

So we offer the most convenient and flexible bike-share service for visiting new cities and for everyday needs.

• Simply download the app and create an account for free!
• Find a Donkey at a virtual pick-up/drop-off point for maximum flexibility and convenience.
• Enjoy your ride! 
• When you’re done, find a drop-off location on the map.
• Bring the Donkey there, lock the bike and end your ride in the app.
• App works in all cities we are present in.


WHEN SHOULD I USE DONKEY REPUBLIC?

Is that even a question? Always!

But in more practical terms:
• To be part of a community trying to be more sustainable through less owning products and more sharing.
• When you realize the cost associated with owning your own bike or leasing from a regular bike-lease company.
• When you have a flat tire or broken lights. Don’t wait for repairs, hop on to a nearby Donkey bike with our app.
• When you’re visiting other towns, simply open the app and see if we are there.
• When guests visit you, share your love for biking with them.


FAQs

Can I rent more than one bike at once?
Yes, you can rent up to 5 bikes at once! Just make sure to select the correct number of vehicles right at the beginning of your booking process.

Can I leave the bike anywhere?
No. We work hard with the cities to keep the streets clean and accessible for everyone. Please return your Donkeys to specific drop-off locations when you are done for the day.

What if I have issues?
Our support team is always happy to help and understands that life happens.


HOW PRICING WORKS

Just Ride (Pay as you go)
With no strings attached. Just Ride is ideal for trips from 15 mins to a few hours. You can also top up your Donkey Wallet with money and we will give you bonus credit that you can use for Just Riding.

Day Deals
In some cities, we have rolled out day deals which are great for when you just need a bike for the 1,2,3, or up to 7 days. Visiting for a weekend or inspired to explore like a local when you're on vacation? This is the perfect solution for you or a guest visiting you. 

Monthly memberships
With a Donkey membership, you pay a fixed monthly fee and get a certain amount of free time per day. If you exceed the included daily free time, your rental is extended for a low fixed cost. Ideal for the daily commute and for a busy city life with multiple errands throughout the day. Valid in all Donkey cities.


CYCLING IS OUR PASSION

We are a team of 40(ish) firm believers in cycling as the most efficient mode of transportation and the only one our cities need. We work by the rule that any decision we make will have to bring us closer to being a sustainable, affordable, and reliable mobility provider. We wish to show the world that cycling can make cities more liveable and bike-sharing will help in that transformation.

Donkey Republic - Every ride counts
releaseNotes: Tweaked for maximum performance, with bug fixes, ready for you to enjoy a fast commute!
reviews:
Just downloaded the latest version of the app. It doesn't start at all. I am on the current ios with iphone 13 pro.

I would definitely recommend ;) | We rented 2 bikes for the day and we were satisfied. Easy app good bike a no problem! Thank you Donkey Republic🚲🐎 | The whole system is lovely and easy to board on. There were two things that I would like to see improved: (1) I had a bike with a saddle too low and without a simple hinge to pull it up a bit, but I saw other bikes had that, so I guess they have older and newer bikes. (2) there is no easy way to rent four bikes for the whole family from one app, that was surprising. We had time and stayed patient and decided to open four accounts on four apps under one credit card, but I guess we wouldn’t bother if we were not in a hygge supercool Copenhagen :)

title: Adventurer: Hike & Explore
description:
Bring out your inner adventurer with the Adventurer app! Discover the wonders of nature on hiking and backpacking trails, conquer mountain peaks, and explore the great outdoors to experience unforgettable adventures.

Get inspired by hundreds of trails, treks and nature trips. The Adventurer app will be your unique guide for planning outdoor activities and orientation on the hike.

Everything comfortably in one place, without complicated research, a heavy backpack, or uncertainty.

HUNDREDS OF HIKING TRAILS, TREKS AND NATURE TRIPS
Choose and get inspired by countless outdoor trails, hikes, nature trips, walk trails, and backpacking routes. Every week we add new trails that will take you on another adventure that you will remember for a lifetime. Mountains, mountain ridges, deep forests, plains and other amazing places.


DETAILED INFORMATION FOR YOUR PLANNING
For each hike, trail, or trip you will find all the key information:
• Basic parameters of the trail, such as length, average duration of the hike, highest point of the trail, elevation, difficulty, type of hike, whether it is possible to camp in the area, and if the hike is suitable for dogs.
• Accommodations in the vicinity of the route that are possible to book.
• A detailed map that will show you, in addition to the trail itself, where you may find water sources in your vicinity, shelters for sleeping, or suitable places for camping and also attractions that you may come across during the hike.
• A detailed but engaging description of the hiking trail, which will help you always find your way around.
• Necessary equipment - if there is any equipment needed to finish the trail, you will know about it!
• Possible dangers - we want you to be able to prepare for anything.
• Weather forecast and daylight info - find out what the weather will be like on the day of your trip.
• Trail photos that give you a vivid and precise picture of where exactly you are going.

DETAILED MAPS & OFFLINE MAPS
Sometimes it is necessary to look at a trail from a different perspective. In the Adventurer app, you will be able to switch between several types of maps: satellite, tourist, and even outdoor.
Adventurer Club members will also have access to offline maps that will guide you even in the case that you don’t have access to the internet. You can also use various map overlays that allow you to see the approaching weather relevant to your location, light pollution in the area, and more.

GPS NAVIGATION TO THE TRAILHEAD
Don't want to spend precious time trying to find out how to drive to the trailhead? Well, you can forget all about that! Just use the navigation button that is part of each trail and the Adventurer app will show you the nearest route to the starting point of your adventure.

RECORDING OF OWN TRAILS AND PERFORMANCE WITH GPS ACTIVITY TRACKER
The GPS recording feature allows you to create your own trails. To plan the hike, the app will also show you the total length, time spent moving, the highest point of the trip, the elevation gain, the average pace, and the total climb.

DETAILED STATISTICS
You will receive a detailed performance record from each hike, which will then be reflected in the summary statistics, allowing you to monitor your overall progress.

ADVENTURER CLUB
With the PRO version of the app you will get:
• Offline access without the need for internet connection
• Map overlays - weather, wind, clouds…
• More types of maps - touristic, terrain, etc.
• Access to alternative routes 
• To use the Adventurer app free of ads
• Discounts on our partners' products - Adventure Menu, Skinners and more
• To become part of a community of travelers and outdoor enthusiasts
• To support a unique project - thanks to you, adventurer, we will be able to create new hiking trails and bring you experiences that will stay with you all your life.

Hiking trails app free - walking trails, hikes, and running trails

Terms of use: https://apple.co/3Cvvt52
releaseNotes:
Thanks for using the Adventurer app! This update includes:
- 7-day trial on Adventurer Club (premium app version)
- bug fixes and performance improvements
Download the update and go exploring, adventurer!
reviews:
Nejlepší apka na výlety 👌👌 | baví mě, když se chci vydat na různě obtížný trek, stačí zadat lokalitu a hned vidím kam se můžu podívat, zda je v okoli o možnost načerpat vodu, zda je cesta vhodná pro děti, psy apod. a zda je monost i přespat po cestě | Skvělá aplikace pro všechny dobrodruhy, kteří hledají inspiraci. | Skvela a intuitivni aplikace, diky ktere konecne nemusim travit cas vymyslenim vyletu a dobrodruzstvi. Strašně se mi líbí, že v aplikaci najdu všechno, co bych před túrou ráda věděla, například vím, jak dlouho přibližně trasa bude trvat, zda mohu po cestě kempovat či jestli je trasa dog friendly. V aplikaci je možno najít také možnosti ubytování v okolí trasy, což je za mě také velké + a pokud chcete opravdu někam vyrazit, máte to téměř bez práce s touto aplikací. 
Velké díky a klobouk dolů. | Výborná aplikace na výlety. Hezky zpracované a popisy také sedí. Doporučuji. | Nápad skvělý ale provedení příšerný. Aplikace se mi během túry někdy sama vypíná a nebo mě dokonce odhlásí ( i když mám zaškrtnuté pamatovat si mě, nikdy tam nemám svůj účet s musím vše vyplňovat znova). Když už se mi podaří zdolat túru bez problému, po uložení a dokončení trasy a vyzvednutí xp se mi pak aplikace snaží říct ze vlastně jsem žádnou túru neudělala, i když mi predtim napsala ze ji mám uloženou, tak najednou není. Docela zklamání 😔 | Aplikaci jsem využil ale chybí mi tam par věci.Hlavně bych přivítal kdyby tam šlo nahrát již absolvované trasy třeba s Garminu nebo jiné zaznamenané aplikace. Přeci jen člověk využívá i jiné chytré hodinky. A taky naštve když vám aplikace v polovině trasy vypne a vám pak zmizí záznam. | Nejlepší aplikace pro ty, co rádi chodí! Každý si najde své. Treky méně náročné, více náročné, výšlapy, okruhy,… Každý trek krásně popsaný, doložené fotografie a spousta užitečných informací. | Super aplikace, hlavně pro hikery. Akorát podrobnější info je za placenou verzi. Jinak super | ♥️
V případě problému, super rychla komunikace s vývojáři apky :)
Výletů plno a popsané do detailů. | Zatím super, jen by to chtělo více výletů v mém okolí. | If you hike, you don’t need anything else. Great platform and social network. | I wanted to use it after a while and the app is not working. So safe your money for membership etc and download ALLTRAILS :) see you on hikes | Kopie jiných apps, ne příliš user friendly. Malá databáze a srandovní překlad do angličtiny (defaultně nastavená na mém iP). Prostě zbytečná appka, které rádoby cool reklamky na sockách nepomůžou k větší popularitě… | Super aplikace, která jako všechny má nějaký ten nešvar, ale vše hned umí obratně vyřešit! A to se cenní. Navíc má spoustu super treků, které ti určitě nedojdou. Zejména u zahraničních výšlapů, máš super popis, který se hodí, když nejsi zrovna “jazykově” nadaný. Alespoň nezabloudíš. | Byla by to super appka, kdyby se neustále sama od sebe nevypínala | Skvělá aplikace. Dobrý popis cest. Skvělý je při rozcestí natočení telefonu na stranu a hned vím kam mám jít. | Skvělá inspirace 👍 | Skvela aplikace, ktera mi pomaha na kazdem kroku v prirode. Jen tak dal! :) | Skvělá aplikace, díky které jsme si naplánovali výlet bez jakýchkoliv problémů. V této aplikaci máte vše na jednom místě včetně vyznačených pítek. 💧Velice tuto aplikaci doporučuji pro všechny horaly. | It’s very user friendly! And so helpful if you are starting as a hiker… also so nice to finally find an app in czech with treks with the instructions in English :D | Skvělá aplikace s užitečnými informacemi pro dobrodružství. Ať už větší nebo menší. Díky ní jsem odhalila i spoustu hezkých míst, které máme kousek. | Appka vhodná jak pro zkušené hikery tak i pro začátečníky. Nemáš orientační smysl nebo si jenom nejsi jistý, podle čeho vybrat zajímavou trasu? Tak to je tahle appka ideálním řešením 😊 | Aplikace je skvělá pro dobrodruhy všech kategorií. Skvěle se hodí pro hledání vhodné trasy a získání všech důležitých informací, které k cestě potřebujete👍🏻 | Great app for discover new opportunities for hiking or some adventure! You can find there from easier hikes to difficulr climbing adventure! | Nelze hledat trasy, pokud nejsem přímo na místě | Zatím nezklamala 😍 | Na 100% ji využiji při svých oblíbených aktivitách | Perfektní appka na hiky a treky | Mnoho treků, které přibývají každý týden s detailním popisem a informacemi. Nádherný design. Skvělá komunita okolo aplikace - doporučuji zkouknout i úžasné rozhovory na jejich instagramu moderované příjemnou slečnou nebo překrásným fousatým moderátorem. | Nejlepsi aplikace na kterou jsem narazila. Naprosto spokejenost. 🤩 | This app is awesome choice for people who like to travel (especially hiking). You can find usefull built-in fetures, such as water sources and camping spots on the track or any equipment you need to succesfully complete every route. | Úplně perfekt aplikace hele. Zatím jsem nenašel žádnou nedokonalost. Vývojářský tým odvedl skvělou práci. Díky adventurerovi je pro mne procházka do lesa nevídané dobrodružství. | Naprostej top!!! Přesně to, co jsem hledala! 🤍 | Pri registrácii nie je možné v hesle použiť iné znaky ako písmená a číslice, bez registrácie sa do aplikácie nedostanem, takže ju inak neviem ohodnotiť. | Jen mě udivuje, že je někdo ochoten platit tak vysoké částky za členství a ještě ke všemu měsíčně.🥵  Vím že nic není zdarma, ale .....  
Držím pěsti s vývojem.  Dark mode by bodl. | Zdravim, hned po registraci mi appka spadne, 3x jsem zkusila a vzdy mi spadla..co s tim? | S přítelkyní jsme využili appku tento víkend a naprostá spokojenost. Zajímalo nás, zda bude appka opravdu správně merit nás trek, tak jsme ještě mimo to měřili přes garmin. Vše sedělo (čas, délku, trasu). 

Navíc design naprosto v TOPU! 😍(a to jsem si ještě před par lety vůbec nedokázal představit, ze budu nějakou podobnou aplikaci využívat). | Tahle aplikace je nejvíc, tolik výletů na jednom místě. 😍 | Konečně něco propracovaného na cesty!🤩🙏🏼 Doporučuji všema deseti. | Na appku jsem se hrozně těšila kvůli mapě blízkých tracků s podrobnými informacemi a fotkami. A to taky obsahuje. Jsem hrozně ráda, že tu něco takového je a že se podle toho dá i rozumně plánovat. Ráda objevuji nové traily. Dost oceňuji i reálné hodnocení obtížnosti tracku, které konečně obtížnost tras nenadhodnocuje, jako tomu je u jiných poskytovatelů. Je to zkrátka dělaný především pro relativně fit lidi. Za mě palce nahoru. | Nejlepší aplikace na cestování. | Moc se mi líbí přehledný a hezky zpracovány design. Ukáže vám i jaké túry máte v okolí, což je za mě super, protože nemusíte vyhledávat zdlouhavě na internetu, kam se tedy v okolí vydat + tam k tomu máte všechny potřebné informace, jako např. jak obtížná trasa je, co s sebou či předpověď počasí. Konečně vše na jednom místě. Rozhodně doporučuji. | Aplikace je přehledná a dokáže dodat inspiraci na túry a výlety, kterých je tu fakt spousta. Líbí se mi nápad, že vidím, jestli můžu vzít pejska a kde jsou zdroje vody, s tím jsem měl už dříve problém na některých trasách. Celkově je to moc hezky zpracované.
Rozhodně DOPORUČUJI

title: Flight Tracker, Flight Radar
description:
Flight tracker and radar app used for live flight tracking. Plane tracker and planes app to get flight status. Airplane tracker and flight tracking app to check flight. Airport flight status app to get arrival and departure time. Flight tracking worldwide with real time aircraft tracker app. Find flights using airplane tracker app. Airport flight status to get airport delays and flight info.


Live plane tracker and planes tracker app to get flight delays. Airplane tracker and track plane to check flight schedule. Aircraft tracker and flight status app to get flight updates. Cheap airline flights search with live flight track app. Flight tracker app is used to get airport flight status. Track flights with plane tracker and flight app. Watch live planes with airlines flight tracker.


Features of Flight Tracker and Radar app
• Track flights with flight tracker.
• Planes Tracker app to get airline information.
• Find Flights using aircraft finder.
• Flight tracker for plane tracking.
• Search flights with plane tracking app.
• Flight finder to get arrival and departure time.
• Flight delays using live plane tracker.
• Real time flight tracking with aircraft tracker.
• Live map tracking to see live planes.
• Airport flights status app to get flight delays.
• Live Flight finder for airlines flight status.
• Airport flight status to get airport delays.
• Track flights using airport flight status.


Live Flight Tracking app
Check Status of Flight helps to get flight updates about all airplanes. Track planes and live flight finder app is used to get airport flight status. Get airport information using plane tracker app. Check flight status using real time plane radar app. Route Tracker app to check flight status using flight number. Search flight times using flight tracker. Track daily flights using My Flight Tracker.


Flight Status Tracker
Flight Tracker app allows checking accurate Flight status. Plane Radar offers reliable flight data and plan flights. Online Flight tracker has all flight tracking updates on detailed flight tracking. Real time plane radar is used as aircraft tracker. Track plane alerts, arrival, departure using airport flight status. Flight finder is use to check night flights with live flight tracker. Track planes, airplane status, and today flights.


Flights and Airports
Search Flight by flight number and tail number. Airline tracker gives you information like flight schedule, aircraft type, arrival and departure information, speed, altitude, heading, position and airports. Search by route by entering origin and destination using Flight status tracker.


Real time Plane tracking
Live flight tracker helps you in real time plane tracking and you can see live planes on the map. Plan flights and check status with flight status tracker. Flight Status app allows you to click on a plane for flight info such as route, aircraft type, height, and estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, heading and speed. Flight tracker gives you real time plane alerts.


Search Flights with flight finder
Flight tracker to get flight updates. Get complete flight details using live tracker app. Find flights by airline, flight number, tail number, height, arrival and destination time, speed, position and heading. Search by airlines using flight checker app. Flight delays using plane tracker. Search flight time using flight tracker.


Live flight tracking worldwide
Track flights using the live plane tracker. With aircraft tracker, view nearby airplanes. Get nearby planes with plane tracking app. View airline, arrival and departure time, terminal, gate number and airport information using track aircraft app.


Note
Please provide your valuable feedback about Flight Tracker and flight radar app.

Manage your fueling like a pro, even when your office is a truck cabin.
Compare stations at a glance, prices and all.

Jinak je to super 👌 | Aplikace je super akorát už nemám výhody které byly předtím protože teďkom to chce po mě registraci jelikož jsem řidič tak registrace nejde musím zadat email šéfa | Konecne se daji po posledni aktualzaci aktualizovat cerpaci stanice. title: Miles & More
description:
Earning miles is now even easier. With the Miles & More app, you always have all the important information and opportunities to earn at hand. 

These benefits await you:
•	Daily updated offers and news tailored to you and your Miles & More status
•	Our goal centre where you may choose an award you would like and set it as a mile goal
•	Your mileage account balance for status and award miles as well as current mileage transactions, so your status goal is always in sight
•	The digital service card – always ready to use whether it is with a Miles & More Partner, for Lufthansa Check-In or Lufthansa lounge access
•	With My Challenge, you can fill up your mileage account more quickly through personalized challenges that are always tailored to you

Not a Miles & More member yet? Then simply register directly in the app so you can start earning valuable miles right away and redeem them for great awards. It’s all easy and free of course. Your Miles & More Team wishes you a lot of fun while earning and redeeming miles!
releaseNotes: This update includes numerous bug fixes and performance improvements to make earning and redeeming miles even more enjoyable. Have fun with the app and we appreciate your feedback!
reviews:
It happens frequently that the flight status is not always up to date, especially during delays information provided is not easy to understand and at times not up to date or reachable at all | Perfect | I need to do web login each time I open the app and it thinks I'm there for the first time so getting all of the annoying pop-ups... | It takes ages before the app will start underlaying awards website. Is it 2022 or 2012? A very poor user experience for the Europe’s largest airline. | App keeps me logged off, impossible to log in back, error in app 99% of time I open it, keeps telling me wrong password even its right … | In the newest version there is missing Czech Republic country for selection in Award flights 🤦‍♂️ | Awesome example of how not to make mobile apps!
And great example why not to try to save money on app development by using hybrid approach - will use this app as a demonstration to our clients. 
Extremely bad UX demonstrated by following journey:
Unless you want to check your miles, which is quickly accessible, everything else to do requires quite a big effort to find. Milion level menus, functionality hidden in 2 milion places within the app. But you can still live with that. The worst is if you actually want to redeem which I experienced now. You really need to want to redeem. Strongly. And be very patient. Single sign on - is that really such a big trouble to share login between app and web (where the switching between these channels across the whole app is very annoying?) My journey:
1. Pick your reward - easy and convenient
2. Click redeem (this should be IMHO end of the process, but it continues):
3. Redirection to web - nothing except the product prefilled - you need to copypaste card number and enter PIN (although different details used for app login). That means you need to go back to the app and reset your details. Requesting new PIN - you need to leave the app and get to mail. Email comes 10 minutes later. Get back to app, which resets your choice, get back to step 1, but remember your generated PIN!
4. After step 3 (for the 2nd time), you finally think you can finish your order. Nope. Because you are not registered on the LH shop (why did I need to put my card and PIN then?). So, fill all your details (already well known to Lufthansa).
5. M&M number is prefilled at the end of the registration form (oh, pure tech geniality!). Just enter your PIN again. The one you reset at step 3 (that means you do not remember the number, which is generated, not user defined). No problem, it’s in your mail.
6. Open mail, memorize the PIN
7. Get back to app. Yes, it really happened, the app does not remember the session from web. Get back to step 3. And really, make sure you remember your PIN!
8. After selecting your reward few times, travelling between mail and app, filling few forms multiple times, remembering random numbers combinations I might eventually get my reward some day.

Bravo Lufthansa! I’ll be glad to provide some advisory on how the app should look like, for free, because your example will help my business quite a lot :-) | App is out of order now! | Cannot even logon. It shows error service not available | The new update has logged me out and to log in again it requires me to select pictures with cars, shops etc from the list of pictures?!? Lufthansa wants to entertain us in the new way? And log in failed whenever I selected right pictures and tried to get there!
Useless now! | Lots of advertising I don't care for, and the one function I'd like—ability to add the M&M card to Apple Wallet—doesn't work.

(And there's absolutely no way I'm keeping a 77 MB app installed just to be able to show a loyalty card QR code, especially when the app likes to throw ads/“helpful feature tutorials” at me on many starts. Apple Wallet or nothing, I have to carry the physical card around anyway…) | No problem with it. Hope I can add my miles and more credit card to the same account. | Even I successfuly logged in after one or two seconds the app shows the login screen again, again and again. I am sorry to say but for me the app is completely unusable.

title: MapFactor Navigator - GPS Maps
description:
MapFactor Navigator is a free GPS navigation app with free offline maps from OpenStreetMaps (incl. free monthly maps update). You can navigate without an internet connection in 200+ countries. Intuitive voice turn-by-turn navigation in different languages, speed limits, camera warnings and many other useful features.

Key features of the MapFactor GPS Navigation app:
- voice navigation in various languages
- door-to-door route planning
- overview of the upcoming manoeuvre and distance shown on the screen
- free offline maps with postcodes (full GB postcodes) installed on your device
- points of interest
- speed limit and camera warnings 
- favourite routes and places
- 2D/3D mode allows realistic visual maps display
- day/night map mode
- routing modes for car, bus, pedestrian, bicycle, motocycle
- route avoidance - block certain road from your route
- maps rotate in driving direction, or north up
- blue motorway signs
- CarPlay connectivity (beta)

Premium Features:
- Head-Up Display
- Alternative Routes
- Remote commands
- No Ads

Live HD Traffic:
- reach your destination stress free, avoid any traffic problem
- all traffic problems at a glance on the map or in a table

OSM maps are created and updated by the community of volunteers at www.osm.org. OSM maps are updated every month for FREE.

Optional professional TomTom navigation maps with UK postcodes available - more reliable and accurate for vehicles navigation. Car version or Truck version with enhanced information for large vehicles.

If you wish to get help or provide feedback to our GPS navigation app, please email ios@mapfactor.com.

Terms of Use: http://bit.ly/MFTermsOfUse
releaseNotes: Bug fixes
reviews:
Většinu funkcí, které mají tuto navigaci odlišit od řady jiných dávno etablovaných nelze vyzkoušet bez zaplacení. Tudíž ruce pryč od zajíce v pytlíku. Kdyby to něco tak zvláštního umělo a dobře umělo, rádo by to ukázalo. Dodatek o par dnů později. Tvůrci mi napsali, že jejich aplikace je prostě dobrá a ať opravím své hodnocení. Tak to je dokonalá odpověď. | Nekonzistentní nepěkné GUI, mizerné až nepoužitelné Car Play, nalezené trasy horší než u kokurence, vyhledávání cíle hrozné. Nemám chuť to zkoušet dál... | Super navigace ale při poslední aktualizaci pro Truck celé Slovinsko zákaz nad 7,5t, vývojáři se asi spletli | Spokojenost | Dal jsem vám jednu hvězdu , protože apka nefunguje jak měla. Napsal jste mi, ze ať opravím hvězdy a spojení přes mail. Tak hvězdu jsem opravil ale spojení s vámi zatím nebylo navázáno. 
Kde prosím chyba. Psal jsem vám mail ale po zaplacení už jste se mi neozval… | Zdravím, Navigátor se mi líbí ale má jednu vadu - nezobrazí se mi v ; CarPlay; a tím pádem jej nemám v autě na displeji! Neporadí mi někdo jak to udělat? Apple xr. Petr | To jako vážně musím opět platit mapové podklady když jsem přešel na nový IPad?... Navíc každá aktualizace 679,- Kč cca 4x do roku?... Připlatil jsem si placené funkce navíc a teď evidentně bude lepší přejít ke slovenské konkurenci, tam alespoň vím na čem jsem!!! | Hlavní výhodou této navigace je, že nepotřebuje mobilní data. | Nelze nastavit volbu trasy (Nejkratší, nejlevnější), vždy naskočí Nejrychlejší. I když nechápu jak může být nejrychlejší když ze vzdálenosti 390km udělá 470km. Dříve na MS mobilu a později na Androidu to chodilo podle mých představ. | Super. | Prozatím dávám tři hvězdy. Důvodem jsou chybějící modré dálniční cedule, i když jsou v popisu aplikace uvedeny! To beru jako podraz. Druhým důvodem je zklamání z placených aktualizací map. Za mapy jsem zaplatil 1490 Kč a po dvou týdnech mi byla nabídnuta aktualizace map za 679 Kč. Tyto aktualizace jsou asi čtyři za rok. Takže kdo chce aktuální mapy, musí platit prakticky ihned po nainstalování mapových podkladů. A to se naopak v popisku nedočtete. Zvláštní... :) Tak snad alespoň ty cedule přibudou co nejdříve, když už budu platit 2700 Kč ročně!!! | Mám iPad mini 4 , koupil jsem Truck verzi a nejde zadat trasa, díky za vyhozených 1500,- ani mi to neukáže trasu po zadání startu a cíle. | Jel jsem Švýcarsko 🇨🇭 a paráda. Nic nemůžu vytknout.👍👍👍 | Naprostá spokojenost.  Používám placenou verzi pro truck a vždy mne dovedla tam kam měla .  Navíc si cením velice rychlé odezvy od podpory ...Za mne skvělá práce :) | Výborná apka, zatím nejlepší co znám,přehledná,rychlá. | Měl jsem ji na androidu a vše fungovalo nyní na iOS se nejde vyhnout placeným úsekum | Pouzival jsem dlouho na androidu. Také OSM mapy, nikoliv placené TomTom a šlo zadat přesné číslo domu, ne jen řádek s několika čísly a navigace přibližně.
U iOS to bohužel nelze a konkrétní číslo domu zadat nelze.
Proto je app na nic.

title: Västtrafik To Go
description:
Hi! This is Västtrafik’s app. You can plan your trip, buy tickets and stay updated on our traffic. You can travel with the app in Västra Götaland and Kungsbacka.

With our app you can:

• Buy single-, period- and daily tickets. Pay with payment card or Swish
• Search trips and find the quickest route
• See vehicle location in real time and stay updated on traffic disruptions
• Register for cashback on single tickets, securing your period tickets and the possibility to lend your period ticket
• Save your favorite trips and stops as favorites
• Export your trip to your calender or share it with your contacts
• See departures and arrivals for specific stops
• Purchase company tickets if your employer is connected to Västtrafik Företag
• See where on-call traffic is an option to our regular traffic (shown when searching trips)

Thank you for travelling together.
releaseNotes:
This version of the app includes the following:

• A number of minor fixes in the app.
reviews: Great app, but please, please support Apple Pay.

title: MarineTraffic - Ship Tracking
description:
MarineTraffic displays near real-time positions of ships and yachts worldwide. 
Using the largest network of land-based AIS receivers, the app covers most major ports and shipping routes.

• View VESSELS ON THE LIVE MAP, search for ships, boats and seaports and see what's near you!
• More than 300,000 VESSELS PER DAY report their positions via MarineTraffic AIS
• View live wind and 48-hour WIND FORECASTS on the map
• ANIMATED PLAYBACK of vessel's track
• PORT ARRIVALS & DEPARTURES live for over 4,000 ports and marinas, current conditions in ports and estimated time of arrival for the boats & ships.
• Manage your list of vessels ("MY FLEET"), shared with all your devices and MarineTraffic.com
• Browse 4.5 MILLION PHOTOS of ships, harbours, lighthouses and more!
• Upload photos to MarineTraffic directly from your device.
• Identify and track vessels sailing beyond the range of land-based AIS receiving stations, using satellite tracking, with ACCESS PLUS 24 (in-app purchase)
• Identify vessels around you at a glance with the AUGMENTED REALITY tool
Just point your device's camera to the horizon and get all the information you need about vessels, ports and lighthouses in your area: name, flag, speed, distance from you and a lot more.
• Use the ROUTE PLANNER tool to plan a route on the map, measure distances and calculate ETA

• MarineTraffic now offers auto-renewable subscriptions for Starter Plan, Nautical Charts, Weather Maps and Advanced Density Maps:

Starter Plan
- Unlock unlimited features like extended vessel and port details, vessel track, Advanced Search, Vessels near me, Augmented Reality and more

Subscription name: Starter Plan Annual
Cost: $9.99 (USD)
Renewed every year i.e. you will be charged annually


Get access to the marine environment with Nautical Maps
- Pilotage information such as sea bed, sea marks and landmarks
- Port details such as berths, dry docks and terminal location
- Position and characteristics of buoys, lights, lighthouses
- Depths of water and heights of land

Subscription name: Nautical Charts Monthly
Cost: $6.99 (USD)
Renewed every month i.e. you will be charged monthly

Subscription name: Nautical Charts Annual
Cost: $66.99 (USD)
Renewed every year i.e. you will be charged annually


Unlock real-time & forecast weather information with Weather Maps
- Wind contours
- Wind flow & gusts
- Temperature
- Wave metrics
- Clouds and Precipitation
- Ocean currents
- More than 20 key metrics
- 7-days sea meteogram

Subscription name: Weather Maps Layers Monthly
Cost: $8.99 (USD)
Renewed every month i.e. you will be charged monthly

Subscription name: Weather Maps Layers Annual
Cost: $95.99 (USD)
Renewed every year i.e. you will be charged annually


Advanced Density Maps
- Dig into global shipping traffic data, filtering by vessel type.

Subscription name: Advanced Density Maps Monthly
Cost: $1.99 (USD)
Renewed every month i.e. you will be charged monthly

Subscription name: Advanced Density Maps Annual
Cost: $17.99 (USD)
Renewed every year i.e. you will be charged annually


For all the above subscriptions:
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Terms of Use: https://www.marinetraffic.com/en/p/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.marinetraffic.com/en/p/privacy-policy

Join the great MarineTraffic community!
releaseNotes:
- Additional viewing options in distant zoom levels
- Bug fixes and improvements
reviews: Strikingly precise when the area is covered by AIS. Unfortunately, there are large ones with no boat detection (like Red Sea for some) where the app is useless | Dobrá aplikace používám při rybolovu

title: Iberia
description:
New Iberia App. The Iberia experience, in your hand.

We have renewed our app to always be close to you: choose your destination; enjoy our wide range of fares; manage your Iberia Plus profile; complete your trip and save by booking hotel or car; access with your reservation to digital press and information of interest, free of charge; Check your balance in Avios and use them to travel ... And all, with our quality and service.

· BOOK YOUR FLIGHT

Choose the destination, date and rate that best suits your preferences; we have for all tastes. Store your credit card information and pay it on the most secure platforms quickly and conveniently.

· MANAGE YOUR RESERVATION

Access the My Trips section, view your reservation and have the details at hand. Change your flight if you need it; if it is an airlift ...

· DO CHECK-IN

Check-in and carry your boarding pass on your mobile or tablet; so you can see it even without an internet connection. Forget about printing, and forget about queuing at the airport.

· FOLLOW THE STATE OF YOUR FLIGHTS

Access the Flight info section and check the status of your flight, or the flight of another. Get updated information on schedules, last minute changes ...

· ACCESS IBERIA PLUS

Sign up and manage your profile in your Private Area: travel documents, credit cards, frequent passengers ... Take your Iberia Plus cards on your mobile and view them comfortably. Check your accumulated Avios balance with us or our partners. Enjoy discounts and promotions in restaurants, technology, leisure ... This is our exclusive loyalty program.

· APPLE WATCH

Our App Iberia, now on your Apple Watch. Manage your flight comfortably and have the most complete information always at hand: all your flight and airport data, last minute information, notifications when check-in is available... Download it now.
releaseNotes:
New update! In this version you will find the following changes:

Improvements:
· Mitigate your CO2 footprint as an option
· Air Shuttle manage my booking redesign

Bug fixing:
· Fix in adding boarding pass to Apple Wallet
· Fix in validating CVV in payment form
· Fix in introducing Frequent Flyer number from MMB
· Fix in handling disrupted flight from the homepage
· Fix in applying bank’s tax in card payment
· Fix in luggage details.

Pongo una estrella porque menos no se puede. 
Porfavor cambiad algo en su sistema IT. 
Gracias. Martina Gutierrez | Completely useless app as it even cannot find a flight while it works when using Iberia website. | Absolutely dysfunctional Web and app - due to broken backend, I suspect. The worst way to show the airline reliability! | It is not possible to change the seat in the system , now I have to seat on 35 C , unbelievable | The app cannot download data from the reservation systems :-((( | Design is great but cant check-in on-line. | Great services, great application for iOs.
Highly recommended 👍🏻 | Booking not found, none of my 14 bookings. | App needs to be fixed. But the website also. No way to see my flight in app, not able to check-in a. Finaly boarding pass not in app. I have to print it. Useless.
